
































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Sei ta poia to Maaron izazaa tooni ve tintini? Ene ŋeer tau izorzor zeran sasaghatizi ŋgar toozi. Ve yes tau tisosor pa eez to Maaron na, i itaghon ŋgar toozi mako. Ve zeran tau tivevelegh Maaron paam, i ipaak zi mako.
Saveeŋ to Maaron tomania tutuuŋ tooni, ene ighamu loolo poia le poia kat. Ve ighamgham ŋgar pani irau mboŋ ve mataaz.
Tamtamon tauvene, i imin ai tau tivazoghi igharau yaa tau irereer. Saawe tooni to iyanooŋ, ene aat anooŋa popoia. Ve saawe to aaz tiina, raua irau imalai mako. Tamtamon tauvene, uraat tooni isov ilaan poia mon.
Eemon zeran sasaghatizi, lepoogh toozi tauvene mako. Yes timin pen tau ighe yaghur izaa, mako ivuvuura gha ilale.
Tauvene saawe tau Maaron igabiiz tamtamon ve ighur atuya pazi, zeran sasaghatizi pale lezi saveeŋ mako, ve titud mon. Zeran to ghamuuŋ sosor irau tileep tomania tamtamon duduŋazi ila lupuuŋ toozi ne mako.
Tauvene tamtamon duduŋazi, Maaron maata pazi, ve iŋginŋgin zi pa laghooŋ toozi. Eemon zeran tau titaghon eez saghati na, yes pale tilalez.
Puughu mindai ta nugh nugh timbu saveeŋ tighe tipaburigin malmal? Tamtamon tiliil eez to tigham taliiŋzizi pasaa? Ŋgar toozi tawe, tighamu sorok. Irau ighur mako.
Yes kinik to taan tigham aghezi tighe tigham malmal. Ve yes pooza tilup zi, ve tiil eez to tizoor Yoova ŋgar tooni ve titatan ŋeer tau i ighuru imin kinik.
Yes tighe: “Aiyo! Takuup ravraav tomania sen toozi tau tikau ghiit pani ne, ve tasik zi tila. Leso tiŋgin ghiit muul sov.”
Eemon Yoova, i ileep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz izi nugh sambam, ve iŋiŋ pazi. Ve maata veleghin ŋgar toozi.
Ra isaav ariaaŋ pazi toman aate yavyav, ve iparoi zi toman naagho isaghat.
Ighe: “Yau naghur tamtamon tsiau ee igham naghog ve imin kinik. I ileep izi loloz tsiau patabuyaaŋ Zion, ve ighamgham pooz.”
Kinik to iit Israela isaav tauvene: “Yau aat navotia saveeŋ tau Yoova imbua tomani ghau. I isaav payau ighe: ‘Yau natug yo. Yo tamam ta yau. Aazne, yau naghur ghom pa uraat.
Ughason ghau, o yau nagham nughmariŋ timin lem. Tamtamon tau tileep irau taan ziige ta naol ne pale timin lem, ve uŋgin zi.
Pooz tsio pale ariaaŋa kat, imin titi to kinik tau tigharaata pa ain na. Yo aat urav matin kinik tisov tapirizi, imin uur tau tiravu le imbiriis ŋanŋania.’”
Tauvene, yam kinik asov agham ŋgar poi. Ve yam pooza to taan, alooŋ saveeŋ ve ayamaan gham.
Aroi pa Yoova ve abees pani. Atandagh pani ve apaiti toman tintinmim.
Aput aghemim pa Naatu, ve aleep ila i saamba. Mako pale Maaron aate yavyav payam, ve iburig ireu gham gha asov alalemim. Pasaa, i aate tuuku. Eemon yes tau tiyooŋ ila tooni na, poia tooni pale izaa toozi, ve tileep toman tintinizi.

O Yoova, yau koiagŋa katini. Eval tiina kat tiburig tighe tivaghamun ghau.
Yes tisavsaav payau tighe: “Maaron ipul muuri pani wa. Irau iuule muul mako.”
Eemon Yoova, yo umin sigheu payau ve upoon ghau. Yau tinig izaa pasaa, yo ugham ezag imin tiina, ve upalot ghau le naliiv koiagŋa.
Yau nataŋ rarai Yoova toman aliŋag tiina naghe iuul ghau. Ve i ileep izi loloz tooni patabuyaaŋ, ve ilooŋ ghau.
Tauvene yau nazi le nagheen kat. Pasaa, Yoova tauu iŋgin ghau pa ghenooŋ tsiau le naburig muul.
Isaav ighe koiagŋa ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ saŋavul (10,000) tilivut ghau to tigham malmal payau, ene yau irau naroi pazi mako.
O Yoova, rekia mon uburig gha uul ghau! Urav koiagŋa azezi le livozi ipolpol. Ve urav matin tapirizi le isov kat.
Yoova, yo mon ta irau ugham mulin ghau. Ughur poia tsio izaa to tamtamon tsio tisov, leso tintinizi ve tileep poi.

O Maaron, yau nataŋ rarai ghom. Lolom isaghatin ghau, ve ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau. Pasaa, pataŋani igham ghau ve leg eez mako. Upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tane. Leso upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi ughe ŋgar tsiau iduduuŋ ila yo matam.
Oyai, yam tamtamon tau atatan ghau ve avaghamunia ezag na, ŋeez o apul ŋgar tsiam tana? Yam aghur lolomim pa ŋgar soroksorok tau le anooŋa mako na, ve ataghon ŋgar karom. Ŋeez o apuli?
Yam awatagh: Yes tau lolozi isaghav Yoova ariaaŋ ve titaghon eez tooni na, i isiigh zi timin i tauu le wa. Tauvene saawe tau yau nataŋ raraini, i aat ighur taliiŋa payau.
Aroi pa Maaron, ve agham sosor muul sov. Saawe tau yam aleep ila niamim to ghenooŋ, aneneeŋ, ve matamim iŋgal taumim, ve agham ŋgar poi pa saveeŋ tane.
Anumeer Yoova ve agham watooŋrau pani toman lolomim. Leso watooŋrau tsiam iduduuŋ ila i maata.
Tamtamon naol tipasawal tighe: “Oyai, ŋeez o tagham lepoogh poia!” Eemon yau naghe: “Yoova, lolom poia payei, ve utotoi taum payei.”
Yo ugham ghau tintinig ve lolog poia kat, iliiv yes tau aniiŋ ve vaen anooŋa katini tivotvot ila uum toozi.
Tauvene yau ateg izi ve nazi nagheen le lolog iveegh. Irau naroi mako. Pasaa, Yoova, yo taum matam payau ve uŋgin ghau naleep poi.

O Yoova, ughur taliŋam pa aliŋag, ve ulooŋ taŋiiz tsiau tane.
Yo kinik tsiau ve Maaron tsiau. Saawe isov, suŋuuŋ tsiau iŋaŋarui ghom. Tauvene ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz tsiau tane ve uul ghau.
Yoova, mboŋoozo ta naol ne, yo uloŋlooŋ avog lutluutu. Ighe nughizau, yau naghurghur ghasoniiŋ tsiau iŋarui ghom, ve naghur matag payo to uul ghau.
Maaron, yo lolom pa ŋgar saghati mako kat. Zeran sasaghatizi irau tileep tomani ghom mako.
Ve zeran pakuruuŋa irau tiyooz ila yo naghom mako. Pasaa, yo ughurghur koi pa tamtamon tisov tau tighamgham ŋgar saghati.
Yes tau avozi karom na, yo ureu zi tilalez. Ve zeran tombanooŋa ve yes tau tiliŋliŋ siŋ pa tamtamon na, yo lolom pazi rigta mako kat.
Eemon yo lolom isaghav ghau ariaaŋ ve uluul ghau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio. Tauta yau irau naloŋ nalat rumei tsio. Yau naroron payo, ve naput agheg payo ila rumei tsio patabuyaaŋ.
O Yoova, ŋgar tsio, ene iduduuŋ mon. Ugham pooz payau, ve upaghazoŋai ghau pa eez tsio, leso nataghon duduŋaini. Pa koiagŋa tighe tivaghamun ghau.
Saveeŋ onoon eta irau ivot ila avozi ne mako. Lolozi isaghav ŋgar saghati mon to tivaghamun tamtamon. Yamazi itortoor saveeŋ. Avozi imin naal tau aavo ikakaak. Tisasavia saveeŋ ŋgoreeŋ naol to titombaan tamtamon ve tivaghamun zi.
O Maaron, uvotia sosor toozi ivot ighazooŋ, ve ughur atuya pazi. Ŋgar sasaghati tau tighamghamu na, upamuule ila pa tauzi ve ivaghamun zi. Saawe isov, yes timamalaaŋ pa tutuuŋ tsio. Tauvene uziir zi tilalez. Pa yes tizorzoor ghom, ve tighamgham taliiŋzizi.
Eemon tamtamon tisov tau tiyooŋ ilat tsio, ene aat tintinizi. Yes pale timbou toman lolozi poia irau saawe. Yes tau lolozi igheen tsio na, uvool toozi ve upoon zi. Leso lolozi poia kat ve tipait ghom.
O Yoova, poia tsio izazaa to yes tau titaghon duduŋai saveeŋ tsio. Yo lolom pazi ve poia tsio imin sigheu pazi.

O Yoova, uyaon ghau toman atem yavyav sov. Ve isaav ighe yo ughur pataŋani iŋarui ghau to upaduduuŋ ghau, na ughamu toman atem yavyav kat sov.
Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Lolom isaghatin ghau ve uul ghau lak! Pa tapirig isov wa. O Maaron, ugham ghau tinig poia. Pa tuag isov iyavyav.
Yoova, lolog ipataŋan kat. Pale upul ghau tauvene ila ila le ŋeez o isov?
Yoova, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi. Tauvene matam iŋgal ghau muul, ve upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tane. Ugham mulin ghau lak.
Pa mateegha irau matazi iŋgal ghom muul mako. Sei ta pale ighengheen ila naal ve ipait ghom? Mako.
Yau nayakyak le tapirig isov. Mboŋ ta naol ne, nataŋtaŋ le matag suuru ipot ila moogh tsiau.
Lolog ipataŋan kat ve nataŋ tiina le matag isarsar. Pasaa, koiagŋa katini.
Yam zeran tau aghamgham ŋgar sasaghati na, asov aghau payau! Pa taŋiiz tsiau, Yoova ilooŋa wa.
Yau nataŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, ve i ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau. Ghasoniiŋ tsiau, i aat iyok pani.
Pale igham koiagŋa tisov tiroi tiina ve mayazi. Yes pale tivaghamgham, ve titoor zi rekia mon, ve titud mon ve tila.

Yoova, yo Maaron tsiau. Yau nayooŋ ilat tsio. Zeran sasaghati tigham taghon ghau tighe tivaghamun ghau. Uul ghau ve ugham mulin ghau ila nimazi.
Ighe mako, yes pale tirav ghau, ve tivaghamun ghau imin laion iraŋgat tamtamon, le ŋgiira ŋgiira. Pasaa, leg etag eta to igham mulin ghau ne mako.
O Yoova, Maaron tsiau, zeran tau tighe tigham saghatin ghau, yau nagham sosor eta pazi mako.
Tamtamon tau yeŋa nimbu saveeŋ to nivalupu ghei nimin eemon na, yau nagham ŋgar saghati eta pazi mako. Ve yes tau tighur koi payau sorok na, yau naum gabua toozi eta mako.
Isaav ighe yau nagham sosor tauvene, ene poia pa koiagŋa tigham taghon ghau ve tikis ghau, ve tivaghaaz ghau ila taan ve nagheen ila ŋgaupup.
Yoova, uburig toman atem yavyav, ve ureu koiagŋa. Pa atezi yavyav kat payau. Maaron tsiau, uburig rekia mon ve uul ghau. Ughur atuya iŋarui koiagŋa pa ŋgar tau yes tighamu na.
Uyau tamtamon tisov tilam tilup zi ila yo naghom. Uleep ila niam to ghamuuŋ pooz izi nugh sambam, ve ugham pooz pazi.
Yoova, yo ugabiiz tamtamon to nugh nugh, ve ughur atuya pazi. Ugabiiz ghau ve upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi, leso tiwatagh tighe yau ŋeer duduŋag, ve gabuag tomania ŋgar tsiau isov, ene poia mon.
Maaron, ŋgar tau yo ughamghamu na, ene iduduuŋ mon. Ve yo uwatagh katin tamtamon lolozi ve ŋgar toozi. Zeran sasaghati tau tighamgham malmal na, upasov ŋgar toozi saghati tawe. Ve upalot zeran duduŋazi, leso tiyooz ariaaŋ.
Maaron, yo mon ta umin sigheu payau. Yes tau ŋgar duduuŋa igheen ariaaŋ ila lolozi na, yo ugham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi.
Maaron, gabizooŋ tsio, ene iduduuŋ mon. Saawe isov, yo utotoi aatyavyav tsio pa zeran sasaghati.
Tamtamon tau ighe titoor ŋgar toozi mako, ene pale Maaron ipot mbuzaagh ve iyool paneegh tooni to ighur atuya pazi.
I igharaat zaab tooni pataghaaŋ to irav zi. Ve igharaat paneegh tooni natŋa toman yav, leso ivanegh zi.
Zeran sasaghati timin livaa tau aapo ve ighe ipoop. Pasaa, lolozi ivon pa ŋgar sasaghati naol tau tighe tigham pa tamtamon. Ve murei, mako anooŋa to ŋgar tau igheen ila lolozi na ivot ighazooŋ. Ene karom naol to tivaghamunia tamtamon.
Ŋeer tau ighe itai puura pa tamtamon eta, ene pale tauu itap izila puura tana.
Ŋgar saghati tau i ighe igham pa tamtamon, ene pale imuul pa tauu. Ve malmal tau i ighe igham pazi, ene pale ivaghamunia i tauu.
Yau lolog poia pa Yoova, ve napakuru pa ŋgar tooni duduuŋa. Yau nambou mbouŋ to napait i eeza. Pa Yoova, i Maaron tiina kat tau iliiv zimaronŋa tisov.

O Yoova, Tiina tsiei, yo utotoi ezam tiina irau taan isov. Yo upabood taum pa mbonarim tau tiina kat. Iliiv gabua isov to sambam saamba.
Yo ughur yes geegeu ve yes tau siŋsiŋaiŋazi to tipait ezam ve titotoi tapirim. Leso ugham koiamŋa tineneeŋ, ve upoon yes zeran to taliiŋzizi avozi.
Matag izala pa sambam saamba, ve naghita nimam muuri ighengheen. Yau naghita kaiyo ve pitum tau yo taum ughur zi tila niazi na,
ve naghe: “Yei tamtamon to taan, nimin saa kaut poia, ta yo matam iŋgalŋgal ghei? Mindai ta yo matam payei?
Yo ughur ghei nizi rigmon pa yes aŋela ve yo taum. Ve upakur ghei, ve ugham ezamai ivot imin tiina.
Yo ughur ghei to niŋgin yo nimam muuri, ve ughur gabua isov ila yei sambamai:
Ŋgai maata maata to nughei, ve gabua tisov tau tileep izi su,
man tisov tau tirovroov ila taitai saamba, ve iigh tisov tau tilaghlaagh ila te loolo.
O Yoova, Tiina tsiei, yo utotoi ezam tiina irau taan isov.

O Yoova, yau napait ghom pa poia tsio toman lolog isov. Ve naghe navotia uraat ŋgeretazi tau yo ughamgham zi na. Uraat tana, maata ite. Tamtamon tighita le ŋgar toozi imbool.
Yau lolog poia kat ve tintinig payo. Yo Maaron tiina tau uliiv zimaronŋa tisov. Tauvene yau aat nambou ve napait yo ezam.
Saawe tau koiagŋa tighit katin tapirim, yes titoor zi ve tighe tighau. Eemon titaptap tizi le tisov timataar.
Yo uleep ila niam to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve ugagabiiz tamtamon. Ve gabizooŋ tsio, ene iduduuŋ mon. Yo ughit ghau ughe ŋgar tsiau ene iduduuŋ. Tauta uul ghau pa saveeŋ tsiau.
Yo uyaon nugh nugh tau tiwatagh ghom mako na, ve ureu tamtamon sasaghatizi gha tilalez. Yo umus ezazi ilale wa. Irau tamtamon matazi iŋgal zi muul ne mako.
Koiagŋa tisaghat wa. Pale tileep tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Ve nugh toozi paam, yo ureu mbirisai zi le tisov tilalez. Tauvene tamtamon pale lolozi iveghai zi kat.
Yoova ileep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz ve iŋginŋgin gabua irau saawe. I igharaat niia tawe ve isasaŋan pa gabizooŋ tamtamon.
I igagabiiz tamtamon tisov to taan, ve ighagharaat pataŋani toozi itaghon ŋgar duduuŋa. Ve igham pooz pa nughmariŋ itaghon ŋgar raraate mon.
Yoova imin ruum ariaaŋa to ipoon yes tau koiazŋa tighur pataŋani pazi na. Ighe pataŋani ivot, mako i imin lezi nugh to yoŋgaaŋ.
Yoova, yes tau tiwatagh katin ghom na, tinumeer ghom. Pasaa, zeran tau tizuari zi payo, yo irau ughur murim pazi mako.
Ambou mbouŋ to apakur Yoova. I ileep izi nugh Zion, ve ighamgham pooz. Uraat tintiina tau i ighamgham zi na, avotia varuzi le irau nughmariŋ.
Yes tau tiliŋ siŋ pa tamtamon na, Yoova irau ighurghur zi mako. Pale iyat ŋgar toozi tawe. Ve tamtamon tau tinumeera ve tibadbaad pataŋani na, i irau loolo iveghai taŋiiz toozi mako. I pale iuul zi.
O Yoova, ughita pataŋani tau koiagŋa tigham payau ne! Yes tivaghamun ghau kat le naghe namaat. Lolom isaghatin ghau, ve upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tane.
Leso nayooz ila ataman to nugh Zion, ve nasavia uraat tintiina tisov tau yo ughamgham zi payau. Ve napait ghom toman tintinig. Pasaa, yo ta ugham mulin ghau.
Nugh nugh tau tiwatagh ghom mako na, titai puura leso tikis tamtamon. Eemon tauzi titap tizila. Puugh tau tiraaro pa saghavuuŋ tamtamon na, ene tauzi tighoon ila.
Yoova igabiiz tamtamon ve ighur atuya pazi itaghon ŋgar duduuŋa. Leso itotoi tauu pa tamtamon ve tiwataghi. Liis tau zeran sasaghati tighuru na, iliis tauzi.
Zeran sasaghati ve nugh nugh tau tighur murizi pa Maaron, yes pale tisov timaat gha tizila mateegha niazi.
Eemon yes mbolaaŋa tau tirau gabua eta mako na, Maaron irau loolo iveegh pazi ne mako. Ve yes tau tibadbaad pataŋani ve tighurghur matazi pa uleeŋ to Maaron na, i irau ipul zi tileep saghat le alok ne mako. I pale iuul zi.
Yoova, ughita. Tamtamon sorok to taan tigham aghezi payo. Upul zi tigham taliiŋzizi sov. Utatan zi. Upayooz yes nugh nugh ila yo naghom, ugabiiz zi, ve ughur atuya pazi.
O Yoova, ugham ŋgar eta pazi. Leso tiroi payo, ve tiwatagh tighe yes tamtamon sorok to taan mon. Tapirizi irau ghom mako.
O Yoova, mindai ta uyooz soghan payau ve uul ghau mako? Mindai ta naleep ila pataŋani loolo, ve uyooŋ payau ne?
Zeran sasaghati tipapait tauzi, ve tinanaan yes mbolaaŋa tau tirau gabua eta mako na. Eemon ŋgar toozi saghati tau matazi iŋgali na, ene pale imuul pa tauzi ve ivaghamun zi.
Zeran sasaghati tipakur zi pa ŋgar saghati tau tighamghamu. Monmon tighamgham ŋgar to tigham lezi gabua katini, ve tisiksik saveeŋ sosor pa Yoova, ve tiveleghi.
Zeran sasaghati tawe, tipakur tauzi pa ŋgar toozi. Tauta lolozi pa tiwatagh Maaron mako. Ŋgar toozi iyaryaaŋ tighe: “Maaron irau ighur pataŋani payau mako. Pa Maaron eta ileep mako.”
Ve saawe isov, uraat toozi ilaan poia mon. Tauta tinizi izaa, ve tigham ŋgar pa saawe tau Maaron pale igabiiz zi ve ighur atuya pazi ne mako. Ve matazi veleghin koiazŋa kat.
Ve matazi iŋgal tighe: “Gabua eta irau igham ghei nirur ne mako. Ve pataŋani eta irau ivot payei paam mako. Yei aat nileep poia mon taghon taghon gha ila.”
Saveeŋ sasaghati naol, tomania karom, ve paroiŋ ivotvot ila avozi irau saawe. Saawe tau tisavia ŋgar sasaghati ve pataŋani tau tighe tigham pa tamtamon, ene igham zi lolozi poia kat imin tighan aniiŋ poia.
Yes tiyoŋyooŋ ila nugh ziige, ve tisasaŋan pa tamtamon popoiazi. Tiŋgooz tauzi ve matazi inesnes pa yes tau tirau malmal mako na. Leso tisaghav zi, ve tirav zi timaat.
Yes tiyoŋyooŋ ve tisasaŋan imin laion tau ileep ila su loolo ve maata ivotvot. Tisasaŋan, leso tisaghav yes tau tirau malmal mako na. Ighe tisaghav zi ila puugh toozi, ene tikis zi ve tigherev zi tila.
Tauvene tineneeŋ ve tisasaŋan pa saghavuuŋ zi. Saawe tau ighe eta peria, mako tisaghavu.
Ve matazi iŋgal tighe: “Maaron maata ilam payei mako. Ŋgar tau yei nighamu, ene i irau ighita mako, ve iwataghi mako.”
Oyai, Yoova, uburig utotoi tapirim pazi lak! Maaron tsiei, yes tau tinumeer ghom ve tibadbaad pataŋani na, lolom iveegh pazi sov.
Maaron, mindai ta yo upul zeran sasaghati tivelegh ghom? Yes tisavsaav ila lolozi tighe: “Ŋgar tau yei nighamu ne, Maaron irau ipayooz ghei pa savsaveeŋ mako.”
Eemon Maaron, yo ughita gabua isov tau tighamu na. Ŋgar sasaghati ve pataŋani maata maata tau yes tigham pa tamtamon na, yo uwatagh zi tisov ve igheen ila yo nimam. Pasaa, yes mbolaaŋa tau tirau gabua eta mako na, tighur tauzi ila yo nimam ve tinumeer ghom. Yo taum ta umin uleeŋa pa yes parooŋa.
Ve zeran sasaghati tau tighamgham taliiŋzizi na, urav matin tapirizi. Uyat ŋgar toozi sasaghati. Leso ivot muul sov.
Yoova, i kinik tiina tau ighamgham pooz ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila. Nugh nugh tau tiwataghi mako ve tileep ila taan tooni na, i pale ipasov zi le tisov kat.
O Yoova, yes tau tinumeer ghom ve tibadbaad pataŋani na, yo uwatagh lolozi wa. Yo aat ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz toozi, ve upalot zi.
Yes parooŋa ve yes tau koiazŋa tighur pataŋani pazi na, yo taum uyooz pazi ve uul zi, ve ughur atuya pa koiazŋa. Leso tamtamon sorok to taan tiparoi nugh muul sov.
Yau nanumeer Yoova ve nayooŋ ila tooni. Mindai ta asaav saveeŋ to borauŋa payau aghe: “Ughau uzala pa loloz, imin man tau iroi ve ighau izala na.
Ughita! Zeran sasaghati tiyooŋ ila ndoroom loolo, ve tiyool paneegh toozi, tighur paneegh naatu ila ool, ve tisasaŋan tighe tivanegh yes tau ŋgar duduuŋa igheen ariaaŋ ila lolozi na.”
Oyai, ŋgar ve tutuuŋ naol tau timin puughu pa lepoogh poia na, aazne tamtamon tivaghamunia le isaghat wa. Tauvene ŋeer duduuŋa pale igham mindai?
Eemon Yoova, i ileep iloŋ ila rumei tooni patabuyaaŋ. I kinik to sambam tau ileep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz. Ve maata ighita tamtamon tisov, ve igagabiiz ŋgar toozi.
Yoova igagabiiz tamtamon duduŋazi ve yes sasaghatizi paam. Leso iwatagh ŋgar toozi. Yes tau lolozi pa ŋgar to ravuuŋ tamtamon na, i loolo pazi rigta mako. Ighur koi pazi.
Tauvene i pale igham yav ŋgilaaŋi tomania maet salfa tuntunu tau vaazi saghati na titap tizi, ve tivaghamunia zeran sasaghatizi. Ve igham yaghur tuntunu kat ilam, leso ivaghamun zi. Ene atuya toozi.
Pasaa, Yoova itataghon ŋgar duduuŋa mon. Tauvene i loolo pa yes tau tighamgham ŋgar duduuŋa. Yes tau titaghon ŋgar poia na, ene pale tileep tomania, ve tighita naagho.

O Yoova, uul ghei lak! Pa tamtamon tau lolozi isaghav ghom ariaaŋ ve titaghon eez tsio na, tisov wa. Yes tau avozi onoon na, eta ileep tomani ghei muul mako.
Tamtamon tisov tighamgham karom, ve tisasavia saveeŋ tau le anooŋa mako pa zetazŋa. Yamazi itortoor saveeŋ naol. Saveeŋ tau ivotvot ila avozi, ene poia. Eemon ŋgar tau igheen ila lolozi, ene ite.
Yoova, zeran tau tisasavia saveeŋ ŋgoreeŋ pa tamtamon to tigham lolozi na, upoon avozi. Yes tipapakur tauzi tighe: “Sei ta imin daaba payei ve iŋgin ghei? Yei avomai maata. Saa ŋgar tau ighe nisavia, ene aat tamtamon titaghoni mon.” O Yoova, ugham zi tineneeŋ.
<range>
Tauvene Yoova isaav ighe: “Yes mbolaaŋa tau tirau gabua eta mako, ve yes tau koiazŋa tivaghamun zi na, yau nalooŋ taŋiiz toozi wa. Yes tipasawal pa lepoogh poia. Tauvene aazne, yau aat naburig ve nauul zi. Yau aat nagham mulin zi ila koiazŋa nimazi, ve nauul zi tileep poi.”
Yoova saveeŋ tooni, ene onoon mon. Karom eta igheen ila loolo mako. Saveeŋ tooni, ene imin silva tau tighuru izala yav pai liim ve ru, leso muun ighau pani le iŋgalaaŋ kat. Tauvene iit irau taghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni.
Onoon, aazne zeran sasaghati tipapakur zi ve tilaagh irau nugh nugh. Ve eval tiina tipapait ŋgar saghati. Eemon Yoova, yo matam payei, ve uŋgin ghei nileep poi. Ve uponpoon ghei pa zeran tauvene irau saawe.
<range>

Oyai Yoova, pataŋani tiina tane ikis ghau malau wa. Ŋeez o uul ghau? Pale lolom iveegh payau taghon taghon gha ila? Mindai ta uŋgooz naghom payau? Ŋeez o matam ilam payau muul?
Saawe isov yau naghamgham ŋgar naol pa pataŋani tsiau, mboŋ ve mataaz lolog isaghat naghe nataŋ. Pale koiagŋa tiliiv ghau taghon taghon gha ila? Ŋeez o ulam uul ghau?
Yoova, Maaron tsiau, matam ilam payau, ve ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tsiau tane. Uul ghau ve ugham tapirig ivot muul. Mako pale pataŋani tane itatan ghau gha namaat, ve koiagŋa tipakur tauzi tighe tiliiv ghau. Isaav ighe yau natap ve nagham saghat, ene pale koiagŋa tighita ve tintinizi.
<range>
Eemon yau nanumeer ghom. Pasaa, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi. Yau lolog poia kat. Pasaa, yau nawatagh: Yo pale ugham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau tane. Tauvene yau aat nambou mbouŋ ve napait Yoova eeza. Pasaa, i igham poghani ghau kat.
Yes kankanooŋa tau lolozi iveegh pa Maaron na, tigham ŋgar ila lolozi tighe: “Maaron eta ileep mako.” Zeran tauvene, Maaron loolo pazi mako kat. Pasaa, Ŋgar toozi isaghat wa. Tauta tighamgham ŋgar sasaghati naol. Eta igham ŋgar poia mako.
Yoova ileep izi sambam, ve maata izizi pa tamtamon to taan. I ighe ighita: Toozi eta pale ighilaalo, ma mako? Ve eta izuari ghi leso iwatagh Maaron? Mako.
Tisov tipul eez tooni ve tisaghat wa. Eta igham ŋgar poia mako. Mako le mako kat.
Tauvene Yoova igham ŋgar naol ighe: “Yes tau tinoknok ghamuuŋ ŋgar sasaghati na, lezi ghilalooŋ, ma mako? Ŋeez o ŋgar toozi ivot? Saawe isov, yes titombaan tamtamon tsiau ve tipasov gabua toozi le isov kat, imin yes tau tighan aniiŋ popoia, ve tipasovu. Matazi iŋgal ghau ve tisuŋ payau mako.”
Eemon murei, roiŋ tiina kat pale igham zi. Pasaa, Maaron pale ivool to tamtamon duduŋazi tau titaghon eez tooni.
Yes mbolaaŋa tau tirau gabua eta mako na, yam zeran sasaghati aponpoon eez pazi. Tauta ŋgar toozi le anooŋa mako. Eemon Yoova tauu pale imin lezi niazi to yoŋgaaŋ.
Oyai, Maaron tau ileep izi nugh Zion na iuul yes Israela, ve ipas zi tivot pa pataŋani toozi, o poi! Isaav ighe Yoova iuul tamtamon tooni ve tileep poia muul, ene pale tintinizi. Onoon kat, Yakop paaghu tooni pale lolozi poia le poia kat.
Yoova, sei ta irau ileep tomani ghom ila niam patabuyaaŋ to suŋuuŋ? Ve sei irau ileep izi loloz tsio patabuyaaŋ Zion, ve isuŋ payo?
Tamtamon tau le sosor eta mako, ve laghooŋ tooni poia mon. I ighamgham ŋgar duduuŋa ve isasavia saveeŋ onoon mon toman loolo.
I ivaghamunia tamtamon ezazi mako, ve igham ŋgar saghati eta pa zeetŋa mako. I iŋgal saveeŋ pa toŋvetaz tooni mako, ve isinai zi mako.
Zeran sasaghati tau Maaron ighur muuri pazi na, i paam ighur muuri pazi. Ve yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i ipapait zi. Saa saveeŋ tau i imbua, ene irau loolo iveghaini mako. Ighe ipataŋan pani pa taghoniiŋni, ene poia. Eemon i aat itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni.
Ve isaav ighe zeetŋa tigham bun ila tooni, saawe to tiyatu, yes tiyat maet duduuŋ tau tighamu na. I irau ipoi pa maet geege ite paam izala paavo mako. Ve isaav ighe tamtamon tighe tigholi, leso iŋgal saveeŋ pa yes tau lezi sosor mako, ene i irau iyok pazi mako. Yes tau titaghon ŋgar naol tane, ene aat tiyooz ariaaŋ. Gabua eta irau igham zi tirur ne mako.
O Maaron, umin sigheu payau ve uŋgin ghau naleep poi. Pasaa, yau nanumeer ghom ve nayooŋ ilat tsio.
Yau nasaav pa Yoova: “Yo Tiina tsiau. Isaav ighe naleep soghan payo, ene irau nandeeŋ gabua poia eta mako.”
Tamtamon patabuyaaŋa to Yoova tau tilepleep izi taan, yes popoiazi kat. Isaav ighe naleep tomani zi, yes tigham lolog poia le poia kat.
Eemon zeran tau tibesbees pa maaron karomŋa na, pataŋani naol pale izazaa toozi. Yau irau napaak zi pa watooŋrau toozi mako. Ve avog irau itut maaron toozi ezazi rigta mako.
Yau naghita Yoova naghe i imin taan poia ee tau tipuli payau to naleep ila. Irau nambool pa gabua eta mako. Pasaa, yau naleep ila i niima.
Gabua naol tau yau nagham zi ilat tsio, ene popoiazi mon. Onoon kat, lepoogh tsiau tau Yoova igham payau ne, ene poia kat. Imin naleep ila taan paghuuna ee tau tipuli payau.
Yau napait Yoova pa poia tooni. Pasaa, i ighamgham pooz payau, leso nataghon eez poia. Mboŋ paam, ŋgar tau i ighuru ila lolog ne, itotoi eez payau.
Saawe isov, matag iŋgalŋgal naghe Yoova ileep tomani ghau. I ilepleep ila zigeg tapir ve ipapalot ghau. Tauvene gabua eta irau igham ghau narur ne mako.
Tauta tintinig ve lolog poia kat. Irau naroi mako. Pasaa, yo aat uŋgin ghau naleep poi.
Irau ughur murim payau, ve upul ghau namaat gha nazila mateegha niazi ne mako. Pasaa, yau tamtamon tsio. Lolog isaghav ghom ariaaŋ, ve nataghon eez tsio. Irau upul patag imbuuz ila naal loolo ne mako.
Yo utotoi eez to lepoogh poia payau. Isaav ighe naleep tomani ghom, ene pale lolog poia le poia kat. Ighe naleep ila nimam tapir, ene aat nayamaan poia tsio taghon taghon gha ila.
O Yoova, ulooŋ taŋiiz tsiau tane, ve uul ghau. Upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi ughe yau ŋeer duduŋag. Leso tiwatagh tighe yau nagham sosor eta mako. Yau nasuŋ ghom ila avog uuli mon mako. Nasuŋ ghom toman lolog. Tauvene ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tsiau tane, ve uul ghau.
Yo ughita gabua naol isov, ve yo uwatagh ughe yau nataghon ŋgar tau iduduuŋ ila yo matam. Tauvene uvool tsiau ve upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi ughe yau nagham sosor eta mako.
Yo ugabiiz poghani ghau, ve utoov ghau. Ve ulam utiir ghau pa mboŋ paam. Tauta uwatagh katin lolog. Yo ugabiiz katin ghau, ve ughita ŋgar saghati eta igheen ila lolog mako. Pa ŋgar tsiau iyaryaaŋ naghe avog igham sosor eta sov.
Yau nataghon ŋgar tau zeran siriv tighamghamu ne mako. Pasaa, matag kisin saveeŋ tsio. Tauvene zeran sasaghati tau tighamgham malmal na, yau napaghau taug pa eez toozi.
Saawe isov, nataghon eez tsio mon. Agheg isapir pani rigta mako.
O Maaron, yau nawatagh: Saawe isov, yo uloŋlooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau. Tauvene nataŋ rarai ghom naghe uul ghau. Ughur taliŋam payau, ve ulooŋ aliŋag tane.
Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi. Tauvene ugham uraat ŋgeretazi tintiina to uul ghau. Yes tau tiyooŋ ilat tsio na, nimam tapir aat igham mulin zi ila koiazŋa nimazi, ve tileep poi.
Uŋgin poghani ghau imin yo uŋgin taum matam. Upoon ghau imin tatareek ipagud natŋa.
Pa zeran sasaghati tizuari zi tighe tivaghamun ghau. Koiagŋa tilivutin ghau, ve tighe tirav ghau namaat.
Lolozi isaghatin tamtamon mako. Ve tipapait tauzi ezazi toman aliŋazi tiina.
Yes titaghon ghau tilam gha tilivutin ghau wa. Ve tidaad matazi payau tighe tisik ghau nazi taan.
Yes timin laion tau pitoola ve ighe iraŋgat gabua leso ighani. Yes timin laion paaghu tau iyooŋ ila su loolo ve isasaŋan.
Yoova, uburig urav koiagŋa lak! Uyooz umin sigheu payau, upoon zi, ve utatan tapirizi. Ukas zi pa mbuzaagh tsio, ve ugham mulin ghau pa zeran sasaghati tane. Leso naleep poi.
Zeran tawe tigham ŋgar tighe gabua to taan, ene gabua tauu. Utotoi nimam pazi, ve ugham mulin ghau ila nimazi. Atuya tau yo ughe ugham pazi na, upasovu pataghaaŋ. Leso tiyamaana kat! Ve ugham tauvene pa natuzŋa ve iseeŋga ila izaa to timbuzŋa paam.
Eemon yau ŋeer duduŋag. Tauvene yau aat naghita naghom. Saawe tau naburig, yau aat naleep ila yo naghom, ve nayamaan naghe: Aa, gabua ta nazuari ghau pani, tauta naghamu wa!

O Yoova, yau lolog igheen tsio kat, ve naghamgham tapirig ilat tsio.
Yoova iponpoon ghau pa koiagŋa imin maetaaz tau izala kat. Ve i imin ruum ariaaŋa pa nayooŋ ila loolo. Saawe isov, i ighamgham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau. Maaron tsiau iponpoon ghau pa zaab imin maet tintiina, ve yau nayoŋyooŋ ila tooni. I imin sigheu payau, ve i Uleeŋa tsiau ariaaŋa. I imin didiiŋ ariaaŋa tau ilivut ghau.
Iit aat tapait Yoova eeza! Yau napoii pa uleeŋ, ve i igham mulin ghau ila koiagŋa nimazi.
Liis to mateegh, rigmon kanaŋ iliis ghau. Pataŋani naol titatan ghau imin dibom tintiina tipol izala pavog.
Ve ravraav ariaaŋa to mateegh ikaukau ghau, ve rigmon kanaŋ igherev ghau nazila mateegha niazi. Tauvene liis to mateegh, naghita igheen ila naghog.
Saawe tau naleep ila pataŋani tawe loolo, yau napoi Yoova pa uleeŋ. Nataŋ rarai Maaron tsiau naghe ilam iuul ghau. Taŋiiz tsiau iŋaruini, ve ighur taliiŋa pani. I ileep ila rumei tooni loolo, ve ilooŋ aliŋag.
Tauvene igham yogyoog itok taan le taan katkatia, ve loloz tisov pughuzi irur paam. Pasaa, i aate yavyav kat.
Mbuas ivot pa uuzu puura, ve yav yaama tomania ŋgilaaŋi ivot pa aavo, ve ighan suvinia gabua.
Ra sambam saamba ikaak, ve i iyooz izala taitai gabgabuai, ve izilam.
I ileep izala aŋela tooni ariaaŋa nduume, ve iroov ilam. Yaghur ibaado, ve ikaleel gha ilam.
I ipoon tauu pa ndoroom, leso imin le niia to yoŋgaaŋ. Taitai gabgabuai ikauu, ve iŋgooz tauu ila loolo.
I ileep ta sewe toman mbonari tiina, ve igham nugh ighani milmilia. Tauta lalaav iŋgalŋgal izi, ve ais paatu paatu tomania yav ŋgilaaŋi titaptap tizi pa taan.
Yoova ileep izi sambam, ve isaav toman aliiŋa tiina kat, imin lalaav luutu. Maaron Tiina Tau Iliiv Zimaronŋa Tisov na aliiŋa ivot. Ve yav ŋgilaaŋi tomania ais paatu titaptap tizi.
I igham lalaav iŋgal koiŋa imin paneegh natŋa tooni. Tauta roiŋ tiina igham zi, ve tighawaar mbiriis.
Yoova, saawe tau yo utotoi aatyavyav tsio pazi, yaghur tiina ivot pa uzum, ve ivuvuur te ila soghan, le sausau ivot ighazooŋ. Ve taan puughu tau igheen izila siiŋa kat na ivot peria. Gabua eta ipoona muul mako.
Ra Yoova ileep saaŋa, ve izuzuun niima izilam ikis ghau, ve indai ghau nazaa pa mazavan belbeluuŋa loolo.
Koiagŋa tapirizi tiina, ve yau narau zi mako. Yes tighur koi payau kat. Eemon Yoova iuul ghau, ve ipas ghau ila nimazi.
Saawe tau naleep ila pataŋani loolo, yes tipaburigin malmal payau. Eemon Yoova ipoon ghau ve ipalot ghau.
I ipas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau, ve ighur ghau nala naleep izi nugh poia. Pasaa, i loolo payau kat. Tauta igham mulin ghau ve naleep poi.
Yau nataghon ŋgar tau iduduuŋ ila Yoova maata. Tauta i loolo payau ve igham poghani ghau. Nimag igham sosor eta mako. Tauta i igham leg atuya poia.
Pasaa, saawe isov, yau nataghon eez to Yoova. Irau nagham ŋgar saghati ve naghur murig pa Maaron tsiau ne mako.
Pasaa, matag kisin tutuuŋ tooni tisov. Tutuuŋ tooni tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, naghur murig pazi mako.
Tauta leg sosor eta ila i maata mako. Yau naŋgin taug poi, tauta nagham gabua eta isosor mako.
Yau naghamgham ŋgar duduuŋa ve ŋgar ŋgalaaŋa mon ila Yoova maata. Tauta i loolo payau ve igham leg atuya poia.
Yoova, isaav ighe tamtamon eta loolo isaghav ghom ariaaŋ ve itaghon eez tsio, yo pale lolom isaghavu paam ve uule irau saawe. Tamtamon tau ighe le sosor eta mako ve ŋgar tooni isov popoia mon, ene pale yo upamuul ŋgar poia pani paam.
Ve isaav ighe ŋeer eta ighamgham ŋgar ŋgalaaŋa mon, ene pale yo paam ugham ŋgar ŋgalaaŋa pani. Eemon yes tau lezi ŋgar tiina pa ghamuuŋ karom ve ŋgar saghati, na yo lem eez naol to uyat ŋgar toozi tawe.
Tamtamon tau titatan tauzi na, yo ughamgham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi. Eemon yes tau tipapait tauzi ve tivelegh ghom na, yo utatan zi tizi timin kaut sorok.
Yoova, Maaron tsiau, yo ugham ghazooŋa tsio isul ghau, ve uziir ndoroom ighau payau, leso naleep poi.
Yo upapalot ghau. Tauta yau irau naparav tomania koiagŋa le naliiv zi. Maaron tsiau ilepleep tomani ghau. Tauvene yau irau nayaat maloŋon didiiŋ ariaaŋa tau ilivut koiagŋa nugh toozi, ve naloŋ nala.
Maaron eez tooni, ene poia le poia kat. Ve saveeŋ tooni, ene onoon mon. Irau taghur ila kat. Tamtamon tisov tau tiyooŋ ila tooni na, i imin sigheu pazi.
Yoova mon ta Maaron tauu. Ite paam mako. I mon ta iponpoon ghiit imin maet tiina.
I ipapalot ghau pa tauu tapiri, tauta nayooz tuŋia. Ve i iŋginŋgin ghau pa laghooŋ tsiau, ve itotoi eez payau.
I igham agheg tuŋia ila taan, ve nalaan ariaaŋ imin mekmek sagsag. Tauvene saawe tau nalaagh ila nugh sapsapu, irau agheg pusukia ve natap mako.
I itotoi ŋgar to ghamuuŋ malmal payau, ve ipalot nimag. Tauta yau irau nadaad paneegh ariaaŋa tau tigharaata pa mbaras.
Yoova, yo umin sigheu payau, ve ugham mulin ghau ila koiagŋa nimazi. Ve nimam tapir, tauta ipapalot ghau. Yo uluul ghau, tauta ezag imin tiina.
Yo ugharaat poghania agheg niia. Tauta agheg pusukia mako, ve nayooz tuŋia pa ghamuuŋ malmal.
Yau nalaan taghon koiagŋa nala le nazaa toozi. Ve naravuur zi le tisov kat. Eta ileep muul mako.
Yau narav zi le tisov titaptap tizi agheg puughu. Eta irau iburig muul to igham malmal payau ne mako.
Pasaa, yo upapalot ghau pa taum tapirim. Tauta nayooz ariaaŋ pa malmal. Yo ughur koiagŋa tila nimag ve naliiv zi.
Yo ugham zi titoor zi, ve tighau tila. Yes tau tighur koi payau ne, yau napasov zi le tisov kat.
Yes tipoi pa uleeŋ. Eemon eta iuul zi mako. Taŋiiz toozi iŋarui Yoova paam. Eemon i ilooŋ zi mako.
Yau narav mbirisai zi, le timin ŋgaupup tau yaghur ivuvuura gha ilale. Ve navaghaaz zi imin tiiŋ tau igheen ila eeze.
Saawe tau tamtamon tiburig ve tizoor aliŋag, yo uvool tsiau, ve ugham mulin ghau ila nimazi. Ve ughur ghau namin daaba pa nugh nugh. Tamtamon to taan siriv tau yau nawatagh zi mako na, aazne tileep ila sambag ve tibesbees payau.
Ighe tilooŋ aliŋag, ene rekia mon ve titaghoni. Nugh nugh tilam ve tiput aghezi payau toman roiŋ tiina.
Pasaa, tighilaal tighe tirau gabua eta mako. Tauvene roiŋ tiina igham zi, ve tipul ruum toozi ariaŋazi tau tiyoŋyooŋ ila lolozi na, ve tilam tsiau.
Onoon kat, Yoova ilepleep! I iponpoon ghau imin maet tiina. I Uleeŋa tsiau. Tauvene yau napakuru ve napait eeza.
I ivool tsiau, ve iyat ŋgar sasaghati tau koiagŋa tigham payau na. Ve ighur nughmariŋ tileep ila yau sambag.
I ipas ghau ila koiagŋa nimazi, ve iuul ghau le naliiv zi. I igham mulin ghau ila yes tau tiliŋliŋ siŋ pa tamtamon na nimazi.
Tauvene Yoova, yau aat nayoor ezam ila tamtamon to nugh nugh sosozi, ve nambou to napait ghom.
Yoova iuluul yes tau i ighur zi timin kinik. Tauta tilivliiv malmal tintiina. I tauu ighur David to igham pooz. Tauvene loolo isaghavu, ve pale ighur poia tooni izazaa to David tomania paaghu tooni taghon taghon gha ila.

Gabua naol isov tau tighenaar ila sambam saamba na titotoi ghiit tighe Maaron eeza tiina. Gabua ta saaŋa we, ene i niima muuri. Tauta titotoi Maaron tapiri tomania ŋgar ve poia tooni pait.
Mataaz ta naol ne, tisavsaav pait. Ve mboŋ ta naol ne, tipaghazoŋai ghiit pa ŋgar tooni.
Yes lezi avozi to tisavsaav mako. Irau talooŋ avozi luutu mako.
Eemon aliŋazi ila irau taan isov. Saveeŋ toozi ila irau taan ziige ta naol ne. Maaron ighur aaz le niia ila sambam saamba to igheen pani.
Aaz pisikia izaa imin ŋeer tau ivai paaghu, ve ipul ruum tooni ve ivot toman tintini. Ve imin tamtamon to landooŋ tau igharaat ghi to ilaan toman loolo poia.
Aaz izaa pa taan ziige ee, ve imalaaŋ ila izi pa ziige ite. Ve gabua eta irau iyooŋ pa maata ne mako.
Saveeŋ isov tau Yoova igham pait, ene poia kat ve iduduuŋ mon. Ve ipariaaŋ ghiit ve igham tapiriin ivot muul. Eez tau Yoova ighuru pa tamtamon tooni na, igheen tuŋia tauvene. Irau itoora muul mako. Ve ipaghazoŋai yes tau lezi ŋgar tiina mako na, le ŋgar toozi ivot.
Tutuuŋ naol tau Yoova ighur zi pait, ene duduŋazi mon, ve tigham ghiit loloon poia kat. Tutuuŋ to Yoova imin ghazooŋa pait, ve igham ghiit taghilaal.
Ŋgar to taroi pa Yoova ve tataghon ŋgar tooni, ene poia. Ŋgar tauvene, ene iŋgalaaŋ ila i maata, ve igheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Ve gabizooŋ to Yoova, ene iduduuŋ ve onoon mon.
Tamtamon tighita maet gol tighe ene gabua tiina, ve lolozi pani. Eemon Yoova saveeŋ tooni iliiv kat pa gol katini tau ŋgalaŋazi na. Ve tok suuru tauvene paam, poia ve imonmoon ila avoon. Eemon Yoova saveeŋ tooni, ene poia kat le iliiv tok suuru.
Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Saveeŋ tsio ipaghau ghau pa pataŋani naol. Yes tau titaghon saveeŋ tsio, ene aat tigham lezi atuya tiina.
Sei irau ighilaal sosor tooni isov? Mako. O Yoova, sosor naol tau naghilaal zi mako ve nagham zi na, lolom isaghatin ghau ve upul zi.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Sosor tau naghilaal zi na, upaghau ghau pazi. Pa lolog pa ŋgar tauvene igham pooz payau mako. Leso nagham sosor tiina eta sov, ve ŋgar tsiau iduduuŋ ila yo matam.
Tauvene yau naghe le saveeŋ tau ivot ila avog, ve ŋgar tau igheen ila lolog ne, isov iduduuŋ ila yo matam, ve igham ghom lolom poia. O Yoova, yo Uleeŋa tsiau ve uponpoon ghau imin maet tiina.

Saawe tau ighe yo uleep ila pataŋani loolo, Yoova pale ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tsio ve iuul ghom. Maaron to Yakop, i eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni. I pale imin sigheu payo ve iŋgin ghom uleep poi.
Maaron ileep ila rumei tooni patabuyaaŋ izi loloz Zion. I pale iuul ghom ve ipalot ghom.
I aat maata iŋgal watooŋrau tsio tisov. Irau loolo iveegh pazi mako. Watooŋrau tsio tau yav ighan dodolin zi, ene tighamu loolo poia.
Ve gabua tau yo lolom pani na, i aat igham payo. Ve ŋgar isov tau lolom ighur ughe ugham zi na, i pale igham anooŋa ivot.
Murei, saawe tau yo uliiv koiamŋa, yei pale lolomai poia kat ve nisir. Pale nigham pilak tsiei ve nisik zi ilala ilamlam, ve nipait Maaron toit eeza toman tintinmai. Gabua naol isov tau yo ughason Yoova pani na, i pale ilooŋ ghom ve igham payo.
Ŋgarig gha nawatagh: Yoova pale iuul kinik tau i tauu ighuru pa uraat na. I pale ileep izi nugh tooni patabuyaaŋ sambam, ve ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tooni, ve ipaloti pa tauu tapiri. Leso iliiv koiŋa tisov.
Zeran siriv tinumeer karis toozi to malmal, ve siriv tipakur zi pa hos toozi. Eemon yei ninumeer Maaron tsiei Yoova. I eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni.
Tauvene koiamaiŋa pale aghezi pusukia ve titaptap. Eemon yei pale niburig ve niyooz tuŋia pa malmal.
O Yoova, ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz tsiei tane, ve uul kinik tsiei. Leso iliiv koiŋa.

O Yoova, kinik tsiei loolo poia kat. Pasaa, yo upaloti pa taum tapirim. Yo uule pa malmal le iliiv koiŋa. Tauta tintini kat.
Gabua tau i loolo pani ve ighason ghom pani na, yo uŋguruuta mako. Yo ugham pani wa.
Yo ula uvot tooni, ve upakuru pa gabua popoia naol. Ve ughur moghar ndamoonda milmilia izala daaba. Moghar tawe, tigharaata pa gol tau poia kat.
I ighason ghom to uŋgini poi ila saawe to malmal, leso imaat sov, ve ileep poia taghon taghon gha ila. Ve yo ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tooni.
Yo uule gha iliiv malmal, tauta eeza ivot imin tiina. Ve upaboode pa tapirim ve poia tsio. Tauta vaaru ilaan irau nugh nugh, ve tamtamon tipaiti tighe i eeza tiina kat.
Onoon kat, poia tsio pale izazaa tooni taghon taghon gha ila. Ve yo uleep tomania. Tauta loolo poia le poia kat.
Kinik tsiei inumeer Yoova. Tauvene gabua eta irau ighamu itap ne mako. Pasaa, Maaron Tiina Tau Iliiv Zimaronŋa Tisov na, loolo isaghavu ariaaŋ, ve iuluule itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni.
O kinik, nimam pale ikisiir koiamŋa tisov. Yes tau tighur koi payo na, nimam tapir pale isaghav zi.
Saawe tau utotoi tapirim ivot ighazooŋ, yo pale uvaghamun zi kat imin yav tiina ighan gabua. Onoon kat, aatyavyav to Yoova pale izaa toozi, ve yav tooni ighaniir zi.
Natuzŋa paam, yo pale uravuur zi, ve upasov zi pa taan. Tauvene murei, paaghu toozi eta irau ileep muul mako.
Onoon, yes tiil eez payo, ve timbu saveeŋ tighe tivaghamun ghom. Eemon ŋgar toozi saghati tawe irau ighur anooŋa mako.
Saawe tau tighita yo ughur paneegh naatu iŋarui zi, yes pale tiroi ve tighau tila.
Yoova, uburig ve utotoi tapirim ivot ighazooŋ. Leso nimbou ve nipait ezam pa tapirim.

Maaron tsiau, Maaron tsiau, puughu mindai ta ughur murim payau? Pataŋani tsiau igham ghau nataŋ tiina. Puughu mindai ta yo uul ghau mako, ve uleep soghan payau?
Maaron tsiau, mataaz ta naol ne, nataŋ rarai ghom. Eemon yo usavia leg saveeŋ eta mako. Ve mboŋ tauvene paam. Namariau mako. Nanoknok taŋiiz.
Eemon Maaron, yau nawatagh: Yo patabuyaaŋ. Yo uleep ila niam to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve yes Israela tipapait ghom.
Muuŋ ve ilam, timbumaiŋa tinumeer ghom. Yes tighur ilat tsio, ve yo upas zi tivot pa pataŋani toozi.
Saawe tau titaŋ rarai ghom, yo ugham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi. Yes tinumeer ghom, ve yo uul zi. Tauvene tighur matazi payo sorok mako.
Eemon yau, tamtamon tighit ghau tighe yau tamtamon mako. Matazi tatanin ghau, ve tivelegh ghau tighe yau kaut sorok imin motmoot to taan lolo.
Tamtamon tisov tau tighit ghau ne, titurun luazi payau ve tighe: ‘Aa, ughita wa?” Ve tiŋiŋ payau, ve tisik saveeŋ veleghiiŋ naol payau.
Tisavsaav payau tighe: “Yo ughe unumeer Yoova? Poia. Ighe tauvene, o taleep ve taghita. Isaav ighe i loolo payo kat, i aat iuul ghom, ve igham mulin ghom pa pataŋani tsio.”
Eemon Yoova, yo ta ughur ghau navot poi ila tinaŋ aapo. Ve saawe tau naghunghun tuz, yo urarar payau poi.
Saawe tau tinaŋ ipoop ghau, tighur ghau nalat namin yo lem, leso uŋgin ghau. Tauta saawe tawe ve ilam, yau nanumeer ghom naghe yo Maaron tsiau.
Tauvene uleep soghan payau sov. Pa aazne, pataŋani tiina ighe ivot payau. Ve leg tamtamon eta to iuul ghau mako.
Ughita. Koiagŋa katini tilam tilivutin ghau. Tapirizi tiina imin makau zitamoot to Basan tau bide tapirizi na.
Yes timin laion tau tikakaak avozi ve livozi imasis ilam payau. Ve lolozi ŋuria tighe tiraŋgat ghau ve tighan ghau.
Tauvene tapirig isov kat, imin yaa tau igheen ila uur loolo ve tiliŋi ilale. Tuag tisov goloŋia. Tauvene nayamaan taug naghe irau nagham gabua eta mako. Ve roiŋ tiina igham ghau ve lolog imin waar mbuaaŋ. Naghe paita namaat tane.
Ŋgarsuag igorgor kat. Yo upul ghau ve nagheen ila ŋgaupup loolo ve naghe paita namaat tane.
Koiagŋa katini tilam tilivutin ghau imin ŋgavuun umbaal ve tivaraŋgatin agheg ma nimag.
Ve tuag isov peria. Tauvene koiagŋa tiyooz ve timarar ghau, ve lolozi poia kat. Pasaa, nasaghat wa.
Yes tighe pa namaat wa. Tauta tighe tivalagh nonoghiiŋa tsiau tomania gabua tsiau siriv irau zi. Tauvene tipayooz mbuur, leso tighita sei ta pale igham saa gabua.
Yoova, uleep soghan payau sov. Uleeŋa tsiau, ulam rekia ve uul ghau!
Upoon ghau pa mbuzaagh to mateegh. Upaghau ghau pa ŋgavuun sasaghati tane. Mako pale tivaghamun ghau.
Ugham mulin ghau pa laion tane aavo, ve upasali ghau pa makau sagsagŋa tane zoŋazi. Aa, ŋgarig gha naghita naghe yo ulooŋ ghau!
Tauvene yau aat navotia gabua tau yo ugham payau ne pa zetagŋa. Saawe tau tamtamon tsio tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ, yau aat nala tomani zi ve nayoor ezam.
Yam tau aroi pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar tooni na, apakuru. Yam siŋ to Yakop, apait Yoova eeza pa tapiri ve poia tooni. Yam Israela asov, aroron ve aroi pani.
Pa yes tau tibadbaad pataŋani ve tighur matazi pa Yoova na, i irau ighita pataŋani toozi imin kaut sorok ne mako. Pale iuul zi. Irau ivelegh zi, ma ighur muuri pazi ne mako. Tauvene saawe tau titaŋ raraini pa lezi uleeŋ, i aat ilooŋ taŋiiz toozi ve iuul zi.
Yoova, isaav ighe tamtamon tsio tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ tiina, yau aat nayoor ezam ila naghozi, ve napait ghom pa ŋgar tau yo ugham payau na. Yau pale nataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsiau, ve nagham watooŋrau payo ila yes tau tiroi payo ve titaghon ŋgar tsio na matazi.
Watooŋrau tau nagham pa paitooŋ Yoova na, yes mbolaaŋa pale tighan sirivu, le apozi isuŋ. Ve yes tau tizuari zi pa Yoova na, pale tipaiti. I tauu pale igham poghani zi ve tileep poia taghon taghon gha ila.
Tamtamon irau taan ziige ta naol ne pale matazi iŋgal Yoova, ve titoor ŋgar toozi imuul ila pani. Nughmariŋ pale tisov tiput aghezi pani ve tipaiti.
Pasaa, Yoova, i kinik tiina. I iŋgin tamtamon tisov to taan, ve ighamgham pooz pazi.
Tauvene kuaz puughu to taan tau tipapakur tauzi na, pale tisov tiput aghezi pani ve tipaiti. Ve ila ila le yes tau tigharau tighe timaat ve timin ŋgaupup na, yes paam pale tiput aghezi pani ve tipaiti.
Paaghu toit pale tibees pa Yoova. Yes tau tivot murei na, pale tilooŋ Yoova vaaru.
Yes tau tipoop zi murei na, ene pale tisavia ŋgar duduuŋa to Yoova pazi, ve tipaes pazi pa eez tau i igham mulin tamtamon tooni.
Yoova, i ŋginiiŋ tsiau poia. Irau nambool pa gabua eta mako.
I ighegherev ghau nala pa kikiliiŋ popoia tau igheen yaa naliu ziige na. Leso naghan, naghun yaa luuma, ve namariau.
I igham tapirig ivot muul, ve ipaduduuŋ ghau le nataghon eez tau iduduuŋ ila i maata. Leso ipaghazoŋai eeza tiina ivot ighazooŋ.
Yoova, ighe nalaagh ila nugh sapsapu to mateegh, ve ndoroom tiina ikau ghau, ene irau naroi mako. Pasaa, yo uleep tomani ghau. Yau naghit ghom ukis zaab tsio tomania titi to upaduduuŋ sipsip pani, tauvene ateg izi.
Yau nalam namin loom payo, ve yo upakur ghau kat. Yo ugham marewaaŋ tiina payau ila koiagŋa matazi. Ve uliŋ ŋgoreeŋ izala dabag, ve ugham poghani ghau kat.
Onoon kat, saawe isov tau naleep izi taan, yo lolom isaghav ghau, ve poia tsio izazaa tsiau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio. Rumei tsio aat imin niag to lepoogh le irau saawe tsiau isov.
Taan tomania gabua naol isov tau tileep ve tigheen ila, ene to Yoova. Nugh tisov tomania tamtamon tau tilepaar ila, ene i tooni mon.
Pasaa, i ta ighur taan ipot izala te paavo. Ve ipariaaŋ taan puughu igheen tuŋia izila te loolo ta siiŋa geeg.
Sei irau izala loloz to Yoova ve isuŋ pani? Ve sei irau iloŋ ila rumei tooni patabuyaaŋ ve iyooz ila i naagho?
Tamtamon tauvene: I igham sosor eta mako. Ve ŋgar isov tau igheen ila loolo na, ene iŋgalaaŋ mon. I ipait maaron karomŋa mako, ve iwaat Maaron eeza sorok to ipalot saveeŋ karom mako.
Tamtamon tauvene, poia to Yoova aat izaa tooni. Maaron tau Uleeŋa tooni na, pale igham mulini ve ileep poi, ve ipaghazoŋaini ighe i ŋeer duduuŋa.
Zeran tauvene tizuari zi pa Maaron. Yes tighe tila tivot to Maaron to Yakop naagho, ve tisuŋ pani.
O yam ataman, akaak ve tinimim izaa. Yam ataman to muuŋ geeg, tinimim izaa, ve akaak le akaak kat. Leso sooso irau kinik tau eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni na itaghoni iloŋ ila.
Laak, kinik tau eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni na, ene sei? Ene Yoova. I saksaki, ve tapiri tiina. Ve i irau kat pa ghamuuŋ malmal.
O yam ataman, akaak ve tinimim izaa. Yam ataman to muuŋ geeg, tinimim izaa, ve akaak le akaak kat. Leso sooso irau kinik tau eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni na itaghoni iloŋ ila.
Laak, kinik tau eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni na, ene sei? Ene Yoova. I Maaron saksaki, ve iŋgin gabua naol isov. Onoon kat, i kinik tau eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni.
O Yoova, naghur taug nalat tsio, ve nasuŋ payo.
Maaron tsiau, yau nanumeer ghom. Upul koiagŋa titatan ghau sov. Pale tipakur zi tighe tiliiv ghau, ve tigham ghau mayag.
Tamtamon tisov tau tisaŋan ghom pa uleeŋ na, irau tighur matazi payo sorok ve mayazi ne mako. Eemon yes tau tighur murizi payo na, yes pale mayazi.
Yoova, utotoi eez tsio payau. Upaghazoŋai ŋgar tsiau pani, leso nataghon duduŋaini.
Ugham pooz payau, leso laghooŋ tsiau iduduuŋ pa saveeŋ tsio. Ve upaghazoŋai ghau pa ŋgar tsio. Pasaa, yo Maaron tsiau ve Uleeŋa tsiau. Mboŋoozo ila le ravrav izi, yau naghurghur matag payo.
Yoova, muuŋ ve ilam, yo lolom isaghatin tamtamon ve uluul zi. Ve lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve poia tsio izazaa toozi. Matam iŋgal ŋgar tsio tana.
Sosor ve ŋgar to taliiŋzizi tau yau kukuag ve naghamgham zi na, matam iŋgal zi sov. Yoova, yo poiam, ve lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio. Tauvene matam iŋgal ghau ve uul ghau!
Yoova ŋgar tooni, ene poia ve iduduuŋ mon. Tauvene zeran tau tisapir pa ŋgar tooni na, i ipapaduduuŋ zi pa eez tooni.
Ve yes tau titatan tauzi ve tinumeer Maaron mon na, i ighegherev zi ve itotoi eez tooni pazi, leso titaghon ŋgar duduuŋa.
Yes tau matazi kisin saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toozi tomania Yoova, ve titaghon eez tau i ighuru pa tamtamon tooni na, i loolo isaghav zi ariaaŋ ve iuluul zi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni.
O Yoova, yau nagham sosor katini kat. Eemon yo ezam tiina pa ŋgar tsio tau lolom isasaghatin yei tamtamon. Tauvene ureu sosor tsiau.
Tamtamon tisov tau tiroi pa Yoova ve tighe titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i pale itotoi eez pazi. Leso tiwatagh eez sindei tau yes aat titaghoni.
Zeran tauvene, lepoogh toozi pale poia kat. Ve natuzŋa paam, pale tileep poia izi taan tau Yoova igham pa tamtamon tooni.
Yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, timin i zeetŋa duduuŋ. Tauvene i ivovotia ŋgar tooni yoŋgaaŋa pazi, ve ipaghazoŋai zi pa eez to yesŋa tivalupu zi timin eemon itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni.
Saawe isov, yau naghurghur matag pa Yoova naghe i aat iuul ghau. I pale ipas agheg pa liis tau koiagŋa tighuru payau ne.
Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Tauvene matam imuul ilam payau. Lolom isaghatin ghau, ve uul ghau pa pataŋani tsiau. Pa yau zigau kat. Leg etag eta to iuul ghau pa pataŋani tsiau tane mako.
Lolog ipataŋan kat ve nagham ŋgar naol. Pasaa, yau leg eez eta mako. Upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau tane loolo.
Ughita pataŋani ve saghatiiŋ tiina tau ivot payau ne, ve uul ghau. Ve ureu sosor tsiau tisov tilalez.
Ughita. Koiagŋa, yes eval. Ve atezi yavyav payau kat. Tighe le tivaghamun ghau.
Eemon yau nanumeer ghom naghe yo aat ugham mulin ghau ila koiagŋa nimazi, ve uŋgin ghau naleep poi. Yau nayooŋ ilat tsio. Tauvene upul zi tiliiv ghau sov. Ighe mako, pale mayag.
Yoova, ŋgar tsiau iyaryaaŋ naghe nataghon ŋgar popoia tau iduduuŋ mon ila yo matam. Tauvene yo aat upoon ghau pa gabua sasaghati ta naol ne. Pasaa, yau naghurghur matag pa uleeŋ tsio.
O Maaron, upas tamtamon tsio Israel tivot pa pataŋani toozi naol isov.
O Yoova, yau naghe yo upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi ughe yau ŋeer duduŋag. Pasaa, laghooŋ tsiau, yau nataghon ŋgar duduuŋa mon. Ve naghur ilat tsio ariaaŋ. Lolog ruru payo mako.
Yoova, ugabiiz ghau, ve utoov ghau. Utiir poghania lolog ve ŋgar tsiau, ve ughita: Naduduuŋ ila yo matam, ma mako?
Monmon matag iŋgalŋgal ŋgar tsio tau lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi. Yo utaghon saveeŋ tsio irau saawe. Gabuam tana ipapalot ghau pa laghooŋ tsiau, tauta nataghon eez tsio.
Yau yeŋa zeran karomŋa niluplup ghei mako. Yes tau tipamir tauzi pa ghuruuŋ ila toozi na, yau napaak zi mako.
Yau naghur koi pa yes tau tighamgham ŋgar sasaghati, ve naleep soghan pazi. Isaav ighe zeran sasaghati tilup zi, ene irau naleep tomani zi mako.
O Yoova, yau nataghon ŋgar duduuŋa mon. Tauta namin nimag, leso itotoi ighe yau leg sosor eta mako. Ve nalaagh livutin artaal tau tighamgham watooŋrau payo izala na, ve nasuŋsuŋ payo.
Yau aat nambou mbouŋ toman lolog poia ve napait ghom, ve navotia uraat tsio ŋgeretazi tau maata ite kat na.
Yoova, yau lolog pa rumei tsio kat. Pa ene niam to lepoogh. Yo utotoi tapirim ve mbonarim tomania poia tsio ivotvot ta sewe.
Yes tau tisosor pa eez tsio na, upasov ghau tomani zi sov. Ve yes tau tiliŋliŋ siŋ pa tamtamon na, urav ghau namaat tomani zi sov.
Zeran tauvene, nimazi igharghaar pa ghamuuŋ ŋgar sasaghati naol. Ve isaav ighe tighol zi to tigham ŋgar saghati eta, ene aat tiyok mon ve tighamu.
Eemon laghooŋ tsiau, yau nataghon ŋgar duduuŋa mon. O Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Lolom isaghatin ghau ve ugham mulin ghau.
Yau nayooz tuŋia ila taan duduuŋa. Irau natap mako. Tauvene saawe tau tamtamon tsio tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ, yau aat nala tomani zi, ve napait ghom pa poia tsio.
Yoova imin ghazooŋa payau, ve i Uleeŋa tsiau. Pale naroi pa sei? Mako. Pasaa, yau nanumeer Yoova. I imin ruum ariaaŋa to nayooŋ ila loolo. Tauta naroi pa gabua eta mako.
Isaav ighe zeran sasaghati tipaburigin malmal payau, ve koiagŋa tighe tikari ghau, ene pale Yoova igham aghezi ilot, ve titap.
Isaav ighe zaaba katini tilam tilivutin ghau to tigham malmal, ene irau lolog bubu ve naroi pazi mako. Isaav ighe malmal iburig ve koiagŋa tiŋarui ghau tilam, yau aat nanumeer Maaron ve nayooz ariaaŋ.
Gabua eemon geeg ta yau lolog pani kat. Tauta naghe naghason Yoova pani. Saawe isov tau naleep izi taan, yau naghe le naleep toman Yoova ila rumei tooni loolo, ve naghita poia tooni. Yau naghe naleep ila rumei tooni loolo, leso naghasoni to itotoi tauu ve ŋgar tooni payau.
Isaav ighe pataŋani tiina eta ivot payau, i aat iŋgin ghau naleep poi ila niima saamba. I pale iŋgooz ghau ila rumei tooni loolo. Ve i pale isur ghau nazala maetaaz ta saaŋa we, leso koiagŋa tigham gabua eta payau sov.
Onoon, aazne, koiagŋa timeke tilam tilivutin ghau. Eemon naroi mako. Pasaa, Yoova pale iuul ghau ve naliiv zi. Tauvene nayoor eeza toman tintinig. Nagham watooŋrau pani ila rumei tooni loolo, ve nambou ve narav gita to napait eeza.
Yoova, ighe nataŋ rarai ghom pa uleeŋ, na ulooŋ taŋiiz tsiau. Lolom isaghatin ghau ve uul ghau. Pa yau besooŋa tsio.
Yo usaav payau ughe: “Ulam usuŋ payau, leso natotoi taug payo.” Tauta lolog naghe nalat tsio, ve upatooŋ taum payau.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Uŋgooz naghom payau sov. Atem yavyav ve umbuzir payau sov. Maaron, muuŋ ve ilam, yo mon ta Uleeŋa tsiau. Tauvene upul ghau, ve ughur murim payau sov.
Isaav ighe tamaŋ ve tinaŋ tighur murizi payau, ene pale Yoova tauu igham ghau ve iŋgin ghau.
Yoova, upaghazoŋai ghau pa eez tsio. Umuuŋ payau ve utotoi ghau pa eez duduuŋa. Pa koiagŋa katini tisasaŋan ghau.
Upul ghau nala nimazi sov! Pa yes tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ karom naol payau, ve tighamgham saveeŋ paroiŋ payau.
Eemon yau naghur ila naghe yes irau tivaghamun ghau mako. Yau aat naleep matag yaryaare, ve naghita poia to Yoova.
Tauvene yo tau ughur ila to Yoova na, yau nasaav payo naghe: “Unumeer Yoova, ve ughur matam pani. Uroi sov. Lolom eemon, uyooz ariaaŋ, ve usaŋan pa uleeŋ tooni.”
Yoova, yo uponpoon ghau pa koiagŋa imin maet tiina. Tauvene taŋiiz tsiau ilat payo. Ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tsiau tane ve uul ghau lak! Ighe ulooŋ ghau mako, ve uneneeŋ mon, ene pale namin yes tau timaat gha tizila puura to yes mateegha.
Aazne, yau nait nimag izaa iŋarui rumei tsio loolo tau patabuyaaŋ kat na, ve nataŋ rarai ghom pa uleeŋ. Ulooŋ taŋiiz tsiau tane ve lolom isaghatin ghau. Pa yau besooŋa tsio.
Saawe tau yo ughur atuya pa zeran sasaghati, na ugherev ghau nala tomani zi sov. Yes tau tinoknok ghamuuŋ sosor na, nalaleg tomani zi sov. Zeran tawe tisasavia saveeŋ poia pa zetazŋa tighe lolozi pazi. Eemon ŋgar tau igheen ila lolozi na, ene ite. Tighe tivaghamun zi.
Yes tikaria ghamuuŋ sosor wa. Tauvene ughur atuya pazi ve uŋgal matazi. Leso uyat ŋgar toozi saghati tawe. Ugham tauvene, o iduduuŋ. Pasaa, ŋgar tau tighamghamu na, poia mako.
Uraat tintiina tau Yoova niima ighamgham zi na, yes tigham ŋgar pani mako. Tauvene i pale ireu mbirisai zi gha tilalez kat, imin ruum tau tireu mbirisaini, ve irau tirao muul mako.
Yau napait Yoova pa poia tooni. Pasaa, yau nataŋ raraini to iuul ghau, ve i ilooŋ taŋiiz tsiau.
Yau naghamgham tapirig ila to Yoova, ve i imin sigheu payau. Yau naghur ila tooni ariaaŋ ila lolog, ve i iuluul ghau. Tauvene lolog poia le poia kat, ve napait eeza pa poia tooni ila mbouŋ.
Yoova tamtamon tooni tighamgham tapirizi ila tooni. Ve kinik tau Yoova tauu ighuru pa uraat tooni na, i iuluule ve iponpoona pa koiŋa imin didiiŋ ariaaŋa.
Yoova, tamtamon tsio timin lem motot. Ugham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi, ve ughur poia tsio izaa toozi. Matam pa sipsip tsio, ve uŋgin zi poi. Ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila.
Yam aŋela ariaŋamim to sambam, apakur Yoova. Apait eeza pa tapiri ve poia tooni.
Apait Yoova! Pa i eeza tiina kat. I ipabood tauu pa ŋgar tooni patabuyaaŋ. Tauvene aput aghemim pani ve apaiti.
Yoova aliiŋa ila irau te ziige ta naol ne. Maaron tau eeza tiina na aliiŋa, ene imin lalaav luutu. Yoova isaav toman aliiŋa tiina izala te paavo.
Yoova aliiŋa, ene tapiri tiina. Aliiŋa itotoia ighe i eeza tiina kat.
Yoova aliiŋa iŋgalŋgal valaghin ai mezepur tintiina to Lebanon. Aliiŋa iŋgalŋgal mbirisai zi.
Yoova aliiŋa itok loloz tintiina to Lebanon, le tiyatyaat imin makau natŋa paghpaaghu tau tintinizi. Ve itok loloz Ermon, le iyatyaat imin bapolo sagsagŋa natuzŋa tau tintinizi.
Yoova aliiŋa igham nugh ighani milia, ve yav ighan.
Ve itok taan to nugh ŋginaaŋa le irur. Igham nugh ŋginaaŋa to Kades katkatia ilala ilamlam.
Yoova aliiŋa igham mekmek sagsagŋa tau apozi na, tirur le tipoop pataghaaŋ. Ve igham ai raua tisov timburur tizi. Tauvene tamtamon tisov tau tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ ila rumei tooni loolo na, tisaav toman aliŋazi tiina tighe: “Tapait Yoova eeza. Pa i tapiri tiina kat!”
Muuŋ, yaa ivot toman tapiri ve itav taan. Saawe tana, Yoova ileep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz ve iŋgin gabua. Ve aazne paam, i kinik tau ileep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz. Pooz tooni pale ighengheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Yoova ighamgham tapiri pa tamtamon tooni. I pale ighur poia tooni izazaa toozi, ve iŋgin zi tileep poi toman lolozi luuma.

O Yoova, yau napait ezam. Pasaa, saawe tau naleep ila pataŋani tiina loolo, yo ugham mulin ghau, ve uit ghau nazaa muul. Imin ta yo upul ghau namaat, kanaŋ koiagŋa lolozi poia ve tipakur zi tighe tiliiv ghau.
O Yoova, Maaron tsiau, yau nataŋ rarai ghom to uul ghau. Ve yo upasov moroghooŋ tsiau, ve tinig poia wa.
Rigmon kanaŋ namaat gha nazila mateegha niazi. Eemon yo uul ghau, tauta naburig muul, ve aazne naleep poi.
Yam tamtamon to Yoova tau lolomim isaghavu ariaaŋ ve ataghon eez tooni na, apaiti ila mbouŋ tsiam. Yoova, i patabuyaaŋ. Tapiri ve ŋgar tooni, ene ite kat. Tauvene lolomim poia pani ve apait eeza pa poia tooni.
Aatyavyav tooni ighengheen malau mako. Igheen rig, ve isov. Eemon poia tooni, ene izazaa toit irau saawe tau taleep izi taan. Isaav ighe tataŋ pa mboŋ, ene pale mboŋoozo, i igham ghiit loloon poia muul.
Saawe tau lepoogh tsiau poia mon, yau nasaav naghe: “Pataŋani eta irau ivot payau ve itok ghau ne mako.”
Pasaa, yo ughamgham poghani ghau ve upapalot ghau. Tauta napakur taug naghe yau aat naleep tuŋia tauvene irau saawe, imin loloz tintiina. Eemon saawe tau yo uŋgooz naghom payau, roiŋ tiina igham ghau le nasaŋeeŋ.
Saawe tana, napoi ghom ve nataŋ rarai ghom naghe lolom isaghatin ghau ve uul ghau. Yau nasaav payo naghe:
“O Yoova, isaav ighe namaat gha nazila mateegha niazi, ene pale mateegh tsiau imin saa poia? Ughita. Mateegha tau tizila taan loolo gha timin ŋgaupup na, toozi eta irau ipait ghom? Ma toozi eta irau ivotia ŋgar tsio tau utataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio? Mako.
Tauvene Yoova, ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau tane. Lolom isaghatin ghau ve uul ghau lak! Pa yau besooŋa tsio.”
Aa ŋgarig gha upasov taŋiiz tsiau! Tauvene yau aat tintinig ve nator. Yo upasov pataŋani tsiau, ve uzuzuum uuli to moŋiiŋ izi pa tinig. Yo ugham ghau lolog poia kat, ve naleep ila poia tsio loolo.
Tauvene irau naneneeŋ mako. Yau aat nambou ve napait ezam toman lolog isov. Yoova, yo Maaron tsiau. Yau aat napait ghom pa poia tsio ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila.

O Yoova, yau nanumeer ghom ve nayooŋ ilat tsio. Upul koiagŋa titatan ghau sov. Pa ighe tiliiv ghau, ene pale mayag. Ŋgar tsio iduduuŋ. Tauvene ugham mulin ghau.
Ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tsiau, ve rekia uul ghau! Yo Uleeŋa tsiau ariaaŋa. Yo uponpoon ghau imin maetaaz tau izala kat. Ve umin ruum ariaaŋa to nayooŋ ila loolo. Leso gabua eta ivaghamun ghau sov, ve naleep poi.
Onoon kat. Yo Uleeŋa tsiau ariaaŋa. Yo uponpoon ghau imin maetaaz tau izala kat. Ve umin ruum ariaaŋa to nayooŋ ila loolo. Umuuŋ payau ve utotoi eez payau, leso upaghazoŋai ezam tiina ivot ighazooŋ.
Ughita liis tau koiagŋa tighuru payau na, ve upasali ghau pani. Pa yo ta umin niag to yoŋgaaŋ.
Yoova, yo Maaron tau utataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio. Aazne, yau naghur taug ila nimam. Ugham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tane.
Yau nanumeer Yoova mon. Tauvene yes tau tighurghur gabua soroksorok imin maaron pazi ve tibesbees pazi, na yau naghurghur koi pazi.
Yau tintinig ve lolog poia payo. Pasaa, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi. Saawe tau lolog ipataŋan kat, ve ateg ipaparav, yo ughita pataŋani tsiau ve uul ghau.
Yo upul ghau nala koiagŋa nimazi mako. Yo upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau, ve ughur ghau naleep poia ila nugh ghazooŋa.
Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Lolom isaghatin ghau ve uul ghau lak! Pa aazne, pataŋani tiina igham ghau le lolog ipataŋan. Yau nataŋ tiina le matag isarsar, ve tapirig isov kat.
Lolog ipataŋan kat ve nayakyak irau saawe. Pataŋani tane aat iŋgoor saawe tsiau ilam tuuku. Igham ghau nayamaan taug naghe tapirig isov. Yau nakoŋkoŋ kat le tuag isov peria.
Koiagŋa tisov tigham ŋalalaŋ payau. Ve yes tau tileep tigharau ghau ne paam, tipaŋiŋizai ghau. Zetagŋa lolozi pa tilam tigharau ghau mako. Ve yes tau tighit ghau izi eeze na, tiroi ve tilaagh eez ziige ite.
Tamtamon matazi iŋgal ghau muul mako. Tighit ghau imin ta namaat wa. Yau namin uur tau ivavaal ve tisiki ilale.
Yau nalooŋ eval tiina tivakamunai zi payau. Koiagŋa tilup zi ve tiil eez to tirav ghau namaat. Tauvene pataŋani naol ilivutin ghau le roiŋ tiina igham ghau.
Eemon Yoova, yau nanumeer ghom. Tauta nasaav payo naghe: “Yo mon ta Maaron tsiau.”
Saawe tau naleep izi taan, saa gabua ma ŋgar tau ighe ivot payau, ene yau naleep ila yo nimam. Upas ghau ila koiagŋa nimazi, ve upoon ghau pa yes tau tighamgham lilin ghau ne.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Lolom poia payau ve ugham poghani ghau. Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi. Tauvene ugham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tane.
Yoova, yau nataŋ rarai ghom to uul ghau. Upul koiagŋa tiliiv ghau ve tipamayaŋin ghau sov. Utatan zeran sasaghati tawe tapirizi, leso mayazi. Ve usik zi tizila mateegha niazi, leso tineneeŋ.
Upoon avozi. Pa yes zeran to karom. Tipapait tauzi, ve tivevelegh tamtamon duduŋazi, ve tisiksik saveeŋ sasaghati naol pazi.
O Yoova, poia tsio, ene tiina le tiina kat. Yes tau tiroi payo ve titaghon eez tsio na, yo ughur lezi gabua popoia katini isasaŋan zi. Yes tau tinumeer ghom ve tiyoŋyooŋ ilat tsio na, yo pale ugham poghani zi ila eval tiina matazi.
Yo uŋgooz zi ila zigem. Tauvene koiazŋa tau tiliil eez pa ravuuŋ zi timaat na, irau tigham gabua eta pazi mako. Yo uŋgin zi tileep poi ila nimam saamba. Tauvene saveeŋ sasaghati tau koiazŋa tisiksiki pazi na, irau ivaghamun zi mako.
Yau napait Yoova pa poia tooni. Pasaa, loolo isaghav ghau ariaaŋ, ve igham ŋgar poia kat payau. Saawe tau koiagŋa tilivutin ghau to tigham malmal payau, i iuul ghau.
Imin maata yau naroi naghe Yoova aat iziir ghau naghau pa maata wa. Eemon mako. Yau nataŋ raraini to iuul ghau, ve i ilooŋ taŋiiz tsiau, ve igham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau.
Yam tamtamon to Yoova tau lolomim isaghavu ariaaŋ ve ataghon eez tooni na, aghur lolomim pani kat. Yes tau titaghon i aliiŋa na, i pale iŋgin zi tileep poi. Eemon yes tau tiveleghi ve tipapait tauzi na, i pale ighur atuya pazi, ve iyat katin ŋgar toozi tawe.
Tauvene yam tau anumeer Yoova ve aghurghur matamim pani na, aroi sov. Apariaaŋ taumim, ve ayooz ariaaŋ!
Tamtamon tau ighe izoor Maaron aliiŋa ve isosor pa eez tooni, ighe Maaron ireu sosor tooni ilale, i aat tintini pa poia to Maaron tau izaa tooni.
Onoon kat, tamtamon tau ighe ŋgar to karom eta igheen ila loolo mako, ve Yoova ighita ighe i le sosor eta mako, i aat tintini pa poia to Maaron tau izaa tooni.
Saawe tau naŋgooz sosor tsiau, tuag tisov tiparyavyav le tapirig isov. Ve nayakyak irau mboŋ ve mataaz.
O Yoova, onoon kat, saawe tana, nayamaan katin nimam irau mboŋ ve mataaz. Tauta igham ghau tapirig isov kat imin yaa tau aaz ighaaz le imaak.
Naleep le mako, ra navotia sosor tsiau payo. Ŋgar tsiau saghati, naŋgooza muul mako. Saawe tana, yau naghe: “Ŋgar tsiau to zoraaŋ Yoova aliiŋa, yau aat navotia ila tooni.” Tauvene navotia sosor tsiau payo, ve ureua ilale.
Tauvene tamtamon tisov tau lolozi isaghav ghom ariaaŋ ve titaghon eez tsio na, isaav ighe pataŋani eta igham zi, ene yes aat tisuŋ payo. Isaav ighe pataŋani tiina kat ivot pazi imin yaa tau ivot toman tapiri, yo pale uul zi, leso pataŋani itatan zi sov.
Maaron, yo umin niag to yoŋgaaŋ. Yo uponpoon ghau pa pataŋani naol isov, ve ugham mulin ghau. Tauta eval tiina tau tilivut ghau ne, timbou ve tipait ezam toman aliŋazi tiina.
Ve Yoova isaav payau ighe: “Yau aat napaghazoŋai ŋgar tsio, ve natotoi ghom pa eez to utaghoni. Yau aat matag payo, ve napaduduuŋ ghom pa ŋgar poia.
Tauvene ugham ŋgar poi. Dabam iyaryaaŋ imin hos ma doŋki sov. Yes lezi ŋgar mako. Tauta tamtamon tighurghur ain sirivu tomania waar ila avozi, leso tipaduduuŋ zi pa laghooŋ, ve titaghon ŋgar toozi.”
Zeran sasaghati, pataŋani naol pale igham zi. Ve yes tau tinumeer Yoova na, i pale loolo isaghav zi ariaaŋ, ve tileep ila poia tooni loolo.
Yam zeran tau ataghon ŋgar duduuŋa, lolomim poia ve tintinmim pa poia to Yoova. Yam tau ŋgar poia igheen ariaaŋ ila lolomim na, asov lolomim poia pa Yoova ve ayoor eeza toman aliŋamim tiina!
Yam tau ataghon ŋgar duduuŋa na, lolomim poia pa Yoova, ve ayoor eeza toman aliŋamim tiina. Yam tau aghamgham ŋgar poia na, apait Yoova eeza, o iduduuŋ.
Arav ambam ve gita, ve apakur Yoova. Arav gabua maata maata, ve apaiti ila mbouŋ tau aliiŋa poia na.
Ambou mbouŋ paaghu pani, ve arav poghania ambam ve gita. Leso mbouŋ tsiam paghuuna. Ambou tiina, ve apaiti toman lolomim poia!
Pa saveeŋ to Yoova, ene onoon ve iduduuŋ mon. Uraat naol tau ighamgham zi na, ene itotoia ighe i itataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni.
I loolo pa ŋgar duduuŋa ve ŋgar to gharatooŋ pataŋani to tamtamon le iduduuŋ. Ve loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ariaaŋ ve iuluul zi. Ŋgar tane, i itotoia irau taan isov.
Muuŋ, saveeŋ to Yoova mon, tauta gabua to sambam saamba tisov tivot. Aavo isaav, ve aaz, kaiyo, ve pitum tisov tivot ila sambam saamba.
I igham te ila ilup ghi ila niia eemon. Mazavan tau muuŋ geeg itav taan na, ene i ighur poghania ila niia.
Yam tau aleep irau taan na, aroi pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar tooni. Yam nughmariŋ, aroi pani ve apakuru.
Pa i isaav mon, ve sambam ve taan tivot itaghon i tauu aliiŋa. I isaav ariaaŋ, ve gabua tisov tivot ve tigheen tuŋia ila niazi niazi.
Nugh nugh matazi iŋgal ŋgar katini tighe tigham zi. Eemon Yoova iponpoon eez pazi. Tauta ŋgar toozi tawe imin kaut sorok, ve le anooŋa mako.
Eemon Yoova, isaav ighe maata iŋgal ŋgar eta, ene pale ŋgar tana iyooz tauvene irau saawe. Saa ŋgar tau ighe loolo ighur pani, ene pale ighengheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Yes Israela Maaron toozi, ene Yoova. Tauta tintinizi pa poia tooni tau izazaa toozi. I tauu isiigh zi, ve igham zi timin le motot.
Yoova ileep izi sambam, ve maata izizi pa eval tiina to taan.
I ileep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve ighitghita tamtamon tisov tau tileep izi taan.
I ta ighurghur ŋgar ila tamtamon eŋaeŋa lolozi. Ve ŋgar naol tau tamtamon tighamgham zi na, i iwatagh zi tisov.
Isaav ighe kinik eta le zaaba katini, irau zaaba tana zigazi tiliiv pa malmal mako. Zaaba ariaŋazi paam. Irau tauzi tapirizi ve tiliiv koiazŋa mako.
Ve hos tau zaaba tilandoov zi pa malmal na, tauvene paam. Isaav ighe tighur matazi pazi to tiuul zi ve tiliiv koiazŋa, ene aat tighur matazi pazi sorok. Onoon, hos tapirizi. Eemon irau tiuul zi mako.
Onoon kat, yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i maata pazi. Yes tau tinumeer Yoova tighe i loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ariaaŋ ve iuluul zi na, i iŋgin zi tileep poi.
I iuluul zi, ve igham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi. Leso tileep poi. Ve isaav ighe pitool tiina ivot, i aat iuul zi, ve igham lezi aniiŋ ve tileep poi.
Tauvene iit tanumeer Yoova ve taghur mataan pani. Pasaa, i Uleeŋa toit, ve imin sigheu pait.
I mon, tauta loloon poia kat ve tintiniin. I patabuyaaŋ ve eeza tiina. Tauta taghur ila tooni ariaaŋ.
Yoova, yei nighur matamai payo to uul ghei. Ughur poia tsio izaa tsiei itaghon ŋgar tsio tau lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi.

Yau aat napait Yoova pa poia tooni irau saawe. Irau naneneeŋ mako. Monmon avog pale ipapaiti.
Yau lolog poia pa Yoova, ve napakuru pa ŋgar popoia tau i igham payau na. Yes tau tinumeer Yoova ve tibadbaad pataŋani na, irau tilooŋ aliŋag tane, leso lolozi poia paam.
Yam alam itiŋa talup ghiit, ve tapakur Yoova. Itiŋa tapait eeza. Pasaa, i eeza tiina le tiina kat.
Suŋuuŋ tsiau iŋarui Yoova, ve i ilooŋ ghau. Tauta igham mulin ghau pa gabua naol isov tau naroiroi pazi na.
Yes tau tighur matazi pani to iuul zi, ene pale lolozi poia ve tintinizi. I aat iuul zi. Irau tighur matazi pani sorok ve mayazi ne mako.
Muuŋ, pataŋani tiina igham ghau. Tauvene nataŋ rarai Yoova to iuul ghau. Ve i ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau, ve igham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau naol isov.
Yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, aŋela tooni ilepleep tomani zi, ve iŋginŋgin zi. I ighamgham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi.
Yoova, i poia kat. Taumim atoova ve aghita. Yes tau tinumeera ve tiyoŋyooŋ ila tooni na, poia tooni izazaa toozi, le lolozi poia kat.
Yam tamtamon patabuyaaŋa to Yoova, aroi pani ve ataghon ŋgar tooni. Pa yes tau tighamgham tauvene, irau timbool pa gabua eta mako.
Laion paghpaaghu, tapirizi tiina. Eemon saawe siriv, lezi aniiŋ mako ve pitool zi. Ve yes tau tizuari zi pa Yoova, ene irau timbool pa gabua poia eta mako.
Natugŋa, alam alooŋ saveeŋ tsiau tane. Yau naghe napaghazoŋai gham pa eez to aroi pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar tooni.
Mindai, yo ughe uleep poia, ve uleep malau izi taan toman lolom poia?
Ighe tauvene, o uŋgin poghania avom. Saveeŋ saghati, ma karom eta ivot ila avom sov.
Ve ughur murim pa ŋgar saghati, ve ugham ŋgar poia mon. Uzuari ghom pa taghoniiŋ ŋgar luuma, ve uil eez to yamŋa tamtamon avalupu gham ve aleep poia.
Tamtamon duduŋazi, Yoova maata pazi, ve ighurghur taliiŋa pa taŋiiz toozi.
Eemon zeran sasaghati, i ighurghur koi pazi. I pale ipasov zi pa taan le tisov kat. Murei pale tamtamon matazi iŋgal zi muul mako.
Saawe tau tamtamon duduŋazi titaŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, i iloŋlooŋ zi ve ighamgham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi naol isov.
Yes tau pataŋani igham zi le lolozi isaghat kat na, Yoova ileep igharau zi. Tamtamon tau ighe pataŋani itatani le tapiri isov, ene pale Yoova iuule.
Onoon, tamtamon duduŋazi, pataŋani naol ivotvot pazi. Eemon Yoova pale igham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi ta naol ne.
I pale iŋgin poghani zi kat. Irau tuazi eta ipol mako.
Eemon yes tau tizorzoor Yoova aliiŋa na, ŋgar toozi sasaghati pale imuul pa tauzi, ve irav zi timaat. Yes tau tighurghur koi pa tamtamon duduŋazi, ene pale Yoova ighur atuya pazi, leso iyat ŋgar toozi tawe.
Yoova ighamgham mulin besooŋa tooni pa pataŋani toozi, leso tileep poia. Yes tau tinumeera ve tiyoŋyooŋ ila tooni na, i irau ighur atuya pazi mako.
O Yoova, uul ghau ve utatan koiagŋa tau aazne yeŋa nivazorai ghei ve tiŋoŋooŋ payau ne. Yes tau tighe tigham malmal payau ne, uvool tsiau ve uparav tomani zi.
Unonogh ghom pa gabua tsio to malmal, ve ukis sigheu tsio, ve uburig ulam uul ghau.
Upas iiz ve zaab tsio, ve upoon ghau pa yes tau tigham lilin ghau ne. Yau naghe nalooŋ ghom usaav payau ughe: “Yau Uleeŋa tsio. Yau aat nauul ghom.”
Yoova, yes tau tighe tirav ghau namaat ne, utatan tapirizi, ve ugham zi mayazi ve tighau tila. Yes tau tiil eez to tivaghamun ghau ne, ugham ŋgar toozi ivaghamgham, ve timuul tila toman mayazi.
Yoova, naghe aŋela tsio inaan zi gha tighawaar, imin yaghur ivuvuur ŋgaupup.
Aŋela tsio tawe igham taghon zi, ve tilaan ila ndoroom loolo taghon eez tau pusukpusukia na, o poi!
Pasaa, yau nagham sosor eta pazi mako. Eemon yes tiraar puugh tighe tisaghav ghau. Ve titai puura tau izila kat, leso natap nazila.
Yoova, upateeŋ zi pa saghatiiŋ tiina eta. Ugham zi tighoon ila tauzi puugh toozi. Ve ugham zi titaptap tizila puura tau titaii payau na. Leso saghatiiŋ igham zi le tisaghat kat!
Yoova, ighe ugham tauvene, ene pale lolog poia kat payo, ve tintinig pa uleeŋ tau ugham payau.
Yau aat napait ezam toman lolog, ve naghe: “Yoova, sei ta imin yo? Eta mako! Pasaa, yes tau tapirizi imbool na, yo ugham mulin zi ila yes tau tapirizi tiina na nimazi. Yes mbolaaŋa ve yes tau tileep ila pataŋani loolo na, yo aat uvool toozi, ve ugham mulin zi ila umbuuŋa nimazi.”
Tamtamon naol tiburig ve tiŋgal saveeŋ karom payau tighe tivaghamun ghau. Eemon saveeŋ ŋgaliiŋ tau tinoknok ghasoniiŋ ghau pani ne, ene yau nakankaan pani.
Yau nagham ŋgar poia pazi. Eemon yes tipamuul ŋgar saghati payau. Tauta lolog ipataŋan kat.
Eemon saawe tau yes timorooŋ le tisaghat, lolog ipataŋan pazi, ve nagharaat taug mako. Ve naŋgun taug pa ghaniiŋ aniiŋ, ve naghur zi ila suŋuuŋ tsiau. Eemon suŋuuŋ tsiau tane, yo ugham anooŋa ivot mako. Tauta lolog ipataŋan kat, ve nataŋ pazi imin zetagŋa, ma toŋvetaz tsiau duduuŋ. Ve nalaagh matag izaa mako. Natudtud ve nataŋtaŋ, imin ŋeer tau loolo ipataŋan pa tiina imaat.
<range>
Eemon saawe tau pataŋani igham ghau gha naleep saghat, yes lolozi poia, ve tilup zi to tivaghamun ghau. Yes tau tighe tigham malmal payau ne, yau nawatagh zi mako. Nakankaan pa ŋgar toozi. Yes tinoknok ŋgaliiŋ saveeŋ payau.
Ve tisiksik saveeŋ veleghiiŋ naol payau. Atezi yavyav payau kat, ve tiŋaaŋ maripazi tighe le tikari ghau.
Yoova, puughu mindai ta umamarar zi ve tighamgham ŋgar tauvene payau? Pale ŋeez o uul ghau? Yes timin laion tau tisasaŋan pa raŋgatiiŋ ghau. Tauvene ugham mulin ghau ila nimazi, leso naleep poi.
Ve ighe uul ghau, mako saawe tau tamtamon tsio tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ, yau aat nala tomani zi, ve napait ghom toman lolog poia. Pale napait varum ila eval tiina tawe naghozi.
Koiagŋa, muuŋ yeŋa lupuuŋ tsiei eemon. Eemon aazne, tighur koi payau sorok. Tauvene uul ghau lak! Mako pale tiliiv ghau ve tipakur zi. Ve tighan matazi payau, ve tighe: “Aa, ŋeer ta ivaghamgham wa!” O Yoova, ŋgar tauvene ivot sov!
Yes tisavia saveeŋ luuma eta to tilup tamtamon ve tileep poi ne mako. Tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ naol pa tamtamon marowa to taan tane.
Ve aliŋazi izazaa sorok, ve tisavsaav ila matag tighe: “Aa, ŋgarig gha nighit ghom!”
Yoova, ŋgar toozi sasaghati ta naol ne, yo ughit zi wa. Uneneeŋ pazi sov! Tiina tsiau, uleep soghan payau sov.
Maaron, yo Tiina tsiau. Uburig ve uvool tsiau. Uyooz payau, ve utatan zi.
Yoova, Maaron tsiau, ŋgar tsio iduduuŋ mon. Tauvene uyooz payau, ve upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi ughe yau leg sosor eta mako. Uul ghau. Mako pale koiagŋa tipakur zi pa pataŋani tau igham ghau ne.
Mako lolozi poia ve tisaav tighe: “Aa, isov! Ŋgar tau taghe tagham pani, tauta ivot pani gha isaghat wa!”
Yoova, yes tau tipakur zi pa pataŋani tau igham ghau ne, ugham zi tivaghamgham, ve tighau tila toman mayazi. Yes tau tivelegh ghau ve tipapait tauzi na, upamayaŋin zi le mayazi kat.
Eemon yes tau tighe yo uul ghau ve upaghazoŋai ghau ila tamtamon matazi ughe yau leg sosor eta mako na, yes pale lolozi poia ve tintinizi, ve tiyoor ezam toman aliŋazi tiina. Ve tisavsaav tighe: “Yoova eeza tiina kat! Isaav ighe besooŋa tooni ileep poi, ene pale i paam loolo poia.”
Tauvene mboŋoozo ila le ravrav izi, avog pale ivotia ŋgar duduuŋa tau yo ughamghamu na, ve napapait ghom.

Ŋgar to zoraaŋ Maaron aliiŋa tau igheen ila zeran sasaghati lolozi, ene isavsaav pazi, ve ighamgham pooz pazi. Tauta matazi iŋgal Maaron mako, ve tiroi pani mako.
Sosor toozi tawe, ikau ŋgar toozi. Tauta tipapakur tauzi, ve matazi iŋgal sorok tighe Maaron ighita sosor toozi mako, ve irau ighur atuya pazi mako.
Saveeŋ karom ve saveeŋ sasaghati mon ta ivotvot ila avozi. Ŋgar tau iuul ghiit to taleep poia, ene tipuli wa. Tauta tigham ŋgar poia eta mako.
Ŋgar toozi iyaryaaŋ kat. Tighe le tigham ŋgar saghati mon. Mboŋ ta naol ne, tighengheen ila moogh toozi, ve matazi iŋgalŋgal pa saa ŋgar saghati tau pale tighamu. Eez saghati tawe, lolozi pa tipuli mako.
Yoova, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio, ve uluul zi irau saawe. Ŋgar tsio tana, ene tiina le tiina kat. Izala le ikis sambam saamba. Ve ŋgar to taghoniiŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio paam. Izala le ikis taitai.
Ŋgar tsio duduuŋa, ene imin loloz tintiina. Ve ŋgar tsio tau ugabiiz tamtamon itaghon ŋgar duduuŋa ve ughur atuya pazi, ene paam tiina kat, imin mazavan belbeluuŋa tau izila le izila kat. Yoova, yo uŋgin tamtamon ve gabua maata maata to su ve nughei, ve uluul zi, tauta tileep poi.
Maaron, gabuam tau lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ariaaŋ ve uluul zi, ene gabua tauu. Tamtamon tisov tiyooŋ ila nimam saamba, imin tatareek natŋa tiyooŋ ila tinazi baage saamba.
Rumei tsio, ene ivon pa gabua popoia maata maata. Tauvene tamtamon tighan le isooŋ zi. Poia tsio izazaa toozi imin yaa tiina tau irereer. Yo upaghun zi pani, ve tiyamaana poia kat.
Yo ta umin puughu pa gabua naol isov tau tileep matazi yaryaare. Ve ghazooŋa tsio isul ghei, tauta matamai ighazooŋ.
Yoova, lolom isaghav yes tau tiwatagh ghom. Yes tau ŋgar duduuŋa igheen ariaaŋ ila lolozi na, utotoi poia tsio pazi, ve uul zi itaghon ŋgar tsio duduuŋa.
Tauvene yes tau tipapait tauzi ezazi ve tivelegh tamtamon tsio na, upul zi titatan ghau sov. Ve upul zeran sasaghati tinaan ghau sov.
Aghita. Yes tau tinoknok ghamuuŋ ŋgar saghati, tauta Maaron irav zi titaptap tizi, le patazi tivaghengheen izala taan paavo. Irau tiburig muul mako.
Zeran sasaghati tau aazne tipapakur zi na, ugham ŋgar naol pazi sov. Ve yes to ghamuuŋ sosor na, lolom ighaar pa gabua toozi sov.
Pale tileep rig, mako tisaghat imin kikiliiŋ tau aaz ighaazo gha imalai. Pale timin gabua raua tau mbitaizi, ve tigorgor gha titaptap tizizi.
Unumeer Yoova, ve ugham ŋgar poia mon. Leso gabua eta ivaghamun ghom sov, ve uleep poia izi taan tau i igham pa tamtamon tooni na.
Lolom poia pa Yoova tauu. I pale igham gabua ivot payo itaghon yo lolom.
