Gabua tau Yoova ighamu na, uboode ila rau. Leso tamtamon tooni tau murei pale tivot na, tiwataghi ve tipait eeza. Ubood saveeŋ tauvene:
Yoova ilepleep izi nugh tooni patabuyaaŋ, ve maata ilala ilamlam. I ileep izi sambam, ve maata izizi pa taan.
Tauvene yes tau tileep ila koiazŋa nimazi ve tiyakyak na, i iloŋlooŋ taŋiiz toozi ve iuluul zi. Ve yes tau tisaŋan saawe to koiazŋa tirav zi timaat na, i ipaghau zi pa mateegh.
Leso murei, yes nugh nugh tomania kinik toz toz tilam tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ izi Yerusalem, ve tivotia Yoova vaaru. Yes pale tipait eeza izi loloz tooni Zion.
<range>
Yau namin olman kat soone. Eemon aazne Yoova igham ghau tapirig isov, ve iŋgoor saawe tsiau tuuku.
Tauvene nasaav pani naghe: “Maaron tsiau, ugham ghau rekia sov. Pa namin kooŋ soone! Ve yo, o lepoogh tsio ighengheen tauvene taghon gha ila.
Yoova, muuŋ geeg, yo ugharaat taan puughu le tuŋia. Ve sambam saamba paam, ene nimam muuri.
Eemon murei, sambam saamba ve taan pale tisaghat gha tilalez, imin uuli muŋgaana tau perekperekia na. Tauvene yo pale usik zi tilalez, ve uyol zi pa sambam saamba paaghu ve taan paaghu. Eemon yo ulepleep tauvene. Utortoor gabuam ve ŋgar tsio mako, ve saawe tsio irau isov mako.
<range>
Yei tau nibesbees payo ne, yo pale uŋgin natmaiŋa ve tileep poia. Ve paaghu toozi tau tivot murei na paam, yo pale ugham zi tiyooz ariaaŋ, ve tileep poia ila yo naghom irau saawe.”
Yau nasaav pa taug naghe yau aat napait Yoova pa poia tooni. Onoon kat, ila lolog ve ŋgar tsiau isov, yau aat napakur Yoova eeza patabuyaaŋ.
Nayol aliŋag muul. Yau aat napait Yoova pa poia tooni. Ŋgar ve gabua popoiazi naol tau i ighamgham zi payau ne, irau lolog iveegh pa eta ne mako.
I irewaar sosor tsiau, ve ipasovuur moroghooŋ tsiau naol isov.
I igham mulin ghau pa mateegh. Tauta namaat mako. I igham ghau lolog poia kat imin tamtamon tau tighuru imin kinik. Pasaa, ŋgar tooni tau loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ariaaŋ ve iuluul zi, ene i itotoia payau paam.
Lepoogh tsiau to taan, i ighamgham leg gabua popoiazi maata maata le narao kat. Ve igham ghau namin paaghu muul, le tapirig tiina imin manbog.
Ŋgar tau Yoova ighamghamu, ene iduduuŋ mon. Tauvene tamtamon tisov tau koiazŋa titatan zi ve tigham saghatin zi na, i iyozyooz pazi, ve iuluul zi pa pataŋani toozi.
Muuŋ, Yoova ivotia gabua ve ŋgar tooni pa Mose. Ve itotoi uraat tintiina toman tapiri ila yes Israela matazi.
Yoova loolo isasaghatin ghiit, ve ighamgham poghani ghiit. Irau aate yavyav rekrekia mako. Poia tooni, ene tiina kat. I loolo isaghav ghiit ariaaŋ, ve iuluul ghiit irau saawe. Ve monmon itaghon saveeŋ tooni.
Onoon, pai siriv, i iŋgal mataan pa sosor toit. Eemon igham tauvene monmon mako. Ve irau ikis aatyavyav tooni le malau ne mako. Igheen rig, ve isov.
Onoon, isaav ighe tagham ŋgar tau isapir pa tutuuŋ tooni, ene Maaron irau iyat sosor toit ve ighur atuya pait. Eemon i ighamgham tauvene mako.
Yes tau tiroi pani ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, Yoova loolo isaghav zi, ve poia tooni tiina izazaa toozi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni. Loolo poia tana, ene tiina kat, imin sooso to taan ve izala pa sambam.
Ve sosor toit tau tazorzoor Maaron aliiŋa ne, ene Yoova ipaghau zi tila malau kat pait, irau sooso to taan ziige tau ila pa aaz izaa, ve ila pa aaz izila.
Yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i loolo isasaghatin zi, imin tamaanŋa lolozi isasaghatin ghiit.
Pasaa, i tauu ta igharaat ghiit. Tauta monmon maata iŋgalŋgal ighe: Iit tamin ŋgaupup mon.
Lepoogh to iit tamtamon to taan, ene malau mako. Taleep rig, ve talaleen imin kikiliiŋ. Iit tamin manman ruuŋgu. Mboŋoozo, isaav ighe aaz izaa, ene iravalagh. Ve ravrav izi, ene imalai.
Ve ighe yaghur ivuvuura, ene pale itap izi, ve niia ŋginaaŋa. Taghita muul mako.
Eemon yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i loolo isaghav zi ve iuluul zi irau saawe. Aazne ve taghon taghon gha ila. Ve natuzŋa ve timbuzŋa paam. I itotoi ŋgar duduuŋa pazi ve iseeŋga taghon gha ila. Tauvene yes tau matazi kisin saveeŋ tau yesŋa Maaron timbua, ve matazi iŋgal tutuuŋ tooni ve titaghoni na, i pale loolo isaghav zi, ve iuul zi taghon gha ila.
<range>
Yoova ighur niia to ghamuuŋ pooz igheen tuŋia izi sambam. I kinik tau ighamgham pooz pa gabua naol isov.
Tauvene yam aŋela to Yoova, yam asov apaiti pa poia tooni. Yam aŋela ariaŋamim tau aloŋlooŋ Yoova aliiŋa ve atataghoni na, apakuru.
Yam zaaba to sambam tau abesbees pa Maaron ve ataghon ŋgar tooni na, apait Yoova pa poia tooni!
Yam gabua to sambam ve taan tau Yoova igharaat gham ve aleep ila i saamba na, yam asov apaiti pa poia tooni. Ve yau paam, aat napait Yoova pa poia tooni.
Yau nasaav pa taug naghe yau aat napait Yoova pa poia tooni. O Yoova, Maaron tsiau, yo ezam tiina kat. Tapirim tiina tomania mbonarim, ve gabuam naol isov tau ezam tiina pani na, ene ipabood ghom imin nonoghiiŋa to yes kinik. Muuŋ geeg, yo ugharaat sambam saamba imin niam to lepoogh irau moogh balbaala tau tamtamon tiraraava leso tileep ila saamba.
<range>
Ve upayooz ruum tsio izala yaa tau igheen ila sambam saamba na paavo. Yo ugham taitai imin lem karis, leso uyooz izala paavo ve ughau. Tauvene yaghur ibaad ghom, ve ughaughau ila sambam saamba.
Yo ugham yaghur imin lem mbaŋooŋa. Ve yav yaama, ene imin lem besooŋa.
Muuŋ, yo ughur taan iyooz tuŋia ila puughu. Tauta irau izuur mako. Ighengheen tauvene.
Saawe tana, ugham te itav taan tomania loloz naol isov.
Ra aliŋam izaa, ve uyaon te gha ighau. Aliŋam tapiri tiina imin lalaav luutu. Tauta te ilooŋ ghom, ve rekia mon ighau ila ilup ghi ila ziige ee, ve taan peria.
Tauvene te imaak, ve loloz peria, ve imaak izi izi le nugh rapazi peria paam. Tauta aazne, yaa ve te tigheen duduuŋ ila niazi niazi tau yo taum ughuru pazi na.
Ve yo ughur ŋgat pa te ve taan. Leso te itav taan ve ireu nugh muul sov. Ŋgat tawe, te irau imalaaŋ pani mako.
Yo ugham yaa tivot ila taan puura tau tighenaar taghon loloz zigezi, ve tireer taghon sariipa tizila pa nugh duduŋazi.
Yaa tawe tighenaar, leso gabua naol to su tighun. Doŋki sagsagŋa paam. Isaav ighe murun zi, ene pale tighunu le isooŋ zi.
Man tirau rumazi ila ai tau tiyooz ila yaa zigezi na bogazi, ve tileep ila ve titaŋtaŋ.
Yo uleep ila niam ta saaŋa we, ve ugham uman izizi ila loloz. Uraat tsio tana, tauta igham taan ŋgoreeŋa ivot ve gabua popoia naol titum poi.
Yo ugham kikiliiŋ itum, leso makau, sipsip ve gabua siriv paam tighan. Ve ughur gabua maata maata to iuul tamtamon paam. Leso tivazogh zi ve tigham uratoi zi. Yo ugham aniiŋ anooŋa ivotvot ila taan.
Ve ughur ai vaen, leso tamtamon tigharaata ve tighun suuru, ve igham zi lolozi poia. Ve ugham ai oliv pazi paam. Leso tigham ŋgoreeŋa, ve tisop tinizi ma naghozi pani, le milmilia. Ve ugham aniiŋ maata maata pazi, ve tighani to ipalot zi.
Yoova, ai tsio mezepur tau uvazogh zi izi Lebanon na, yo uŋgin zi poi, ve ugham uman izizi pazi. Tauta aazne tizaa timin tintiina.
Ai tawe, man tirau rumazi izala bogazi. Ve man ŋgau, o tighagharaat rumazi ila ai tau imin yar na bogazi.
Loloz mamalaua dabazi, ene mekmek sagsagŋa niazi to lepoogh. Ve gabua siriv tau imin momot, ma uzuuv ma vene, ene tiyoŋyooŋ iloŋ ila maet tintiina sosozi izala loloz.
Yo ughur kaiyo to iŋgat saawe to ndaman. Ve aaz, ene iwatagh saawe sindei to izaa, ve saawe sindei to izila.
Yo ugham mboŋ izi le nugh ndoroom, leso gabua sagsagŋa to su tilaagh.
Tauvene laion paghpaaghu aliŋazi izazaa ve tilaghlaagh, ve tiliil lezi gabua to tighan. Ve Maaron tau igham pazi.
Saawe tau aaz izaa, mako timuul tila pa niazi to ghenooŋ, ve tizi tigheen.
Mako tamtamon anazi tivot tila pa ghamuuŋ uraat. Tighamgham uraat ila ila le ravrav izi.
O Yoova, yo ughur gabua maata maata. Ve gabua naol tau yo ugharaat zi na, titotoi ghom tighe ŋgar tsio tiina le tiina kat. Taan ivon kat pa gabua ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ tau yo ugharaat zi na.
Ve nagham ŋgar pa te paam. Ene tiina kat. Ve gabua ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ tau matazi yaryaare na tileep ila. Siriv tintiina, ve siriv geegeu. Gabua tawe, tanin zi, ene aat tarao mako.
Waaŋ tiravraav ila te paavo, ve Leviatan ilaghlaagh ila te loolo. Gabua tana, tiina le tiina kat. Muuŋ geeg, yo ugharaata, leso imomogheer ila te.
Gabua naol tawe tighurghur matazi payo to ugham lezi aniiŋ. Saawe tau pitool zi, yo taum upanpan zi.
Yes tilepaar ila yo nimam. Isaav ighe ugham aniiŋ pazi, yes pale tighamu. Ighe ukaak nimam to upan zi, ene pale tighan gabua popoia le apozi isuŋ.
Ve isaav ighe uŋgooz naghom pazi, ene pale tiroi ve tivaghamgham. Ve isaav ighe upas avuvuzi ighau, ene pale timatmaat ve timin ŋgaupup muul.
Gabua naol tau tileep izi taan ne, yo uviv Avuvum ila pazi, tauta tileep matazi yaryaare. Ve saawe tau timaat, yo ugham paaghu toozi tivot izi taan, leso tigham niazi.
Yoova eeza tiina aat igheen taghon taghon gha ila. Ve i loolo poia pa gabua naol tau i igharaat zi na.
I tapiri tiina kat. Isaav ighe maata izi pa taan, ene pale taan irur. Ve isaav ighe itut loloz eta, ene pale yav ighan loloz tana.
Tauvene saawe tau naleep matag yaryaare, yau aat nambou mbouŋ to napait Yoova. Pale lolog poia pani, ve napakuru pa mbouŋ ila ila le lepoogh tsiau to taan isov.
Yoova igham ghau lolog poia kat. Tauvene saawe tau naleep ve naghamgham ŋgar pani, naghe i ighit ghau ve loolo poia pa ŋgar tsiau.
Eemon zeran sasaghatizi tau tighamgham sosor ila Yoova maata na, poia to i ipasov zi pa taan gha tilalez. Ve yau ene, nasaav pa taug naghe yau aat napait Yoova pa poia tooni. Aleluia! Tapait Yoova!
Apait Yoova pa poia tooni, ve avotia eeza tiina. Asavia ŋgar tau i ighamghamu na irau nugh nugh, leso tiwataghi.
Ambou pani. Ambou ve apakuru. Avotia uraat tooni ŋgeretazi ta naol ne. Uraat tana, maata ite kat.
Yoova, i eeza patabuyaaŋ. Apaiti toman lolomim poia. Yes tau tizuari zi pani, ene pale lolozi poia kat ve tintinizi.
Suŋuuŋ tsiam iŋarui Yoova. Leso ipalot gham pa tapiri. Azuari gham to ala aleep ila naagho irau saawe.
Yam tau avot ila to Maaron besooŋa tooni Abaram, yam siŋ to Yakop tau Maaron isiigh gham amin i le na, matamim iŋgal gabua ŋgeretazi ve uraat tintiina tau Yoova ighamgham zi na. Uraat tooni tawe maata ite kat. Ve matamim iŋgal saawe naol tau i igabiiz tamtamon ve ighur atuya pazi na.
<range>
Yoova, i mon ta Maaron toit. Uraat to gabizooŋ tamtamon ve ghuruuŋ atuya pazi, ene i itotoia irau taan isov.
I monmon maata iŋgalŋgal saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni, ve itataghoni. Tutuuŋ tau Maaron isavia na, pale iyaryaaŋ tauvene, ve anooŋa ivotvot taghon taghon gha ila.
Muuŋ, i imbu saveeŋ tomania Abaram ighe yesuru tivalupu zi timin eemon. Ra ipariaaŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tawe ila to Isak le iyaryaaŋ kat.
Murei, ra ipariaaŋ saveeŋ tana muul ila to Yakop, ighe saveeŋ tane aat iyaryaaŋ taghon taghon gha ila. Ve isaav pa Yakop ighe: “Yau pale nagham taan Kanaan imin lem. Taan tana pale imin yo yamŋa paaghu tsio lemim motot.”
<range>
Saawe tana, yes eval mako. Ŋgiira mon. Ve tileep timin loom pa taan tane.
Laghooŋ toozi, titaghon ŋgar tauvene: Tileep rig izi nugh ee, mako tiburig muul ve tila tileep izi nugh ite. Tila tivot nugh to kinik ee ve tileep tomani zi. Le isov, o tipul zi, ve tila tivot to kinik ite, ve tileep tomani zi.
Laghooŋ toozi, ene Maaron tauu iŋginŋgini. I ipul tamtamon to nugh eta titatan zi ve tigham saghatin zi ne mako. I maata iŋgalŋgal zi, tauta iyaon kinik siriv ighe: “Yes tau nasiigh zi ve naghur zi timin uraata tsiau na, abugil zi sov! Pasaa, yes tana, yau naghur zi timin propet tsiau. Tauvene avaghamun zi sov.”
<range>
Murei, ra Yoova igham pitool tiina ivot izi taan Kanaan. Saawe tana, Yakop tomania natŋa lezi aniiŋ mako kat.
Eemon Yoova imbaaŋ toozi ee imuuŋ pazi ila Isip. Ene Yosep tau tigholia ila gha imin mbesooŋa sorok.
Yes Isipa tizeeva iloŋ ila ruum to yavyavuuŋ, ve tikau aaghe pa sen, ve tighur ain liliita ila luua.
Yoova itovtoov Yosep tauvene, le irau Yosep ivotia gabua siriv pa yes Isipa, le saveeŋ tooni anooŋa ivot. Tauvene saveeŋ tau Yoova isavia pani, ene ipaghazoŋai Yosep ighe i igham sosor mako, ve ŋgar tooni iduduuŋ.
Ra kinik to yes Isipa tau iŋgin nugh naol na, imbaaŋ ila ighe tipul Yosep ivot pa ruum to yavyavuuŋ.
Ve ighur Yosep imin daaba to Isip, ve ipuliir ruum tooni tomania gabua tooni naol isov ila i niima, leso iŋgin zi.
Tauta Yosep imin daaba pa yes tau tighamgham uraat pa kinik na. I ipaduduuŋ yes tau tiuluul kinik pa ŋgar na, ve ipaghazoŋai zi pa ŋgar poia.
Eez tane ta yes Israela tau siŋ to Yakop na tila tivot izi Isip, ve tileep timin loom ila taan to Ham.
Yoova ipapalot zi, tauta tivot timin eval, le tapirizi iliiv koiazŋa.
Ra i itoor ŋgar to yes Isipa, ve tighur koi pa tamtamon tooni. Tauvene tiil eez to titombaan besooŋa tooni ve tigham saghatin zi.
Tauta Yoova imbaaŋ besooŋa tooni ru, Mose gha Aron, leso tiuul yes Israela. Aron tane, Yoova tauu ighuru to igham uraat tooni.
Maaron ighe itotoi tapiri pa yes Isipa. Tauta ipalot Mose gha Aron, ve tigham gabua ŋgeretazi naol ve uraat tintiina ila yes Isipa sosozi. Uraat tau ivot izi taan to Ham, ene maata ite kat.
Yoova igham ndoroom tiina ikau taan to yes Isipa. Pasaa, yes tizoor aliiŋa, ve tiŋguruut tamtamon tooni.
Ve i itoor yaa toozi isov imin siŋ, le iigh tisov timatmaat.
Ra igham gob ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ tivot le taan toozi ivon pazi. Ruum loolo to kinik tauu, ene ivon pa gob paam.
Ve Yoova isaav, ve lasom tomania suum katini tivot, le tirau taan to yes Isipa.
Ve saawe tau uman ighe izi, ene uman izi mako. Yoova igham ais paatu paatu izi le ivaghamunia nugh. Ve igham nugh ighani milia, ve lalaav iŋgalŋgal gabua irau taan toozi isov.
Tauta ivaghamunia ai vaen tomania ai fik toozi, ve iŋgal ai siriv tipolpol paam.
Ra isaav, ve siis tivot le katini kat. Tanin zi, aat tarao mako.
Ve tighan aniiŋ tau yes Isipa tivazogh zi na raua tomania gabua siriv tau titum ila taan toozi na le isov kat.
Murei ra, Yoova iravuur natuzŋa aidabazŋa timataar irau taan toozi isov. Natuzŋa tau tipoop zi imin maata, tauta tisov.
Ra Yoova igham yes Israela tipul Isip, ve tivot tila. Saawe tau tiburig, tighamuur gol to yes Isipa tomania silva toozi, ve tila tomania. Ve laghooŋ toozi, tilaagh toman tapirizi. Toozi eta tapiri isov ve itap mako.
Saawe tau yes Israela tipul Isip ve tila, yes Isipa lolozi poia kat. Pasaa, yes Israela tau timin puughu pa pataŋani tau ivotvot pazi ne. Tauta roiŋ tiina igham zi.
Mataaz, Yoova igham taitai ivot gha ipoon aaz maata pa yes Israela. Ve mboŋ, i igham yav tiina ighan le isul nugh.
Saawe tau tighasoni pa lezi aniiŋ, i igham man kayau katini tivot, ve igham aniiŋ katini sambam ve izilam pazi. Tauvene tighamu gha tighan le apozi isuŋ.
Yoova igham maet ivavaal le aavo ikaak, ve yaa prisia toman tapiri ivot. Yaa tawe ireer tiina izi nugh ŋginaaŋa tau le yaa mako na.
Yoova igham gabua naol tana pasaa, maata iŋgalŋgal saveeŋ tooni patabuyaaŋ tau imbua tomania besooŋa tooni Abaram.
Tauvene Yoova igherev tamtamon tooni Israel tau i tauu isiigh zi na, gha tipul Isip. Timboumbou ve tilolool toman lolozi poia ve tila.
Murei, ra i igham taan to nugh siriv pazi. Tauvene nugh tawe uraat toozi anooŋa, imin ruum, uum, ai, ve gabua toozi siriv paam, tauta isov imin yes Israela lezi.
Yoova igham tauvene pazi, leso tikis saveeŋ tooni tuŋia, ve matazi kisin tutuuŋ tooni ve titaghoni. Aleluia! Tapait Yoova!
Aleluia! Tapait Yoova pa poia tooni toman loloon poia. Pasaa, i poia kat. I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni, ve iuluul zi irau saawe.
Sei irau isavia uraat tintiina tau Yoova ighamgham zi na? Ve sei irau ipaiti pa ŋgar popoia naol tau i ighamgham zi na ve ipasov zi? Eta irao mako.
Yes tau tighagharaat pataŋani to tamtamon ve titaghon ŋgar duduuŋa irau saawe, ene pale lolozi poia kat, ve poia to Maaron izazaa toozi.
O Yoova, saawe tau ugham poghania tamtamon tsio ve ugham mulin zi pa pataŋani toozi, na matam iŋgal ghau ve uul ghau paam. Maaron, yo taum usiigh yes Israela timin lem motot. Yes tamtamon tsio. Tauvene naghe taug naghit zi tileep poi. Leso yeŋa nilup ghei toman tintiinmai ve nipait ghom.
<range>
Yei nisosor wa. Nisosor pa eez tsio, raraate imin timbumaiŋa. Yei nighamgham ŋgar saghati. Ŋgar tsiei iduduuŋ ila yo matam mako.
Saawe tau timbumaiŋa tileep izi Isip na, yo ugham gabua ŋgeretazi tintiina ivotvot. Eemon tighilaal zi mako. Saawe naol, yo utotoi poia tsio pazi, itaghon ŋgar tsio tau lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Eemon yes tigham ŋgar pa uleeŋ tsio tana mako. Saawe tau tila tivot Te Siŋsiŋai, tizoor aliŋam, ve tighur murizi payo.
Eemon Yoova, i eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni, ve ighe igham zi tighilaal katin tapiri. Tauta igham mulin zi.
Saawe tana, i isaav ariaaŋ pa Te Siŋsiŋai le ivalagh ghi imin ru. Sirivu ila pa tapir, sirivu ila pa ŋas, ve taan mamaasa ivot. Ra igherev yes Israela, ve tilaagh ila maghat tau igheen izila siiŋa kat na, gha tila tivool pa ziige ite.
Tauvene i igham mulin zi ila koiazŋa nimazi. I iyooz pazi, ve iuul zi. Tauta yes tau tighur koi pazi na irau tivaghamun zi mako.
Saawe tana, te itav koiazŋa le tisov timataar. Eta ileep muul mako.
Maaron igham tauvene, tauta yes Israela tighur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni, ve timbou mbouŋ to tipaiti.
Eemon rekia mon ve lolozi iveegh pa gabua ŋgeretazi tau i igham zi na. Yes tisaŋan Maaron to ivotia ŋgar tooni pazi ne mako. Tigham gabua itaghon tauzi ŋgar toozi.
Saawe tau tilepleep izi nugh ŋginaaŋa, luazi itaŋ tighe le tighan aniiŋ popoia imin tau muuŋ tighanghani izi Isip. Tauvene titoov Yoova tapiri izi nugh ŋginaaŋa.
Ve Maaron ilooŋ taŋiiz toozi ve igham lezi gabua tau tighason pani na. Eemon i igham moroghooŋ saghati ivot le ivaghamun zi paam.
Saawe tau tilepleep ila niazi to lepoogh izi nugh ŋginaaŋa, tamtamon toozi siriv tiburig ve tiŋooŋ pa Mose yesuru toogha Aron tau Yoova besooŋa tooni patabuyaaŋ na. Tighe tigham uraat raraate imin yesuru, o poia.
Tauvene taan ikaak, ve Datan gha Abiram tomania ziiri waaro toozi tisov titaptap tizila, ve taan aavo ila ivool muul.
Ra yav ivot, ve ighan tamtamon siriv tau titaghon zi pa ŋgar toozi tawe. Zeran sasaghati tawe, yav yaama ighaniir zi le tisov.
Saawe tau yes Israela tilepleep izi loloz Sinai puughu, tigham gol ve tigharaat makau naatu tamoot anunu, ve tiput aghezi pani ve tipakuru.
Tauvene Maaron toozi tau eeza tiina pa tapiri ve poia tooni na, yes tighur murizi pani. Ve tighur gabua tau ighanghan kikiliiŋ na anunu igham Maaron niia.
Onoon kat, Maaron toozi tau igham uraat tintiina ivotvot izi Isip ve igham mulin zi na, lolozi iveghaini kat.
I igham gabua ŋgeretazi tintiina izi taan to yes Isipa, ve igham uraat tintiina izi Te Siŋsiŋai ziige paam. Uraat tawe, tamtamon tighit zi le roiŋ tiina igham zi. Eemon yes Israela tigham ŋgar pa gabua tana mako.
Tauvene Maaron ighe ivaghamun zi le tisov. Eemon besooŋa tooni Mose tau i tauu isiigho na, iyooz ila Maaron naagho imin sigheu pa yes Israela. Tauta itatan Maaron aatyavyav tooni, ve Maaron ivaghamunia tamtamon tooni mako.
Saawe tau yes Israela tigharau taan Kanaan, yes tirere pa taan poia tau Yoova ighe igham pazi na. Pasaa, tighur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni mako.
Yes lolozi pa loŋaaŋ Yoova aliiŋa mako. Tilepleep iloŋ ila balbaal toozi, ve lolozi ŋurŋuria pa Maaron.
Tauta Yoova niima izaa, ve imbu saveeŋ ariaaŋ ighe: I pale irav zi tisov timataar izi nugh ŋginaaŋa, ve ivarewai paaghu toozi gha timbiriis tirau nugh nugh.
<range>
Murei, ra yes Israela tila tivot loloz Peor. Saawe tana, tipaak yes tau tibesbees pa maaron karom Baal. Pasaa, aniiŋ tau zeran tawe tigham pa maaron maate toozi tawe, yes Israela tighani paam.
Ŋgar tau tighamu na, ipas Yoova aate, le aate yavyav kat. Tauta igham moroghooŋ saghati ivot pazi.
Tauvene Pineas iburig ve irav tamtamon ru tau tizoor Maaron aliiŋa na gha timatmaat. Ra moroghooŋ saghati tawe isov.
Ŋgar tooni tawe, tauta Maaron ighita ighe i ŋeer duduuŋa. Ve Maaron pale maata iŋgalŋgali tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Yes Israela tila tivot yaa Meriba, ve tigham Yoova aate yavyav muul. Saawe tana, tigham pataŋani pa Mose paam.
Pasaa, yes tizoora kat le tipas aate. Tauta igham ŋgar poi mako, ve isik aliiŋa isosor.
Saawe tau tiloŋ tila taan Kanaan, Yoova isaav ariaaŋ pazi ighe tirav yes tau tileep ta sewe na, tisov timataar. Eemon titaghon Yoova aliiŋa mako.
Yesŋa Kanaana tiluplup zi, ve titaghon ŋgar toozi.
Yes tibesbees pa maaron karomŋa toozi, ve ŋgar tawe imin liis pazi.
Ve tigham tauzi natuzŋa zitamoot ve zilivaa, gha tirav zi timaat, imin watooŋrau pa avuvu sasaghati.
Onoon kat, natuzŋa zitamoot ve zilivaa tau lezi sosor eta mako na, ene yes tirav zi timaat imin watooŋrau pa maaron karomŋa to yes Kanaana. Siŋ toozi tau imaliŋ na, ivaghamunia taan toozi le isaghat ila Maaron maata.
Ŋgar tau tighamu na, igham zi tisaghat kat ila Yoova maata. Yes tighur murizi pani, imin livaa tau ipul azaawa ve ila ighurghur boog.
Ŋgar tau tamtamon tooni Israela tighamu na, ene igham Yoova aate yavyav kat, ve loolo pazi mako le mako kat.
Tauta ipul zi tila nugh nugh nimazi. Yes tileep ila koiazŋa sambazi ve anazi tiŋgin zi.
Koiazŋa tawe tighur pataŋani naol pazi, ve titatan zi pa tapirizi, ve tigham zi timin besooŋa toozi.
Pai katini, Yoova ipas yes Israela pa pataŋani toozi. Eemon tighilaal uleeŋ tooni mako, ve tizorzoor aliiŋa, ve titaghon tauzi ŋgar toozi. Ŋgar toozi saghati tawe igham zi tivaghamgham.
Eemon Yoova ighita pataŋani toozi, ve ilooŋ taŋiiz toozi.
Pasaa, maata iŋgal saveeŋ tau imbua tomania timbuzŋa na, ve loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ve iuluul zi. Tauta itatan aatyavyav tooni, ve igham yes tau tikiskis yes Israela na lolozi isaghatin zi ve tigham poghani zi.
<range>
O Yoova, Maaron tsiei, ugham mulin ghei ila koiamaiŋa nimazi! Ughita. Aazne, nileep irau nugh nugh. Uyau ghei, ve ulup ghei ila taan tsiei muul. Leso lolomai poia payo, ve nipait ezam patabuyaaŋ. Ve matamai iŋgal yo ezam ve tapirim tiina irau saawe.
Iit tapait Yoova pa poia tooni. I Maaron to iit Israela. Tapaiti ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila! Ve eval tiina aat tisaav tighe: “Onoon kat.” Aleluia! Tapait Yoova!
Lolomim poia pa Yoova ve apaiti. Pasaa, i poia kat. Loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ariaaŋ, ve iuluul zi irau saawe.
Yes tau Yoova igham mulin zi ila koiazŋa nimazi na, irau tisavia saveeŋ tane. Pasaa, i iyooz pazi ve ipas zi tivot pa pataŋani toozi, ve igham zi tileep poi.
Muuŋ, koiazŋa tigham zi tila tileep irau nugh nugh. Siriv tileep ila pa nugh tau aaz izazaa pani, ve siriv tileep ila pa nugh tau aaz izila. Siriv tileep ila pa ragh puughu, ve siriv tileep ila pa yavaar puughu. Eemon Yoova iyau zi timuul tilam pa tauzi nugh toozi.
Tamtamon siriv, tivalaghlaagh izi nugh ŋginaaŋa tau le yaa mako na. Ve tiliil eez tighe tila nugh eta, leso tileep ta sewe. Eemon tindeeŋ eez eta mako.
Pitool zi, ve murun zi, le tapirizi isov.
Tauvene tileep saghat. Eemon saawe tau titaŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, i iuul zi pa pataŋani toozi tawe.
Ve itotoi zi pa eez tau duduuŋa ve tuuku. Tauta titaghoni ve rekia tila tivot nugh poia ve tileep ta sewe.
Tauvene yes irau lolozi poia pa Yoova ve tipaiti pa poia tooni. Pasaa, i loolo isaghav iit tamtamon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat ŋgeretazi to iuul iit tamtamon.
Yes tau murun zi, i ighamgham yaa pazi to tighun ve isooŋ zi. Ve yes tau pitool zi, i irao zi pa gabua popoia le tirau kat.
Tamtamon siriv, yes tileep ila ndoroom tiina loolo, ve rigmon kanaŋ timaat. Yes tileep ila ruum to yavyavuuŋ loolo, ve ravraav tomania sen ighan nimazi ma aghezi le tisaghat kat.
Pasaa, tizorzoor Maaron aliiŋa. Maaron Tiina Tau Iliiv Zimaronŋa Tisov na, yes tivevelegh saveeŋ tooni imin kaut sorok.
Tauta i ighur uraat pataŋani kat izaa toozi, leso itatan zi. Yes irau tilaagh duduuŋ mako, ve titaptap tizizi. Pasaa, tibadbaad gabua pataŋani. Ve lezi tamtamon eta to iuul zi mako.
Tauvene tileep saghat. Eemon saawe tau titaŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, i iuul zi pa pataŋani toozi tawe.
I ipas zi tivot pa ndoroom tiina tawe loolo, ve igham zi tivot tila ghazooŋa. Ve ikuup motin ravraav tomania sen pa nimazi ma aghezi.
Tauvene yes irau lolozi poia pa Yoova ve tipaiti pa poia tooni. Pasaa, i loolo isaghav iit tamtamon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat ŋgeretazi to iuul iit tamtamon.
Ataman ariaŋazi to ruum to yavyavuuŋ tau tigharaat zi pa mbaras na, i irav valaghin zi. Ve ain ariaŋazi tau tipapalot ataman na, i iŋgoor polpolin zi.
Tamtamon siriv, yes tighamgham ŋgar to borauŋa ve tinoknok zoraaŋ saveeŋ. Yes tighamgham sosor, tauvene timorooŋ ve yavyavuuŋ tiina igham zi.
Lolozi pa ghaniiŋ aniiŋ eta mako. Isaav ighe tighita aniiŋ eta, ene pale atezi inaunau ve tilulu. Tauvene tileep ila naal aavo wa.
Yes tileep saghat. Eemon saawe tau titaŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, i iuul zi pa pataŋani toozi tawe.
I isaav, ve tinizi popoia muul. Muuŋ, tileep ila naal aavo. Ve i igham mulin zi pa mateegh.
Tauvene yes irau lolozi poia pa Yoova ve tipaiti pa poia tooni. Pasaa, i loolo isaghav iit tamtamon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat ŋgeretazi to iuul iit tamtamon.
Tauvene yes aat lolozi poia pa uraat tintiina tau i igham pazi na, ve tigham watooŋrau pani. Ve timbou toman aliŋazi tiina to tipakuru, ve tisavia uraat tooni tawe.
Tamtamon siriv, yes tizaa waaŋ, ve tiraav tila nugh malau to tiraukol.
Yes tighit katin Yoova tapiri, ve uraat tintiina tau i ighamghamu ila te paavo.
Pasaa, i isaav ariaaŋ, ve yaghur tiina izaa, le ipei dibom tintiina.
Dibom tintiina tawe iit waaŋ toozi izala kat, ve ipuli izi le rigmon kanaŋ izal izila mazavan tiina loolo. Tauvene roiŋ tiina igham zi le tapirizi isov.
Ve tivataptap imin tamtamon tau ighun gha ivaghamgham. Yes to te tiwatagh ghamuuŋ pooz. Eemon tirau gabua eta mako.
Tauvene tileep saghat. Eemon saawe tau titaŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, i iuul zi pa pataŋani toozi tawe.
I igham yaghur aate izi, ve dibom imaat.
Yes tighita taun izi, le lolozi poia. Ve Yoova igham zi tila tilooŋ nugh tau tighe tila pani na.
Tauvene yes irau lolozi poia pa Yoova ve tipaiti pa poia tooni. Pasaa, i loolo isaghav iit tamtamon ve iuluul ghiit. Ve ighamgham uraat ŋgeretazi to iuul iit tamtamon.
Tauvene isaav ighe eval tiina tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ, zeran tawe aat tila tomani zi ve tiyoor Yoova eeza. Ve saawe tau yes ŋginiiŋa tilup zi, zeran tawe aat tipait Yoova eeza ila naghozi paam.
Yoova irau igham yaa tintiina timaak le tigorgor kat, imin nugh tau le yaa mako na. Ve yaa tau tivotvot ila taan loolo na paam, i irau ipoon zi le taan loolo igorgor.
Isaav ighe nugh eta tinoknok ghamuuŋ ŋgar saghati, i irau ivaghamunia taan toozi tau ŋgoreeŋa tiina na, leso isaghat, ve gabua eta itum ila muul mako.
Ve isaav ighe nugh eta le yaa mako, i irau igham yaa ivot pani, ve ireer tiina. Taan tau loolo gorgori na, i irau igham yaa ivot pani.
Yes tau pitool zi na, i igham zi tila tileep ila taan poia tawe, ve tighamu imin lezi nugh to lepoogh.
Tauvene yes tivazogh aniiŋ ve vaen ila, le tighita anooŋa katini tivot.
Yoova ighur poia tooni izazaa toozi, tauta timasa timin eval. Ve maata pa makau, mekmek, ve sipsip toozi paam, le timasa timin naol.
Isaav ighe tamtamon to Maaron koiazŋa titatan zi le tapirizi isov, ve tigham saghatin zi le tileep saghat toman lolozi ipataŋan,
ene pale Yoova iuul zi, ve itatan daaba to koiazŋa tawe. Pale igham zi tivaghamgham, ve tivalaghlaagh izi nugh ŋginaaŋa tau eez eta igheen ila mako.
Eemon yes tau tileep ila pataŋani loolo ve mbolaaŋ igham zi na, i ipaghau zi pa pataŋani toozi, ve maata pazi le timasa timin eval.
Ŋgar tooni tawe, zeran duduŋazi tighita, le lolozi poia kat. Ve zeran sasaghati tisov lezi saveeŋ eta muul mako. Saveeŋ toozi isov.
Tamtamon tau ighe le ŋgar, i aat igham ŋgar poi pa gabua tane, ve maata iŋgalŋgal ŋgar to Yoova tau loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ve iuluul zi.

Maaron, lolog ruru payo mako. Lolog isaghav ghom, ve naghur ilat tsiam ariaaŋ. Tauvene nasaav pa taug naghe: “Uburig ve umbou to upait Maaron!”
Lolog ighur naghe nughitun, o naburig, ve nagharaat taug, ve naravrav ambam tomania gita ila ila le aaz pisikia izaa.
Tiina tsiau, yau aat napait ghom pa poia tsio ila tamtamon to nugh nugh matazi. Pale yeŋa tamtamon to nughmariŋ nilup ghei pa suŋuuŋ, ve nait mbouŋ to napait ghom.
O Yoova, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio, ve uluul zi. Ŋgar tsio tana, ene tiina le tiina kat. Izala izala le ikis sambam. Ve ŋgar to taghoniiŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio tauvene paam. Izala le ikis taitai.
Maaron, eval tiina aat tipait ezam izala le izala kat, iliv sambam saamba. Ve tipakur ghom pa tapirim ve poia tsio irau taan isov!
Maaron, yei tamtamon tsio. Lolom igheen tsiei kat. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau tane, ve utotoi tapirim ve uul ghei. Ugham mulin ghei pa pataŋani tane.
Muuŋ, Maaron ileep izi nugh tooni patabuyaaŋ, ve isaav ighe: “Yau naparav le naliiv koiagŋa wa. Tauta lolog poia ve navalagh taan Sekem ve nugh duduuŋa to Sukot, ve nareii irau tamtamon tsiau.
Taan sirivu to Gileat, ve taan to yes Manase paam, ene yau tsiau. Yes Epraima timin hat ariaaŋa to ipoon dabag pa malmal. Ve yes Yuda timin titi tau nakisi imin ilaal pa pooz tsiau.
Taan sirivu to Moap, ene imin oon tsiau to ririwaaŋ. Ve taan sirivu to Edoma, ene nugh tau nasik zuzuuŋa to agheg pani. Ve yes Pilistia, yau naparav tomani zi le naliiv zi. Tauta tintinig ve aliŋag izaa.”
Sei irau igham ghau naliiv koiagŋa ve naloŋ nala nugh toozi tau didiiŋ ariaaŋa ilivuti na? Sei pale imuuŋ payau, ve igherev ghau nala navot taan sirivu to yes Edom?
Ite paam mako. Yo mon. Eemon Maaron, aazne yo ughur murim payei, ve upaak zaaba tsiei muul mako.
Maaron, uul ghei, leso niliiv koiamaiŋa. Pasaa, uleeŋ tau nighamghamu ila to tamtamon, ene anooŋa mako.
Eemon isaav ighe Maaron ilam tomani ghei, ene aat niliiv zi. I irau itatan zi, le tapirizi isov kat.
O Maaron, saawe isov yau napapait ghom. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau. Uneneeŋ sov!
Pasaa, zeran sasaghati tau avozi karom na, tighurghur koi payau, ve tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ karom naol payau.
Koiagŋa tawe tisiksik saveeŋ sasaghati payau, ve tivaghamunia ezag sorok.
Muuŋ, yau lolog pazi, ve naghamgham ŋgar poia pazi. Eemon tiyat ŋgar poia ta nagham pazi na pa ŋgar saghati, ve tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ naol payau. Eemon yau ŋeer to suŋuuŋ.
Ŋgar poia tau yau naghamgham pazi na, yes tiyatu pa ŋgar saghati. Yau lolog pazi. Eemon yes tighur koi payau, ve tighe:
“Taghur tamtamon saghati eta iyooz ila ziige to iŋgal saveeŋ pani. Leso saawe tau tipayooze pa savsaveeŋ, tighita tighe i isosor, ve tighur atuya pani. Ve nighe suŋuuŋ tooni paam, ene isosor ila Maaron maata.
<range>
Ŋeer tawe ileep malau izi taan sov. Tamtamon ite paam aat igham niia ve igham uraat tooni, o poia.
Azaawa pale imin naar, ve natŋa timin parooŋa.
Pale tireu natŋa ruum toozi tizi, ve tinaan zi tighawaar. Leso tivaghamgham, tivalaghlaagh, ve tisuŋsuŋ lezi gabua.
Isaav ighe ŋeer tawe igham bun ila to tamtamon eta, ene pale tamtamon tana ilam ve iyauur gabua tooni isov imin le. Gabua tau i ighun punita pani na, zeran to nugh ite pale tilam ve tighamuur zi.
Tamtamon eta igham poghania ŋeer tawe sov. Ve natŋa tau timin parooŋa na, tamtamon eta loolo isaghatin zi ve iuul zi sov.
Natŋa timataar le tisov, o poia. Leso ŋeer tawe eeza igheen muul sov, ve tamtamon lolozi iveegh pani.
Ŋgar saghati to timŋa, tamtamon pale tisavia pa Yoova, leso maata iŋgalŋgali. Ve sosor to tiina paam, Yoova ireua sov.
Tauvene sosor to ŋeer tawe tomania ziiri waaro tooni, Yoova pale maata iŋgalŋgali irau saawe, ve ipasovuur zi pa taan. Leso tamtamon lolozi iveghai zi kat.
Pasaa, ŋeer tawe maata iŋgal ve igham ŋgar poia eta pa tamtamon mako. Yes mbolaaŋa ve yes tau tileep ila pataŋani loolo na, i ighamgham saghatin zi, ve iravrav zi timatmaat.
Ŋgar to avoon saghati pa tamtamon, i loolo pani kat. Eemon saveeŋ tooni saghati tawe pale imuul pa tauu, ve ivaghamunia. Ŋgar to tasuŋ Maaron leso ighur poia tooni izaa to tamtamon, ŋeer tawe loolo pani mako. Tauvene poia to Maaron pale igheen malau pani.
Ŋgar to avoon saghati pa tamtamon, i ipulpuli mako. Ene imin nonoghiiŋa tau i loolo pani kat, ve inonogh ghi pani irau saawe. Eemon saveeŋ tooni saghati tawe pale imuul pa tauu, ve izila loolo imin yaa, ve ila irau tuua ta naol ne imin ŋgoreeŋ, ve ivaghamunia.
Saveeŋ tooni saghati tawe, pale imuul pa tauu ve ikauu, imin kawaal tau i ikawaala ila ŋgaali ve ipuusa pa puus irau saawe.”
O Yoova, saveeŋ sasaghati tau koiagŋa tiŋgalŋgali payau ne, upamuule ila pa tauzi. Leso uyat ŋgar toozi tawe.
Yoova, yo Maaron tsiau. Ezam tiina pa poia tsio ve uleeŋ tsio. Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi irau saawe. Tauvene uyooz payau, ve upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau tane.
Pasaa, aazne naleep saghat, ve leg eez eta mako. Tauvene ateg ipaparav ve lolog isaghat kat.
Yau namin gabua yavyaava tau ighe aaz izila, mako taghita muul mako. Yau namin siis tau yaghur ivuvuura gha ila.
Yau naŋgun taug pa ghaniiŋ aniiŋ alok wa. Tauvene nakoŋkoŋ, ve tuag isov peria, ve agheg imatmaat.
Isaav ighe koiagŋa tighit ghau, ene tivevelegh ghau ve tiŋiŋiŋ payau. Ve titurun luazi payau ve tighe: “Aa, ughita wa?”
Yoova, yo Maaron tsiau. Uul ghau lak! Ugham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau tane. Pasaa, lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio, ve uluul zi.
Ugham koiagŋa tiwatagh yo nimam. Utotoi tapirim pazi ve tighit katini pa matazi. Leso tighilaal tighe yo ta Volaaŋa tsiau.
Onoon, yes avozi saghati payau. Eemon yo pale ughur poia tsio izaa tsiau. Isaav ighe koiagŋa tipaburigin malmal payau, yo pale utatan zi, ve upamuul zi tila toman mayazi. Leso ugham besooŋa tsio loolo poia ve tintini.
Tauvene yes tau tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ payau ne, ugham zi tivaghamgham, ve tighau tila toman mayazi. Mayaŋa tana pale imin lezi nonoghiiŋa to tinonogh zi pani irau saawe.
Eemon yau aat lolog poia kat pa Yoova, ve avog ipaiti pa poia tooni toman aliŋag tiina. Saawe tau yeŋa eval tiina nilup ghei pa suŋuuŋ, yau aat nayoor eeza.
Pasaa, yes tau tileep ila pataŋani loolo ve titaŋ raraini pa uleeŋ na, i iyozyooz zigezi to iuul zi. Ve yes tau koiazŋa tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ pazi ve tighe tirav zi timaat na, i igham mulin zi.
Yoova isaav pa Tiina tsiau ighe: “Ulam mbolem izi ila pa nimag tapir, le irau natatan koiamŋa ve tapirizi isov kat, ve uvaghaaz zi ila aghem saamba.”
O kinik, aazne yo ulepleep izi nugh Zion, ve Yoova igham titi to kinik payo to ipapalot ghom. Tauta tapirim tiina ve pooz tsio ila irau nugh nugh. Yoova isaav payo ighe: “Utatan koiamŋa tau tilivutin ghom na, ve ugham zi tileep ila sambam.”
Isaav ighe uburig ughe ula pa malmal, tamtamon tsio ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ pale lolozi ipazaagh zi tighe tilat gha yamŋa ala. Isaav ighe aaz pisikia izaa, geegeu tsio tau tirao pa malmal na, pale timeke tilat, ve tileep tirau loloz patabuyaaŋa tau tilivutin Yerusalem na, imin uwam to mboŋoozo itav kikiliiŋ.
Yoova imbu saveeŋ tomani ghom, ve ipariaaŋa le iyaryaaŋ kat. Irau itoor ŋgar tooni mako. Isaav payo ighe: “Yo ŋeer to watooŋrau imin Melkizedek. Ve yo aat uleep tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.”
Maaron ileep ila pa nimam tapir ve ipapalot ghom. Saawe to aatyavyav tooni ighe ivot, i pale ipaburigin malmal ve iravuur yes kinik tisov.
Pale ighur atuya pa nugh nugh, ve irav zi timataar le patazi tizi tivaghengheen ila taan. Tauvene yes pooza tau tileep irau taan na, i pale iravuur zi le tisov.
Ve kinik tsiei, i pale ighun yaa tau ireer igharau eez ziige na, le tapiri ivot muul. Tauvene i pale iliiv malmal, ve tiini izaa.
Aleluia, tapait Yoova! Isaav ighe zeran duduŋazi tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ, yau aat nala tomani zi, ve napakur Yoova toman lolog isov.
Pasaa, Yoova ighamgham uraat tintiina. Tauvene yes tau lolozi pa uraat tooni kat na, tighamgham ŋgar pa uraat tooni irau saawe tighe le tiwatagh katini.
Uraat tooni itotoi ighe i tapiri tiina ve poia kat. Tauta tamtamon titandagh pani. Ŋgar tooni duduuŋa pale ighengheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
I ipaburigin ŋgar toit, leso mataan kisin uraat tooni ŋgeretazi. I loolo isasaghatin tamtamon tooni, ve ighamgham poghani zi.
Yes tau tiroi pani ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i ighamgham lezi aniiŋ. Ve saveeŋ tau yesŋa tamtamon tooni timbua to tivalupu zi timin eemon na, i maata iŋgalŋgali ve itataghoni irau saawe.
Muuŋ, i igham uraat tintiina ila tamtamon tooni matazi, leso itotoi tapiri pazi. Saawe tana, i igham taan to nugh nugh imin lezi to tileep ila.
Uraat naol tau i igham zi na, ene itotoia ighe i itataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni, ve ŋgar tooni iduduuŋ mon. Tauvene tutuuŋ isov tau i ighur zi na, iit aat taghur ila ve tataghon duduŋai zi.
Tutuuŋ naol tawe pale iyaryaaŋ tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Yoova ighur tutuuŋ tawe itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni ve ŋgar duduuŋa.
Muuŋ, i ipas tamtamon tooni tivot pa pataŋani toozi. Ve saawe tau yesŋa timbu saveeŋ to tivalupu zi timin eemon, aavo iyaryaaŋ pazi ighe titaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ toozi tawe ŋgara irau saawe. I tapiri tiina ve eeza patabuyaaŋ kat. Tauta taroi pani, ve tataghon ŋgar tooni.
Ŋgar to taroi pa Yoova ve tataghon ŋgar tooni, ene imin puughu pa ŋgar poia. Yes tau titaghon saveeŋ tooni na, tiwatagh eez to tigham lepoogh poia. Tauvene iit aat tapakuru irau saawe!
Aleluia, tapait Yoova! Ŋeer tau ighe iroi pa Yoova ve itaghon ŋgar tooni, ve tutuuŋ to Yoova ighamu loolo poia, ene aat tintini ve poia to Maaron izazaa tooni.
Ve paaghu tooni pale timin zeran tau ezazi tintiina. Tauvene yes tau tiduduuŋ ila Maaron maata na, tamtamon to taan tane pale titandagh pa paaghu toozi ve poia to Maaron izazaa toozi.
Zeran duduŋazi, ruum toozi ivon kat pa kuaz ve gabua popoia katini. Ve ŋgar toozi duduuŋa pale igheen ariaaŋ tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Isaav ighe ŋeer duduuŋa eta ileep ndoroom tiina loolo, ene pale ghazooŋa to Maaron isulu. Tamtamon tauvene, loolo isasaghatin tamtamon, ve ighamgham poghani zi, ve itotoi ŋgar duduuŋa pazi.
Tamtamon tau ighe maata reiŋ gabua, ve iyokia gabua tooni pa uleeŋ tamtamon, ve itaghon ŋgar duduuŋa mon pa uraat tooni, ene pale ileep poia.
Tamtamon duduuŋa tauvene, tovaaŋ eta irau ighamu itap ne mako. Ve tamtamon pale matazi iŋgalŋgali pa ŋgar poia tooni tawe taghon taghon gha ila.
Isaav ighe ilooŋ gabua saghati eta vaaru, i irau iroi mako. Pasaa, inumeer Yoova ve ghuruuŋ ila tooni iyaryaaŋ kat.
Tauvene roiŋ irau ighamu mako. Iyozyooz ariaaŋ, le ighita Maaron itatan koiŋa.
I maata iŋgalŋgal yes mbolaaŋa, ve ireirei gabua pazi. Ŋgar tooni duduuŋa pale igheen ariaaŋ tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Tauvene eeza pale imin tiina, ve tamtamon titandagh pani.
Zeran sasaghati tighita ŋgar tau ivotvot pani na, le atezi yavyav ve tiŋaaŋ maripazi pani. Eemon irau tigham ŋgar eta pani mako. Pale saghatiiŋ ivot pazi ve tilalez. Tauvene gabua popoia tau tighurghur matazi pani na, ene irau ivot pazi mako.
Aleluia, tapait Yoova! Yam besooŋa to Yoova, apakuru, ve apait eeza.
Apait Yoova pa poia tooni ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila!
Yam tau aleep ila pa aaz izaa, ve ila pa yam tau aleep ila pa aaz izila, apait Yoova eeza!
Yoova ileep saaŋa kat, ve nughmariŋ tileep ila i saamba. Eeza ve tapiri iliiv gabua naol isov to sambam.
Sei ta irao Maaron tsiei Yoova? Eta imin i mako. I ilepleep ila niia to ghamuuŋ pooz tau igheen saaŋa kat.
Tauvene i aat maata izila le izila kat ta siiŋa geeg we, o ighita gabua to sambam saamba ve taan.
Eemon yes tau lezi ezazi mako, ve yes mbolaaŋa tau monmon tilala nugh to sikiiŋ pen ve tiliil lezi aniiŋ na, i loolo iveghai zi mako. I ipapakur zi ve iuluul zi, leso tileep poi toman tintinizi. Tauvene yes irau tileep tomania yes daaba tau tighamgham pooz pa tamtamon.
<range>
Ve yes zilivaa tau upazi na, i ighamgham lezi niazi popoia to lepoogh, ve ighamgham lezi natuzŋa. Tauvene tileep tomania natuzŋa tawe, ve lolozi poia kat. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
Muuŋ, Israela tipul Isip ve tila. Yakop paaghu tooni tipul tamtamon tau aliŋazi ite na, ve tivot.
Indeeŋ tana, yes Yuda timin Yoova niia patabuyaaŋ to lepoogh. Ve yes Israela, tileep ila i niima ve iŋgin zi.
Saawe tau Te Siŋsiŋai ighita Yoova tamtamon tooni tilam, i iroi ve ighau. Ve yaa Yordan ighit zi, le ipamuule iloŋ ila ve ipot imin yaa naliu.
Ve loloz tauvene paam. Yogyoog itok le tiyatyaat imin mekmek. Ve nugh mbua mbua tiyatyaat imin sipsip natŋa.
O te, saa gabua ivot payo, ta ughau? Ve yaa Yordan, puughu mindai ta utoor ghom ve umuul uzala?
Ve yam loloz ve nugh mbua mbua, ayatyaat pasaa?
O taan, uyamaan ghom! Malau mako pale Yoova ilam. Paita Maaron to Yakop ilam, ve itotoi tapiri payo.
I ta igham yaa ivot ila maet, ve izi ipot imin yaa naliu. Onoon kat, i igham yaa ivot ila maet ariaaŋa, ve ireer izi.
O Yoova, yei lolomai pa tamtamon tipait ezamai mako. Tipait yo ezam pa tapirim ve poia tsio, o poi. Pasaa, lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi, ve utaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio irau saawe. Tauvene utotoi tapirim ve uul ghei.
Mako pale nugh nugh tivelegh ghom, ve tisaav payei tighe: “Aa, Maaron tsiam ileep sindei?”
Eemon yei niwatagh: Maaron tsiei, i ileep izi sambam. Ve saa ŋgar tau i ighe ighamu, ene ighamu mon.
Nugh nugh tighagharaat maaron toozi pa silva ma gol. Maaron karomŋa tawe, tamtamon tigharaat zi pa nimazi.
Yes lezi avozi. Eemon tisavsaav mako. Ve lezi matazi. Eemon tighita nugh mako.
Yes lezi taliŋazi. Eemon tilooŋ saveeŋ mako. Ve lezi uzuzi. Eemon tinuŋuz gabua eta vaazi mako.
Yes lezi aghezi. Eemon irau tilaagh mako. Ve lezi nimazi. Eemon irau tikis gabua eta ve tiyamaana mako. Onoon kat, saveeŋ ma taŋiiz eta ivot pa avozi mako.
Tamtamon tau tighagharaat maaron karomŋa tauvene ve tinumeer zi, ene tisov timin maaron toozi tawe. Tirau gabua eta mako.
Yam eval tiina to Israel, anumeer Yoova. Pasaa, i ta Uleeŋa tsiam, ve imin sigheu payam.
Ve yam to watooŋrau tau avot ila to Aron na paam, anumeer Yoova! Pasaa, i ta Uleeŋa tsiam, ve imin sigheu payam.
Tauvene yam tau aroi pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar tooni na, yam asov anumeera. Pasaa, i ta Uleeŋa tsiam, ve imin sigheu payam.
Yoova maata iŋgalŋgal ghei. Ve i pale ighur poia tooni izaa tsiei. Pale ighur poia tooni izaa to yes to watooŋrau tau tivot ila to Aron na, ve ighur poia tooni izaa to eval tiina to Israel paam.
Tauvene yes tau tiroi pani ve titaghon ŋgar tooni na, i pale ighur poia tooni izaa toozi tisov. Yes tau lezi ezazi mako, ve yes tau ezazi tintiina na paam.
Yoova pale igham gham tomania paaghu tsiam amasa amin naol.
Yoova ta ighur sambam ve taan. I pale ighur poia tooni izaa tsiam.
Sambam, ene Yoova nugh tooni. Ve taan, ene i igham pa iit tamtamon to taleep ila.
Yes tau timaat gha tizila mateegha niazi na, eta aavo luutu mako. Tineneeŋ mon. Irau tipait Yoova muul mako.
Eemon iit tau taleep mataan yaryaare, o loloon poia pa Yoova, ve tapaiti pa poia tooni. Ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
Yau lolog igheen to Yoova kat pasaa, i ilooŋ taŋiiz tsiau. Yau nataŋ raraini pa uleeŋ, ve i ighur taliiŋa payau ve iuul ghau. Tauvene saawe tau naleep izi taan, suŋuuŋ tsiau aat iŋaruini irau saawe.
<range>
Liis to mateegh, rigmon kanaŋ igham ghau. Ravraav to mateegh ikaukau ghau, ve ighe igherev ghau nazila nugh to mateegha. Tauvene igham lolog ipataŋan, ve roiŋ tiina igham ghau.
Tauta nataŋ rarai Yoova naghe: “O Yoova, paita namaat tane. Uul ghau lak!”
Yoova loolo isasaghatin ghiit, ve ighamgham poghani ghiit. Ŋgar tooni, ene iduduuŋ mon.
Yes tau irau tiuul tauzi mako na, Yoova tauu iŋgin zi, ve iuluul zi. Imin yau. Saawe tau pataŋani itatan ghau le tapirig imbool, i ilam ve igham mulin ghau.
Tauta aazne, ateg izi ve lolog poia muul. Pasaa, Yoova igham poghani ghau kat.
Onoon kat, i igham mulin ghau pa mateegh, ve ipasov taŋiiz tsiau. Ve i ta ikiskis ghau. Tauta natap mako, ve aazne naleep matag yaryaare. Ve laghooŋ tsiau, nazuari ghau naghe le nataghon ŋgar tau iduduuŋ ila Yoova maata.
<range>
Muuŋ, yau nasaav pa taug naghe: “Pataŋani tiina igham ghau le naleep saghat.” Eemon nakis ghuruuŋ ila tsiau tuŋia.
Pataŋani tawe igham ghau nail eez. Tauvene nasik saveeŋ sorok naghe: “Tamtamon tisov, avozi karom mon. Irau nanumeer eta mako.”
Pale nagham saa pa Yoova to nayat ŋgar popoia maata maata tau i ighamgham zi payau ne?
Yau aat nagham rubruub vaen, ve naliŋi izala watooŋrau tsiau paavo to napaiti, ve nasuŋ pani toman lolog poia. Pasaa, i igham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau.
Tauvene saawe tau Yoova tamtamon tooni tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ, yau aat nataghon saveeŋ tau nambua pani na, ve nagham uratoini ila matazi.
Yes tau lolozi isaghav Yoova ariaaŋ ve titaghon eez tooni na, i loolo igheen toozi kat. Tauvene i irau ighita mateegh to toozi eta imin kaut sorok ne mako.
O Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Nabesbees payo imin muuŋ tinaŋ ibesbees payo. Muuŋ, naleep saghat imin tikau ghau pa ravraav. Eemon yo upoola payau, tauta aazne naleep poi.
Tauvene yau aat nagham watooŋrau payo, ve nasuŋ payo toman lolog poia, ve napait ghom.
Saawe tau Yoova tamtamon tooni tizala Yerusalem, ve tilup zi pa suŋuuŋ iloŋ ila sirsiir to rumei tooni loolo, yau aat nataghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsiau tane, ve nagham uratoini ila matazi. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
<range>
Yam tamtamon to nugh nugh, apait Yoova! Yam tau aleep irau taan na, asov ayoor eeza.
Pasaa, poia tooni, ene tiina le tiina kat. I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ve iuluul zi irau saawe. Ve ŋgar to taghoniiŋ saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni paam, ighengheen tauvene, taghon taghon gha ila. Aleluia, tapait Yoova!
Lolomim poia pa Yoova ve apaiti! Pasaa, i poia kat. I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ve iuluul zi.
Yam eval tiina to Israel, alup avomim ve asaav aghe: “I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni, ve iuluul zi.”
Ve yam to watooŋrau tau avot ila to Aron na paam, asaav aghe: “I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni, ve iuluul zi.”
Tauvene yam tau aroi pa Yoova ve ataghon ŋgar tooni na, asov asaav aghe: “I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni, ve iuluul zi.”
Muuŋ, yau naleep ila pataŋani tiina loolo ve leg eez mako. Tauvene nataŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ. Ve i ilooŋ aliŋag, ve ipas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau. Tauta aazne naleep ila nugh ghazooŋa.
Isaav ighe Yoova ileep zigeg, yau irau naroi mako. Pasaa, tamtamon pale tigham saa payau?
Yoova ivool tsiau, ve iuluul ghau. I aat itatan koiagŋa ila matag, ve naliiv zi.
Iit tanumeer tamtamon to taan sov. Tanumeer Yoova ve tayooŋ ila tooni, o poia.
Yes daaba tau tighamgham pooz na paam, tanumeer zi sov. Tanumeer Yoova ve tayooŋ ila tooni, o poia.
Muuŋ, nugh nugh tilam tilivutin ghau tighe tigham malmal payau. Eemon Yoova, tauta napasov zi.
Tiŋarui ghau tilam, ve tilivutin ghau, le leg sooso eta to naghau mako. Eemon Yoova, tauta napasov zi.
Yes timorau ghau imin ŋgururuuv. Eemon Yoova, tauta napasov zi, le tapirizi isov. Yes timin yav tau ighan regh gha iyaryaar, ve rekia mon imaat.
Yes tipaburigin malmal payau, ve rigmon kanaŋ titatan ghau. Eemon Yoova iuul ghau, tauta tivaghamun ghau mako.
Pasaa, i Uleeŋa tsiau ariaaŋa. Yau naghamgham tapirig ila tooni, ve i imin sigheu payau. Tauta nambou mbouŋ to napait eeza.
Alooŋ. Zeran duduŋazi tilepleep ila balbaal toz toz, ve tiyoryoor Yoova eeza toman lolozi poia. Pasaa, i iliiv koiazŋa wa. Tisavsaav tighe: “Yoova niima tapir, ene pataŋani.
Niima iparav ariaaŋ kat. I igharaat ghi pa malmal, ve iparav le iliiv koiŋa!”
Yau irau namaat soone. Pale naleep matag yaryaare. Leso navotia uraat tintiina tau Yoova ighamgham zi.
Onoon, i ilos katin ghau. Eemon ipul ghau namaat mako.
Tauvene akaak ataman to zeran duduŋazi payau. Leso nataghoni naloŋ nala, ve napait Yoova pa ŋgar tau i igham payau na.
Ene ataman to Yoova. Yes tau tiduduuŋ ila i maata, o titaghoni tiloŋ tila.
Yoova, yo ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau, ve ugham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau. Tauvene lolog poia payo ve napait ghom.
Maet tau yes to raoŋ ruum matazi veleghini ve tisiki ilale, tauta imin puughu pa ruum, leso ipaloti ve ruum iyooz ariaaŋ izala paavo.
Maaron tauu igham gabua tane ivot. Ve yei nighita imin gabua ŋgereeta ee ila matamai.
Saawe ta aazne, Yoova ighuru. Tauvene tintiniin ve loloon poia pani.
O Yoova, lolom isaghatin ghei ve ugham mulin ghei! Uul ghei, leso gabua naol isov ivot poi payei.
Ŋeer tane ilam pa Yoova eeza. Tauvene poia to Yoova aat izaa tooni. Yei tau nileep ila Yoova rumei tooni loolo na, nighasoni nighe ighur poia tooni izaa tsiam.
Yoova, i Maaron tauu! I igham poghani ghiit, ve ghazooŋa tooni isul ghiit. Akis tuum raua ve ala alivutin artaal ve apakuru.
Yo Maaron tsiau. Yau lolog poia payo ve napait ghom pa poia tsio. Onoon kat, yo ta Maaron tsiau. Tauvene yau aat nayoor ezam.
Apait Yoova pa poia tooni toman lolomim poia. Pasaa, i poia kat. I loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni, ve iuluul zi irau saawe.
Yes tau tighamgham sosor mako, ve laghooŋ toozi iduduuŋ mon itaghon saveeŋ to Yoova, ene aat poia tooni izazaa toozi ve tintinizi.
Yes tau matazi kisin eez tau Maaron ighuru pa tamtamon tooni na, ve titaghoni irau saawe, ve tighur lolozi isov iŋarui Maaron, ve tizuari zi to tiwataghi kat, ve yes tau tighamgham sosor mako, ve laghooŋ toozi, titaghon Maaron eez tooni, ene pale tintinizi pa poia to Maaron tau izaa toozi.
<range>
Yoova, yo ughe nitaghon tutuuŋ tsio eŋaeŋa ŋgara le nitaghoni kat.
Tutuuŋ tsio tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, yau naghe le nayaryaaŋ pa taghoniiŋ zi.
Pa ighe matag iŋgalŋgal tutuuŋ tsio tisov, ene irau mayag ila eval tiina matazi mako.
Eez tsio to gabizooŋ gabua, ene iduduuŋ mon. Isaav ighe upaghazoŋai ghau pani, ene aat lolog poia payo, ve napait ghom toman lolog ŋgalaaŋa.
Tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, yau aat matag kisin zi ve nataghon zi irau saawe. Tauvene ughur murim payau sov.
Isaav ighe ŋeer paaghu eta maata iŋgal tauu ve ighe laghooŋ tooni iŋgalaaŋ mon ila yo matam, ene pale igham saa? I aat maata iŋgal aliŋam ve itaghoni.
Yau naghur lolog isov iŋarui ghom, ve nazuari ghau naghe le nawatagh katin ghom. Tauvene upul ghau nasapir pa tutuuŋ tsio sov.
Yau naghita aliŋam imin gabua tauu. Tauvene naghur poghania ila lolog. Leso ipalot ghau, ve nagham sosor payo sov.
O Yoova, yau napait ghom pa poia tsio. Upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Tutuuŋ tsio naol tau yo uvoti zi na, avog pale isavi zi le tisov.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei na, saawe tau nataghoni, ene igham lolog poia kat, imin yes tau tipakur zi pa kuaz to taan.
Matag itaghon tutuuŋ tsio eŋaeŋa ŋgara naghe le naghazooŋ pazi. Ve matag iŋgalŋgal eez tsio irau saawe.
Tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, tigham lolog poia le poia kat. Irau lolog iveegh pa aliŋam mako.
O Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Utotoi poia tsio payau. Leso naleep poia, ve nataghon aliŋam irau saawe.
Upaghazoŋai ŋgar tsiau, leso naghilaal ŋgar popoia naol tau tighenaar ila saveeŋ tsio loolo na.
Taan tane, ene nugh tsiau duduuŋ mako. Yau naleep namin loom pani mon. Tauvene ugham ghau naghazooŋ pa tutuuŋ tsio naol ŋgara.
Saawe isov, yau napasawal naghe le utotoi ghau pa eez tsio to gabizooŋ gabua, o poi!
Yes tau tivelegh ghom ve tipapait tauzi na, yo uyaonyaon zi, ve aatyavyav tsio izazaa toozi. Pasaa, tisasapir pa tutuuŋ tsio.
Ve yau, o matag kisin eez tau yo ughuru payei na, ve nataghoni irau saawe. Tauvene saveeŋ veleghiiŋ ve mayaŋa tau tisiksik zi payau ne, upaghau zi payau.
Yes daaba tau tighamgham pooz na paam, tilup zi ve tiliil eez tighe tivaghamun ghau. Eemon yau besooŋa tsio. Tauvene yau aat matag itaghon tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, ve nagham ŋgar pazi poi.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei, ene igham ghau lolog poia le poia kat. Ve ipaduduuŋ ghau, leso nawatagh saa ŋgar tau pale nataghoni.
Yau tapirig isov, ve rigmon kanaŋ namaat ve nagheen ila ŋgaupup. Upaburigin ghau, ve ugham tapirig ivot muul itaghon saveeŋ tsio.
Ŋgar isov tau naghamgham zi, ene yau navoti zi payo. Tauta ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau ve uul ghau. Upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, upaghazoŋai ghau pa eez to taghoniiŋ zi. Ve yau aat matag itaghon uraat tsio ŋgeretazi, ve nagham ŋgar pazi poi.
Yau lolog ipataŋan le tapirig isov. Upalot ghau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Uul ghau to naleep soghan pa ŋgar karom. Saveeŋ tsio, ene imin eez to poia tsio izaa tsiau.
Yau lolog ighur naghe yau aat nataghon eez to saveeŋ onoon. Ve matag iŋgalŋgal eez tsio to gabizooŋ gabua.
O Yoova, eez tau yo ughuru payei na, yau nakisi igheen tuŋia ila lolog. Tauvene upul ghau sov! Pale mayag.
Yo upaghazoŋai ghau pa gabua katini. Tauta tinig izaa pa taghoniiŋ eez to tutuuŋ tsio.
O Yoova, tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, upaghazoŋai ghau pa eez to taghoniiŋ zi. Leso matag kisin zi, ve nataghon zi ila ila le saawe tsiau isov.
Upaghazoŋai ghau pa saveeŋ tsio ŋgara. Leso matag kisini, ve nataghoni toman lolog irau saawe.
Umuuŋ ve utotoi eez payau, leso nataghon tutuuŋ tsio. Pa eez tana, ta igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Upaburigin lolog, leso nataghon eez tau yo ughuru payei na, ve nagham ŋgar pa ndouŋ leg kuaz to taan sov.
Upaghau matag pa gabua soroksorok to taan tau anoŋazi mako na, ve upalot ghau to nataghon eez tsio. Leso naleep poi.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Tauvene matam iŋgal saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio, ve ugham anooŋa ivot payau. Saveeŋ tsio tana iŋarui tamtamon tisov tau tiroi payo ve titaghon ŋgar tsio.
Saveeŋ saghati tau koiagŋa tisiksiki payau na, ene igham ghau naroi. Pa isaav ighe tamtamon tighur ila saveeŋ toozi tawe, ene pale mayag. Tauvene utatan saveeŋ toozi, leso tamtamon tighur ila sov. Pasaa, eez tsio to gabizooŋ tamtamon, ene iduduuŋ mon.
O Yoova, yau naghe nataghon tutuuŋ tisov tau yo ughur zi na. Tauvene utaghon ŋgar tsio duduuŋa, ve ugham ghau naleep poia muul.
O Yoova, yau nawatagh: Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Utotoi ŋgar tana payau paam, o poi. Tauvene ugham mulin ghau pa pataŋani tsiau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Leso yau irau nayol saveeŋ veleghiiŋ tau tisiksiki payau na. Pasaa, yau naghur ila saveeŋ tsio.
Yau naghurghur matag pa gabizooŋ tsio. Tauvene uul ghau lak! Leso avog ivotia gabuam tau avom onoon ve utataghon saveeŋ tsio irau saawe.
Yau aat nataghon saveeŋ tsio irau saawe. Ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila.
Tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, yau nazuari ghau pa taghoniiŋ zi. Tauvene gabua eta irau ipoon eez payau mako.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei na, yau aat navotia ila yes kinik naghozi paam. Pa yau naroi, ma mayag pa tamtamon eta mako.
Tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, tigham lolog poia le poia kat. Tauta lolog pazi kat.
Yau lolog pa tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, ve napatab pazi. Tauvene nait nimag izaa, ve napait ghom pa tutuuŋ tsio. Tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, matag itaghon zi naghe nagham ŋgar pazi poi.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Matam iŋgalŋgal saveeŋ tau umbua tomani ghau na. Pa saveeŋ tsio tawe ipapalot ghau to naghur matag payo, ve nasaŋan uleeŋ tsio.
Isaav ighe pataŋani igham ghau, ene pale saveeŋ tsio iuul ghau to naleep poia. Ŋgar tane, ta irav ateg le ateg izi.
Yes tau tipapait tauzi ve tivelegh ghom na, monmon tivevelegh ghau paam. Eemon yau naghur murig pa saveeŋ tsio mako.
O Yoova, yau matag iŋgalŋgal saawe naol tau muuŋ ugabiiz tamtamon ve ughur atuya pazi. Tauta ipalot ghau, ve igham ateg izi.
Isaav ighe naghita zeran sasaghati tighur murizi pa saveeŋ tsio, ene igham ghau ateg yavyav kat.
Taan tane, yau naleep pani namin loom mon, ve natoor mbouŋ katini pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Yoova, matag iŋgalŋgal ghom pa mboŋ paam, ve nataghon saveeŋ tsio.
Yau gabuag tauvene: Tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, matag kisin zi ve nataghon zi irau saawe.
Yoova, yau naghit ghom naghe yo gabua tauu. Yau naleep ilat tsio imin taan poia ee tau tipuli payau to naleep ila. Yau nambu saveeŋ payo naghe yau aat nataghon aliŋam.
Taŋiiz tsiau iŋarui ghom toman lolog: Lolom isaghatin ghau, ve ughur poia tsio izaa tsiau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Yau nagabiiz laghooŋ tsiau naghe ene iduduuŋ mako. Tauta natoor ŋgar tsiau, ve naghe nataghon eez tau yo ughuru payei.
Ve irau nasaŋan mako. Yau aat rekia mon ve nataghon tutuuŋ tsio.
Zeran sasaghati tighur liis naol to tikis ghau. Eemon irau lolog iveegh pa tutuuŋ tsio mako.
Yau naburig pa mboŋ anooŋa, ve napait ghom. Pasaa, eez tsio to gabizooŋ gabua, ene iduduuŋ mon.
Yes tau tiroi payo ve titaghon ŋgar tsio na, yau lolog pazi ve nagham zi timin zetagŋa.
O Yoova, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Ŋgar tsio tana, yo utotoia irau taan isov. Upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, leso nawatagh zi kat.
O Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Yo ughamgham poghani ghau kat itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Yau naghur ila naghe tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, ene popoia mon. Tauvene upaghazoŋai ghau pa ŋgar poia ve eez to gabizooŋ poghania gabua.
Muuŋ, yau nasosor pa eez tsio. Eemon yo ulos ghau ve upaduduuŋ ghau, tauta aazne matag kisin aliŋam ve nataghoni.
Yo poiam kat. Ve ŋgar tau ughamgham zi na paam, ene popoia mon. Upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Yes tau tipapait tauzi ve tivelegh ghom na, tiŋgalŋgal saveeŋ karom payau ve tivaghamunia ezag. Eemon matag kisin tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, ve nataghon zi toman lolog.
Zeran tawe lezi ghilalooŋ rigta mako. Eemon yau, saveeŋ tsio igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Pataŋani tau muuŋ igham ghau, ene poia. Pasaa, ipaduduuŋ ghau, ve ipaburigin ŋgar tsiau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Saveeŋ tau ivot ila avom na, yau naghita imin gabua tauu. Iliiv maet silva ma gol ndiŋndiŋ ndiŋndiŋ.
Taum nimam igharaat ghau, ta navot. Tauvene upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, leso nagham ŋgar pazi poi.
Yes tau tiroi payo ve titaghon ŋgar tsio, isaav ighe tighit ghau, ene pale lolozi poia. Pasaa, yau naghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio, ve naghurghur matag naghe naghita anooŋa ivot.
O Yoova, yau nawatagh: Eez tsio to gabizooŋ tamtamon, ene iduduuŋ mon. Ve yo utaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio irau saawe. Tauta ulos ghau to upaduduuŋ ghau.
Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Utotoi ŋgar tauvene payau paam itaghon saveeŋ tau yo umbua payau na. Leso urav ateg, ve upalot ghau. Pa yau besooŋa tsio.
Lolom isaghatin ghau, ve uul ghau to naleep poi. Pasaa, saveeŋ tsio, tauta igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Yes tau tipapait tauzi ve tivelegh ghom na, tinoknok ŋgaliiŋ saveeŋ karom payau. Utatan zi ve ugham zi mayazi. Eemon yau, o matag itaghon tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na naghe nagham ŋgar pazi poi.
Yes tau tiroi payo ve titaghon ŋgar tsio, o tilam payau ve yeŋa nilup ghei. Pa zeran tauvene tiwatagh eez tau yo ughuru pa tamtamon tsio.
Yau naghe ŋgar tau igheen ila lolog ne, eta isosor sov, ve nataghon duduŋai tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na. Leso mayag sov.
O Yoova, yau nakaria saŋaniiŋ pa uleeŋ tsio, le tapirig isov kat. Eemon yau naghur ila naghe aliŋam pale ighur anooŋa.
Yau naghurghur matag naghe naghita saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio ighur anooŋa. Eemon nasaŋan le mako. Pale ŋeez o uul ghau ve ateg izi?
Yau nasaghat ve tamtamon lolozi iveghai ghau wa. Tighit ghau namin pen. Eemon tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, lolog iveegh pazi mako.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Puughu mindai ta yo umamarar koiagŋa, ve tighamgham pataŋani payau? Pale ŋeez o ugabiiz zi, ve ughur atuya pazi?
Ughita. Yes tau tipapait tauzi ve tivelegh ghom na, titai puura payau tighe natap nazila. Zeran tawe titaghon saveeŋ tsio mako.
Tutuuŋ tsio tisov, ene popoiazi mon. Tauvene yei irau ninumeer zi to tipaduduuŋ ghei. Aazne, tamtamon tighur pataŋani payau sorok. Tauvene uul ghau lak!
Pasaa, malau mako pale tipasov lepoogh tsiau to taan. Eemon tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, yau naghur murig pazi mako.
Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Tauvene uŋgin ghau naleep poi. Leso matag kisin eez tau yo ughuru payei na, ve nataghoni irau saawe. Eez tana, taum avom isavia.
O Yoova, saveeŋ tsio pale iyaryaaŋ izi sambam, ve ighengheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Tamtamon tipopoop, ve paaghu toozi tivotvot taghon taghon gha ila. Ve gabuam tau avom onoon ve utataghon saveeŋ tsio na paam. Ighengheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Yo ta ughur taan igheen tuŋia ila niia. Irau izuur mako.
Muuŋ le ilam aazne, gabua naol isov tigheen tuŋia ila niazi niazi itaghon saveeŋ tau yo usavia na. Ve gabua naol isov, ene timin besooŋa tsio.
Saveeŋ tsio igham lolog poia le poia kat. Imin ta mako, kanaŋ pataŋani tsiau igham ghau nalaleg.
Tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, irau lolog iveegh pa eta mako. Mako le mako kat. Pasaa saveeŋ tsio, tauta igham ghau vuvuŋag ila ve naleep poia muul.
Yau namin lem wa. Tauvene ugham mulin ghau lak! Pasaa, yau nazuari ghau pa taghoniiŋ tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na.
Aazne, zeran sasaghati tighamgham lilin ghau tighe tirav ghau namaat. Eemon matag iŋgalŋgal eez tau yo ughuru payei.
Yau naghita gabua eta tau ivot geeg ne mako. Gabua ta naol ne, tisov timuul mon. Eemon tutuuŋ tsio, o irao kat. Ene puughu tiina, ve poia le poia kat.
Yau lolog pa saveeŋ tsio kat! Tauvene saawe ta naol ne, mboŋoozo ila le ravrav izi, matag itaghoni ve naghamgham ŋgar pani.
Tutuuŋ tsio igheen ila ŋgar tsiau irau saawe. Tauta ŋgar tsiau iliiv koiagŋa ŋgar toozi.
Ŋgar tsiau iliiv yes ŋgara tau tipaduduuŋ ghau ne paam. Pasaa, matag itaghon eez tau yo ughuru payei na, ve naghamgham ŋgar pani.
Ve ŋgar tsiau iliiv zolmana ŋgar toozi paam. Pasaa, tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, matag kisin zi, ve nataghon zi irau saawe.
Yau napaghau taug pa eez sasaghati ta naol ne, leso nataghon aliŋam.
Yau naghur murig pa tutuuŋ tsio duduŋazi mako. Pasaa, yo taum ta upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tana.
Tok suuru, ene poia pa ghunuuŋ. Eemon saveeŋ tsio, ene poia le poia kat. Iliiv tok suuru.
Tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, ene tiuul ghau pa ghilalooŋ ŋgar poia. Tauta naghur koi pa ŋgar karom naol isov. Mako pale igherev ghau to napul eez tsio.
Saveeŋ tsio, ene imin lam tau isul ghau. Ve imin ghazooŋa payau, leso nalaagh taghon eez tsio.
Gabizooŋ tsio, ene iduduuŋ mon. Tauta nambu saveeŋ payo ve napariaaŋa le iyaryaaŋ kat naghe yau aat nataghon eez tsio to gabizooŋ gabua.
O Yoova, pataŋani tiina kat igham ghau le naleep saghat. Uul ghau to naleep poi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Yau lolog poia payo ve napait ghom pa poia tsio. Naghe paitooŋ tsiau tane imin watooŋrau poia ila matam. Upaghazoŋai ghau pa eez tsio to gabizooŋ gabua.
Monmon yau nalepleep ila naal aavo. Eemon lolog iveegh pa saveeŋ tsio mako.
Onoon, zeran sasaghati tighur liis payau. Eemon tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, yau nasapir pazi mako.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei, ene gabua poia tau yo ugham payau. Yau aat nakiskisi tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Pasaa, igham ghau lolog poia le poia kat.
Tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, ŋgar tsiau iyaryaaŋ naghe yau aat nataghon zi le irau saawe tsiau isov.
Yes tau tibees payo toman lolozi eemon mako ve ŋgar toozi ru na, yau lolog pazi mako. Eemon saveeŋ tsio, yau lolog pani kat.
Yo umin niag to yoŋgaaŋ, ve umin sigheu payau. Tauvene naghur ila saveeŋ tsio, ve naghurghur matag naghe naghita anooŋa ivot.
Yam zeran tau aghamgham ŋgar saghati na, aghau payau! Pasaa, yau naghe nataghon tutuuŋ to Maaron tsiau.
O Yoova, upalot ghau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio. Leso nayooz ariaaŋ ve naleep poia. Isaav ighe naghur matag payo sorok, ene pale mayag.
Ukis ghau tuŋia. Leso naleep poi, ve matag kisin tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, ve nataghon zi irau saawe.
Tamtamon tisov tau tisapir pa tutuuŋ tsio na, yo ughur murim pazi. Ŋgar toozi karom, ene itotoi zi ighe yes tipul eez tsio wa.
Zeran sasaghati tau tileep izi taan na, yo ughit zi timin pen ve usik zi tilalez. Tauta lolog isaghav eez tau yo ughuru payei.
Yau nagham ŋgar payo, le roiŋ tiina igham ghau ve tinig irur. Ve ŋgar tsio tau monmon ugagabiiz tamtamon ve ughur atuya pazi, ene paam igham ghau naroi.
Yau nagham ŋgar popoia ve ŋgar duduuŋa mon. Tauvene upul ghau nala koiagŋa nimazi sov.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Tauvene uyooz payau ve uul ghau. Leso naleep poi. Yes tau tipapait tauzi ve tivelegh ghom na, upul zi tigham saghatin ghau sov.
Yau naghurghur matag pa uleeŋ tsio. Ve nakaria saŋaniiŋ wa. Pale ŋeez o uul ghau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio?
Yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Utotoi ŋgar tana payau paam. Pa yau besooŋa tsio. Ve upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Tauvene upaghazoŋai ghau, leso naghilaal ŋgar poia, ve nawatagh katin eez tau yo ughuru payei na.
O Yoova, aazne tamtamon tizorzoor saveeŋ tsio. Uburig ve ugham ŋgar eta pazi lak!
Onoon kat, yau lolog pa tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne iliiv gol. Gol tau ŋgalaaŋa ve poia kat na paam, naghita naghe tutuuŋ tsio iliivo.
Tauvene tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi, tauta ipaduduuŋ ghau pa laghooŋ tsiau. Ve naghur koi pa eez naol tau tigherev ghau to naghur murig payo.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei, ene poia le poia kat. Tauvene matag kisini ve nataghoni irau saawe.
Isaav ighe tipaghazoŋai saveeŋ tsio puughu pa tamtamon, ene imin ghazooŋa pazi. Ve yes tau ŋgar toozi tiina mako na, saveeŋ tsio igham ŋgar toozi ivot, leso tighilaal ŋgar poia.
Yau lolog pa tutuuŋ tsio kat, imin tamtamon tau murunu le isaghat kat.
Matam ilam payau, ve ugham poghani ghau. Pasaa, yes tau lolozi igheen tsio ve tipapait ezam na, yo ughamgham tauvene pazi.
Upaduduuŋ ghau, leso laghooŋ tsiau iduduuŋ itaghon saveeŋ tsio. Ve upul ŋgar saghati eta iliiv ghau sov.
Yes tau tighamgham pataŋani payau to titatan ghau na, ugham mulin ghau ila nimazi. Leso nataghon tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na.
O Yoova, yau besooŋa tsio. Naghe lolom poia payau ve ugham poghani ghau. Ve upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na.
Yau nataŋtaŋ, ve matag suuru irereer izizi imin yaa. Pasaa, tamtamon titaghon saveeŋ tsio irao soone.
Yoova, yo duduŋam kat. Ve gabizooŋ tsio paam, ene iduduuŋ mon.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei, ene iduduuŋ mon. Tauvene yei irau ninumeera to ipaduduuŋ ghei.
Ŋgar tsiau iyaryaaŋ kat naghe tamtamon tisov titaghon aliŋam. Eemon koiagŋa lolozi iveghaini. Tauta tigham ghau ateg yavyav kat.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Lolog isaghav saveeŋ tsio, ve nanumeera kat. Pasaa, natoova le naghita naghe ene onoon.
Onoon, yau ŋeer sorok ve tamtamon matazi izi payau. Eemon tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, lolog iveegh pazi mako.
Ŋgar tsio duduuŋa pale ighengheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila. Ve saveeŋ tsio, ene onoon mon. Tauvene irau naghur ila, ve nanumeera kat.
Onoon, pataŋani naol itatan ghau, ve igham ghau lolog ipataŋan kat. Eemon tutuuŋ tsio, ene igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei, ene iduduuŋ mon, ve ighengheen tauvene irau saawe. Upaghazoŋai ghau pani, leso naleep poi.
O Yoova, yau nataŋ rarai ghom toman lolog. Ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau ve uul ghau. Leso matag kisin tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, ve nataghon zi.
Taŋiiz tsiau iŋarui ghom. Upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau tane. Leso matag kisin eez tau yo ughuru payei na, ve nataghoni irau saawe.
Yau naghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio, ve naghurghur matag naghe naghita anooŋa ivot. Tauvene aaz izaa soone, ve yau naburig nataŋ rarai ghom to uul ghau.
Ve mboŋ ta naol ne paam, yau namamaat. Leso matag itaghon saveeŋ tsio, ve nagham ŋgar pani poi.
O Yoova, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi. Tauvene ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau tane, ve uul ghau naleep poi. Pasaa, gabizooŋ tsio, ene iduduuŋ mon.
Aazne, zeran sasaghati tilam tigharau ghau tighe tivaghamun ghau. Ŋgar toozi igheen malau kat pa saveeŋ tsio.
Eemon Yoova, yo uleep zigeg. Ve tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, ene irau nanumeer zi to tipaduduuŋ ghau.
Ta muuŋ ve ilam, yau naghilaal naghe eez tau yo ughuru payei, yo ughe igheen tauvene irau saawe.
Yoova, ughita pataŋani tsiau tane, ve upaghau ghau pani. Pasaa, lolog iveghai saveeŋ tsio mako.
Aazne, tamtamon tipayooz ghau sorok pa savsaveeŋ. Tauvene uyooz payau ve uul ghau naleep poi itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Zeran sasaghati, yo uluul zi mako. Pasaa, tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na, yes tigham ŋgar pa taghoniiŋ zi mako.
O Yoova, yes tau tileep ila pataŋani loolo na, lolom isaghatin zi kat. Tauvene uul ghau naleep poi itaghon ŋgar tsio duduuŋa.
Pasaa, koiagŋa tau tighamgham pataŋani payau ne, yes eval kat. Eemon eez tau yo ughuru payei na, yau nasapir pani mako.
Yau naghita yes tau tighur murizi payo na, le irau lolog mako kat. Pasaa, yes titaghon tutuuŋ tsio mako.
O Yoova, ughita. Tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na, yau lolog isaghav zi kat. Uul ghau naleep poi. Pasaa, yo lolom isaghav tamtamon tsio ve uluul zi.
Saveeŋ tsio puughu ene vene: Yo avom onoon ve utaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio irau saawe. Ve tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, ene tiduduuŋ mon, ve tigheen tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Yes daaba to taan tighurghur pataŋani payau sorok. Eemon yau naroi pazi mako. Saveeŋ tsio mon ta naroi pani.
Saveeŋ tsio igham ghau lolog poia le poia kat, imin tamtamon tau ilaagh ila le indeeŋ le gabua poia eez.
Ŋgar karom naol isov, ene lolog pazi mako kat ve naghur koi pazi. Eemon saveeŋ tsio, o lolog isaghavu kat.
Mataaz ta naol ne, napapait ghom pai liim ve ru. Pasaa, gabizooŋ tsio, ene iduduuŋ mon.
Yes tau lolozi isaghav saveeŋ tsio, ene pale tileep poia kat. Ve gabua eta irau igham zi titap ne mako.
O Yoova, yau nataghon tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, ve naghurghur matag pa uleeŋ tsio.
Eez tau yo ughuru payei na, yau lolog isaghavu kat. Tauta matag kisini, ve nataghoni irau saawe.
Yau nataghon eez tana tomania tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na. Pasaa, ŋgar isov tau yau naghamgham zi ne, yo ughitoor zi isov.
O Yoova, ulooŋ taŋiiz tsiau tane. Ugham ghau naghilaal ŋgar poia itaghon saveeŋ tsio.
Ughur taliŋam pa suŋuuŋ tsiau, ve upas ghau navot pa pataŋani tsiau itaghon saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tsio.
Yo upaghazoŋai ghau pa tutuuŋ tsio naol tau tigheen pataghaaŋ na. Tauvene avog aat ipait ghom kat.
Yau aat nambou mbouŋ tau iŋarui saveeŋ tsio. Pasaa, tutuuŋ tsio ta naol ne, ene iduduuŋ mon.
Nimam isaŋan pa uleeŋ ghau. Pasaa, ŋgar tsiau iyaryaaŋ naghe nataghon tutuuŋ naol tau yo ughur zi na.
O Yoova, yau napasawal pa uleeŋ tsio. Ve saveeŋ tsio, ta igham lolog poia le poia kat.
Upul ghau naleep matag iyaryaar, leso napait ghom. Tutuuŋ tsio aat iuul ghau to naleep poia.
Yau besooŋa tsio. Eemon aazne nasosor pa eez tsio ve navalaghlaagh imin sipsip tau ighau ila ve ilale. Tauvene uil ghau, ve ugham ghau namuul nalam. Pasaa, yau lolog iveegh pa tutuuŋ tsio mako.
Yau naleep ila pataŋani loolo, ve nataŋ rarai Yoova pa uleeŋ, ve i ilooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau.
O Yoova, yes tau avozi karom, ve yamazi itortoor saveeŋ na, upaghau ghau pazi.
Yam tau yamamim itortoor saveeŋ na, mindai? Yam aghe awatagh saa ŋgar tau pale Yoova igham payam, ve atuya tau pale iŋarui gham?
Ene poia. Alooŋ. I pale ivanegh gham pa paneegh tooni natŋa tau matazi kat. Ve yav ŋgilaaŋi tau siŋsiŋaaŋ kat na pale ighan gham. Atuya tsiam, tauta ena!
Oyai, yes tau aazne naleep namin loom ila sosozi ne, lezi ŋgar mako imin kankanooŋa to nugh Mesek ve Kedar.
Zeran to nugh tawe, lolozi pa ŋgar luuma mako kat. Ve yau nakaria lepoogh tomani zi, le isooŋ ghau wa.
Yau lolog pa ŋgar luuma, ve naghe yeŋa nivalupu ghei nimin eemon. Eemon yes lolozi ipapazaagh zi pa ghamuuŋ malmal irau saawe.
Matag izala pa loloz naghe naghita: Uleeŋ pale ilam payau mindai?
Yoova mon ta pale nagham uleeŋ ila tooni. I ta ighur sambam ve taan.
I aat maata payo. Irau ipul ghom aghem pusukia ve utap mako. Ŋginiiŋ tsio imamaat irau saawe.
Onoon kat, ŋginiiŋ to iit Israela, ighe maata ighengheen, ene irau igheen mako. Imamaat irau saawe.
Yoova maata payo ve iŋgin ghom, leso uleep poi. I ileep ila zigem, ve imin yavyaav payo to ipoon ghom pa aaz.
Tauvene mataaz, aaz irau ighaaz katin ghom mako. Ve mboŋ, kaiyo irau ivaghamun ghom mako.
Yoova aat maata payo, ve ipoon ghom pa gabua sasaghati naol isov. I tauu pale iŋgin ghom uleep poi.
I pale maata pa laghooŋ tsio ve lepoogh tsio. Tauvene saawe tau upul ruum ve uvot ula, le umuul uloŋ ulam, i pale ileep tomani ghom, ve iŋgin ghom uleep poi. Ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila.
Saawe tau tisaav payau tighe: “Uburig ve itiŋa tazala pa Yoova rumei tooni!” Saveeŋ toozi tawe igham ghau lolog poia kat.
Ve aazne, nilam niloŋ nila Yerusalem loolo, ve niyooz nigharau didiiŋ ariaaŋa tau ilivut Yerusalem na atamana.
Yerusalem, ene nugh paghuuna. Tigharaata le ivot kat. Gabua naol isov tigheen duduuŋ mon.
Iit tamtamon to Yoova monmon tazazalam sene pa suŋuuŋ. Rumei rumei to Israela tisov tizazala pa Yerusalem to tipait Yoova eeza pa poia tooni, itaghon tutuuŋ tau i tauu ighuru pazi na.
Pasaa, kinik tsiei tau tivot ila to David na, niazi to ghamuuŋ pooz igheen nugh tane. Ve tighagharaat pataŋani to tamtamon paam izi ta sene.
Suŋuuŋ tsiam iŋarui Yoova, ve aghasoni to igham tamtamon to Yerusalem tileep poia toman lolozi luuma! Asuŋ pani aghe: “Yes tau lolozi pa Yerusalem na, upaghau pataŋani pazi. Leso tiroi sov, ve tileep poia mon.
Ve yes tau tileep iloŋ ila didiiŋ ariaaŋa to Yerusalem loolo na, ugham zi tileep poia toman lolozi luuma. Ve kinik tomania yes uraata tau tileep ila ruum tooni na paam. Upoon zi pa pataŋani naol isov. Leso tiroi sov, ve tileep poia mon.”
Yau matag iŋgal toŋvetaz tsiau ve zetagŋa. Tauta nasaav pa nugh tiina Yerusalem naghe: “Maaron pale igham ghom uleep poia toman lolom luuma.”
Ve nagham ŋgar pa Maaron toit Yoova rumei tooni paam. Tauta suŋuuŋ tsiau iŋaruini naghe i tauu aat igham gabua naol isov ivot poia mon payo.
O Yoova, yo uleep ila niam to ghamuuŋ pooz izi sambam. Tauvene naghur matag payo ve nanumeer ghom.
Yoova, yo Maaron tsiei. Ninumeer ghom pa gabua ta naol ne, imin besooŋa zitamoot ve zilivaa tau tinumeer daaba toozi. Tauvene yei aat nighur matamai payo pa uleeŋ, le irau lolom isaghatin ghei ve uul ghei.
O Yoova, yei besooŋa tsio. Lolom isaghatin ghei, ve uul ghei lak! Ughita. Aazne, koiamaiŋa matazi tatanin ghei, ve tinoknok veleghiiŋ ghei le isooŋ ghei kat! Zeran tawe, lepoghazi poia kat. Timbool pa gabua eta mako. Tauta tiroi payo mako, ve tinumeer tauzi tighe yes tirau kat. Ugham ŋgar eta pazi lak!
<range>
“Imin ta Yoova ivool toit mako, kanaŋ tagham saghat.” Yam eval tiina to Israel irau asaav tauvene:
“Saawe tau koiaanŋa tipaburigin malmal pait, imin ta Yoova ivool toit mako, kanaŋ tipasov ghiit. Pasaa, atezi yavyav pait kat.
<range>
Pataŋani tawe, ene imin yaa ivot toman tapiri ve izugh ghiit tala ve imbeluut ghiit. Ve ene imin lulu iloŋ, ve igherev ghiit tala gha taghun te.”
<range>
Eemon Yoova ipul ghiit tala koiaanŋa nimazi to tivaghamun ghiit mako. Tauvene tapaiti pa poia tooni!
Saawe tana, iit tamin man tau liis ighamu. Eemon Yoova ipas ghiit pa liis tawe, ve taghau.
Yoova ta ighur sambam ve taan. I mon ta Uleeŋa toit.
Yes tau tinumeer Yoova na, tiyooz tuŋia imin loloz Zion. Loloz tawe, ighe gabua eta itoki, ene irau irur mako. Iyooz tuŋia tauvene taghon taghon gha ila.
Loloz katini tilivut Yerusalem. Yoova tauvene paam. I imin didiiŋ ariaaŋa tau ilivut tamtamon tooni. Ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila.
Taan tau Maaron igham pa tamtamon tooni duduŋazi na, i irau ipul zeran sasaghati tigham pooz pani irau saawe ne mako. I pale itatan zi. Pa ighe mako, ene pale tigherev zeran duduŋazi ve tigham sosor paam.
O Yoova, tamtamon popoia tau ŋgar duduuŋa igheen ariaaŋ ila lolozi na, ugham poghani zi.
Eemon yes tau tighur murizi pa eez tsio, ve titaghon eez tau iduduuŋ mako na, uziir zi tomania zeran sasaghati tisov tighau tila. O Yoova, ugham yes Israela tileep poia toman lolozi luuma!
Muuŋ, nugh Zion isaghat kat. Ve saawe tau Yoova iuul ghiit gha taleep poia muul, ene igham loloon poia kat. Eemon taghur ila kat mako. Taghe pa ene vivuuŋ mon.
Saawe tana, tintiniin ve taŋiŋ kat. Loloon poia ve tasir toman aliŋaan tiina. Ŋgar tau Yoova igham pait na, nugh nugh tighita ve tisaav tighe: “Wai, Yoova igham uraat tintiina pa yes Israela!”
Ene onoon. Yoova igham uraat tintiina kat pait. Tauta loloon poia kat.
Eemon Yoova, aazne nisaghat muul. Tauvene nighason ghom nighe uul ghei, leso nileep poia muul, imin uman tau izi ve igham yaa to Negev tau timaak na, tireer muul.
Yes tau titaŋtaŋ, ve tivazogh aniiŋ, ene pale murei tilup aniiŋ toozi anooŋa, ve tisir toman lolozi poia.
Onoon kat. Yes tau titaŋtaŋ ve tibadbaad aniiŋ uvezi tila pa vazoghiiŋ na, ene pale murei tibaad aniiŋ anooŋa, ve tisirsir toman lolozi poia, ve timuul tila pa nughei.
Yes to raoŋ ruum, isaav ighe Yoova ileep tomani zi pa uraat toozi mako, ene pale tirav tauzi sorok. Ve yes tau timamaat ve tiŋgin nugh pa mboŋ na paam. Isaav ighe Yoova iŋgin nugh toozi tawe mako, ene pale timamaat sorok.
Isaav ighe monmon ugham ŋgar naol ughe: “Pale leg aniiŋ ma gabua irao, ma mako?” Ve upaburigin uraat pa mboŋoozo geeg, ve ukiskisi ila ila le mboŋ anooŋa, ene urav taum sorok. Pa poia tooni, tauta igham uraat toit ighurghur anooŋa ivotvot. Tauvene yes tau Maaron loolo igheen toozi na, lolozi bubu mako, ve tigheen poi pa mboŋ.
Ve natuunŋa tau tapoop zi na paam, Yoova ighe igham poghani ghiit, tauta igham zi pait itaghon tauu poia tooni.
Isaav ighe ŋeer paaghu eta azaawa ipoop le zitamoot siriv, ene natŋa tawe pale tiyooz pani imin paneegh natŋa to yes zaaba.
Tauvene tamtamon tau le natŋa zitamoot katini, ene pale tintini pa poia to Yoova tau izaa tooni na. Ve murei, isaav ighe yesŋa koiŋa tivazorai zi pa savsaveeŋ izi maaran, ene koiŋa irau titatani ve tipamayaŋini mako. Pa natŋa tawe pale tiyooz pani, ve tiuule pa savsaveeŋ.
Yes tau tiroi pa Yoova ve titaghon eez tooni na, poia to Yoova pale izaa toozi ve tintinizi.
Isaav ighe ugham tauvene, ene pale poia to Yoova izaa tsio, ve uleep poia toman tintinim. Uraat tau ughamu pa nimam na, pale ughita anooŋa ivot, ve lem aniiŋ ma gabua katini.
Ve azuwam tau iŋginŋgin ruum tsio na, pale ipoop lem geegeu katini, imin ai vaen tau anooŋa ivot katini. Tauvene saawe ta yamŋa natumŋa alup gham pa ghanghaniiŋ, yes pale tileep livutin ghom, imin ai oliv salunu tau titum livutin puughu.
Tauvene tamtamon tau ighe iroi pa Yoova ve itaghon ŋgar tooni, ene poia to Yoova tauvene pale izaa tooni.
Yoova ilepleep izi nugh Zion. I aat ighur poia tooni izaa tsio. Ve saawe isov tau uleep izi taan, yo pale ughita Yerusalem igheen poi.
Ve yo pale uleep malau izi taan, le ughita timbumŋa. Yoova aat igham yes Israela tileep poia toman lolozi luuma. Onoon.
“Saawe tau kukuag ve ilam, koiagŋa tighurghur pataŋani naol payau.” Yam eval tiina to Israel, eŋaeŋa asov asaav tauvene:
“Onoon kat. Saawe tau kukuag ve ilam na, koiagŋa tighurghur pataŋani naol payau. Eemon titatan ghau mako.
Yes tiloslos ghau le ndumeg itamboroos. Tivaghamun ghau le ndumeg imin taan tau tigheli pa vazoghiiŋ aniiŋ na.”
Eemon Yoova ŋgar tooni, ene iduduuŋ mon. Tauta igham mulin ghau ila zeran sasaghati tawe nimazi, ve namin besooŋa sorok pazi muul mako.
Tamtamon tisov tau tighurghur koi pa nugh Zion na, Yoova pale ipamuul zi tila toman mayazi.
Yes pale timin kikiliiŋ tau itum izala ruum paavo. Itum izaa tiina soone, ve igorgor. Kikiliiŋ tauvene, tamtamon irau tilupu ve tipoosa imin tighamgham pa aniiŋ wit ne mako. Tipuli gha izi ileple.
<range>
Isaav ighe tamtamon tilaagh tila le tizaa to Zion koiŋa izi eeze, ene irau to tipalot zi pa Yoova eeza mako. Irau tisaav pazi tighe: “Ila Yoova eeza, yei nisaav payam: Poia tooni aat izaa tsiam.” Vene mako.
O Yoova, aazne naleep ila pataŋani tiina loolo, imin nazal nazila mazavan! Tauvene nataŋ rarai ghom.
Tiina tsiau, ughur taliŋam pa taŋiiz tsiau. Lolom isaghatin ghau, ve ulooŋ suŋuuŋ tsiau tane.
Yoova, isaav ighe matam kisin sosor tsiei, sei irau iyooz ila naghom? Eta mako.
Eemon yo poia puughu, ve ureureu sosor tsiei. Leso niroi payo, ve nitaghon ŋgar tsio.
Yau nanumeer Yoova ve naghurghur matag pani naghe ŋeez o iuul ghau? Yau naghur ila saveeŋ mbuaaŋ tooni, tauta nasaŋan pa uleeŋ tau pale ivot.
Yau nasaŋan Yoova to iuul ghau. Naghur matag pani imin yes tau tiŋginŋgin nugh pa mboŋ na, tighur matazi pa nughizau. Isaav ighe tighita aaz pisikia izaa, ene igham zi lolozi poia.
O yam Israela, anumeer Yoova ve aghur matamim pani pa uleeŋ. Pasaa, i loolo isaghav tamtamon tooni ve iuluul zi. Isaav ighe igham mulin ghiit pa pataŋani toit, ene pale iuul katin ghiit.
Onoon kat, i pale igham mulin iit Israela pa pataŋani toit, ve ireu sosor toit isov ilale.
O Yoova, ŋgar pakuruuŋ eta igheen ila lolog mako, ve matag izi pa zetagŋa mako, ve nazuari ghau to namin tiina, paam mako. Tauvene ŋgar ve uraat tintiina tau narao mako na, nazazain taug pazi mako.
Yau naghilaal Maaron. Tauta lolog bubu mako. Lolog iraurau, ve ateg izi, imin ŋeer marani tau tiina imbaraara le loolo poia.
O yam Israela, anumeer Yoova, ve aghur matamim pani pa uleeŋ. Ta aazne, ve taghon taghon gha ila.
O Yoova, matam iŋgal David pa pataŋani naol tau i ibadbaad zi na.
Muuŋ, David imbu saveeŋ ariaaŋa tomania Yoova tau Maaron saksaki to Yakop na. Ve ipariaaŋ saveeŋ tawe le iyaryaaŋ kat.
Ighe: “Yau irau naloŋ nala ruum tsiau, ve nala niag to ghenooŋ soone.
Irau namariau, ve nagheen lolog iveegh soone.
Le irau nandeeŋ nugh eta pa Yoova. Ŋgar tsiau iyaryaaŋ kat naghe nail nugh eta, leso imin Maaron saksaki to Yakop niia to lepoogh, o ateg izi!”
Saawe tau yei nileep izi taan sirivu to Eprata yei nilooŋ Bokis to Saveeŋ Mbuaaŋ vaaru. Tauvene nila le nighita igheen igharau nugh Yar.
Murei ra, tisakia ila Yerusalem. Tauvene nisaav nighe: “Taburig tala pa Maaron niia to lepoogh ta Yerusalem we. Tala tagharau niia to ghamuuŋ pooz, ve taput agheen pani, ve tapakuru.”
O Yoova, uburig toman Bokis to Saveeŋ Mbuaaŋ, ve ula pa niam to mariaoŋ. Bokis tawe ta imin ilaal pa tapirim.
